扩建码头
kuòjiàn mǎtóu
extend a wharf
扩建
kuòjiàn
extend

Mùchǎng zhǔnbèi chūntiān shí kuòdà sìyǎng guīmó，suǒyǐ wǒmen zài dōngtiān tíqián xiūjiàn le liǎnggè kōnglán。
The are plans to expand the pasture, so we built two vacant sheds in preparation for winter.
扩建

装配车间的厂房需要扩建了
很多铁路已由单线扩建成复线了

码头扩建提前完工。

an extension to a factory
工厂的扩建部分
She enlarged the flower beds.
Tā kuòjiànle huātán。
她扩建了花坛。
Most applications provide extensions for the files they create.

多数应用程序为其创建的文件提供扩展名。
公司的这些进益要用于扩大再生产。
Gōngsī de zhèxiē jìnyì yào yòngyú kuòdà zài shēngchǎn。
The income of the company will be used to expand production.
不留利就无法扩大再生产。
使错误没有扩大化
shǐ cuòwù méiyǒu kuòdàhuà
keep mistakes within bounds
不要把矛盾扩大化
肃反扩大化。
把深化改革、促进发展、调整结构和扩大就业有机结合起来。
我们对于工农业产品的交换是缩小剪刀差，而不是扩大剪刀差。
Wǒmen duìyú gōngnóngyè chǎnpǐn de jiāohuàn shì suōxiǎo jiǎndāochā，ér bùshì kuòdà jiǎndāochā。
In the exchange of industrial products for agricultural products, we try to narrow the price scissors, not widen them.
扩大政治影响
kuòdà zhèngzhì yǐngxiǎng
extend political influence
扩大经营范围
kuòdà jīngyíngfànwéi
expand business scope

kuòdà xiānghù jiān de jīngjì jìshù hézuò
extend mutual economic and technological cooperation
使错误没有扩大化
shǐ cuòwù méiyǒu kuòdàhuà
keep mistakes within bounds

kuòdà yǎnjiè
widen one\'s field of vision; broaden one\'s horizon

kuòdà wénxué chuàngzuò de yuándì

kuòdà zhǎndì miànjī

kuòdà zhànguǒ

扩大企业的自主权
kuòdà qǐyè de zìzhǔquán 
enlarge the decision-making power of local enterprises
扩大
kuòdà
enlarge; expand; extend
今年的小麦又丰收了，我们应该扩大仓容了。
Jīnnián de xiǎomài yòu fēngshōu le，wǒmen yīnggāi kuòdà cāngróng le。
With a repeated good wheat harvest, we should enlarge our granaries space.
随着社会经济的发展，持卡族的群体呈扩大趋势。
Suí zhe shèhuì jīngjì de fāzhǎn，chíkǎzú de qúntǐ chéng kuòdà qūshì。
With the development of the social economy, groups of card-holders show a tendency to expand.
我们要通过多种传播途径做宣传，以扩大影响面。
Wǒmen yào tōngguò duō zhǒng chuánbō tújìng zuò xuānchuán，yǐ kuòdà yǐngxiǎngmiàn。
We shall transmit through various ways so as to expand our coverage.
国家打算扩大基本社会养老保险的覆盖面。
Guójiā dǎsuàn kuòdà jīběn shèhuì yǎnglǎo bǎoxiǎn de fùgàimiàn。
The government plans to extend coverage basic life insurance in society.
公司的这些进益要用于扩大再生产。
Gōngsī de zhèxiē jìnyì yào yòngyú kuòdà zài shēngchǎn。
The income of the company will be used to expand production.
牧场准备春天时扩大饲养规模，所以我们在冬天提前修建了两个空栏。

The are plans to expand the pasture, so we built two vacant sheds in preparation for winter.
这个扩大器的声音很大，有点闹了！
Zhège kuòdàqì de shēngyīn hěndà，yǒu diǎn nào le！
The loudspeaker is too loud and thus a bit noisy.
联户办企业的优势是可以将资金集中，扩大规模，做大做强。

The advantage of a corporate partnership is that it can pool funds, and enlarge the scale to make the company more powerful.
扩大词汇的蓄积量，有利于提高口语。
Kuòdà cíhuì de xùjīliàng，yǒulìyú tígāo kǒuyǔ。
Enlarging your vocabulary can help you improve your oral English.
饲养场今年准备扩大养畜牛羊的规模。
Sìyǎngchǎng jīnnián zhǔnbèi kuòdà yǎngchù niúyáng de guīmó。
The farm plans to raise more livestock this year.
养殖场今年想扩大生产规模 。
Yǎngzhíchǎng jīnnián xiǎng kuòdà shēngchǎn guīmó。
The aquatic breeding farm plans to increase its production scale.

In order to promote the popularity of the hospital, the president of the hospital invited his classmates who work in America.

This metal ware factory has introduced a new water press to increase production.
沙漠不断扩大。
Shāmò búduàn kuòdà。
The desert is expanding all the time.

kuòdà shēngchǎn
expand production

Dúshū néng kuòdà yǎnjiè。
Reading can broaden your horizons.
经过扩放这个图片大多了！
Jīngguò kuòfàng zhège túpiàn dà duō le！
The photo became much larger after enlargement.

winter cold

The climate in recent years has been so abnormal, the temperature in winter even sometimes gets up to 20 Centigrade!
冬天的早晨弥漫着浓雾，能见度只有不到2米。
Dōngtiān de zǎochén mímàn zhe nóngwù，néngjiàndù zhǐyǒu búdào èrmǐ。
The winter morning is permeated with dense mist. Visibility is less than 2 meters.
北方的冬天，吃饭时人们都要喝些暖肚汤。
Běifāng de dōngtiān，chīfàn shí rénmen dōuyào hē xiē nuǎndùtāng。
In the winter, people in the north have some warming soup every dinner.
她很怕冷，每到冬天就爱抱着她的暖水袋。
Tā hěnpà lěng，měi dào dōngtiān jiù ài bào zhe tā de nuǎnshuǐdài。
She is susceptible to cold. She likes to have a hot-water bottle in her arms during the winter.
北方的冬天太冷了，很多人出门都要戴皮帽。
Běifāng de dōngtiān tài lěng le，hěnduōrén chūmén dōuyào dài pímào。
The winter in the north is very cold, many people have to wear fur hats when they go outdoors.
冬天的海深沉而有魄力，颇富奇趣。
Dōngtiān de hǎi shēnchén ér yǒu pòlì，pōfù qíqù。
The ocean in winter is deep and bold, and rich in unusual charm.
我们打算在今年冬天起墙，明年春天完工。
Wǒmen dǎsuàn zài jīnnián dōngtiān qǐqiáng，míngnián chūntiān wángōng。
We plan to start building the walls in winter this year and complete the project next spring.
每年冬天都会有很多游客来这里观赏塞北的雪景。
Měinián dōngtiān dūhuì yǒu hěnduō yóukè lái zhèlǐ guānshǎng sàiběi de xuějǐng。
Every winter many tourists came here to view, and admire the snow covered view of the north Great Wall.
今年冬天西瓜销售的市况很好，明年我们要有计划地进行补充。
Jīnnián dōngtiān xīguā xiāoshòu de shìkuàng hěnhǎo，míngnián wǒmen yào yǒu jìhuà de jìnxíng bǔchōng。
Watermelons are selling well in the market this winter, so we\'ll supply more next year in a planned way.
冬天到了，树叶在凄冷的寒风中萎落了。
Dōngtiān dào le，shùyè zài qīlěng de hánfēng zhōng wěiluò le。
It\'s winter now, and leaves wither and fall in the cold wind.
时间太久了，妈妈去年冬天腌制的咸鱼都变味了。
Shíjiān tài jiǔ le，māma qùnián dōngtiān yānzhì de xiányú dōu biànwèi le。
The salted fish made in winter goes bad if it is preserved for too long.
每年冬天，阿玉都会穿妈妈专门为她织的线袜。
Měinián dōngtiān，Ā Yù dōuhuì chuān māma zhuānmén wéi tā zhī de xiànwà。
Every winter, Ah Yu will wear woolen socks made by her mother.
冬天风干物燥，必须小心管理香火，否则易引发火灾。
Dōngtiān fēnggān wùzào，bìxū xiǎoxīn guǎnlǐ xiānghuǒ，fǒuzé yì yǐnfā huǒzāi。
It is dry in winter, you must take charge of the burning joss sticks and watch out for fire.
今年冬天，我们家就靠橡子面生活。
Jīnnián dōngtiān，wǒmen jiā jiù kào xiàng zǐmiàn shēnghuó。
We will live on acorn noodles for the winter this year.
北国的冬天，每家门口都可以看见雪罗汉。
Běiguó de dōngtiān，měijiā ménkǒu dōu kěyǐ kànjiàn xuěluóhàn。
In winter, there are snowmen in front of every house in north China.
冬天妈妈做了很多风味独特的腌菜。
Dōngtiān māma zuò le hěnduō fēngwèi dútè de yāncài。
Mother made a lot of delicious pickles in winter.
冬天吃点羊羹可以祛寒。
Dōngtiān chī diǎn yánggēng kěyǐ qūhán。
Eating some bean flour pastry in winter can dispel colds.
她在冬天收集了许多雪水，准备夏天用来降暑。
Tā zài dōngtiān shōují le xǔduō xuěshuǐ，zhǔnbèi xiàtiān yònglái jiàngshǔ。
She collected lots of snow water in winter so as to reduce the heat in summer.
我国东北天气太冷，冬天是很难看到雨淞的。
Wǒ guó dōngběi tiānqì tài lěng，dōngtiān shì hěn nán kàndào yǔsōng de。
It is not very cold in the northeast of China so it is hard to see glazed frost in winter.
冬天喝枣茶对身体有益。
Dōngtiān hē zǎochá duì shēntǐ yǒuyì。
Drinking date tea in winter is good for health.
建筑工人冬天还在徒手搬运砖瓦。
Jiànzhù gōngrén dōngtiān hái zài túshǒu bānyùn zhuānwǎ。
In winter, the construction workers still carry bricks and tiles with their bare hands.
这里的冬天太冷了，一定要及时在发动机冷却水中添加防冻剂。
Zhèlǐ de dōngtiān tài lěng le，yídìng yào jíshí zài fādòngjī lěngquè shuǐ zhōng tiānjiā fángdòngjì。
It\'s too cold here in winter, one must add anti-freezing agent to the engine cooling water in time.
今年冬天比去年冷。
Jīnnián dōngtiān bǐ qùnián lěng。
It is colder this winter than last winter.
大冬天他还光着上身。
Dàdōngtiān tā hái guāngzheshàngshēn。
He went bare-chested even in the depths of winter.
冬天，她用暖水袋焐脚。
Dōngtiān，tā yòng nuǎnshuǐdài wù jiǎo。
During winter she uses a hot water bottle to warm her feet up.
到了冬天，某些动物停止了活动，销声匿迹了。
Dàole dōngtiān，mǒuxiē dòngwù tíngzhǐle huódòng，xiāoshēng-nìjì le。
When winter arrives, some animals cease being active and disappear from sight.
冬季白天时间短。
Dōngjì báitiān shíjiān duǎn。
The day is shorter in winter.
入冬以来，天气骤冷，感冒的发病率大增。
Rùdōng yǐlái，tiānqì zhòulěng，gǎnmào de fābìnglǜ dàzēng。
As winter comes and the temperature drops sharply, the number of people who get colds increases a lot.
每逢冬至点，白天的时间是一年之中最短的。
Měiféng dōngzhì diǎn，báitiān de shíjiān shì yìnián zhī zhōng zuì duǎn de。
The day when the sun passes the winter solstice is the shortest of the year.
冬至这一天，下起了鹅毛雪。
Dōngzhì zhè yì tiān，xià qǐ le émáoxuě。
On the Winter Solstice, it snowed heavily.
已是残冬时节，离春天到来已经不远了。
Yǐ shì cándōng shíjié，lí chūntiān dàolái yǐjing bùyuǎn le。
It is already late winter, spring isn\'t far away.
天气很好，冬日暖暖。
Tiānqì hěn hǎo，dōngrì nuǎnnuǎn。
It\'s a fine winter day, and the sun is shining brightly.
漫天的飞雪，妆扮着冬季的美丽。
Màntiān de fēixuě，zhuāngbànzhe dōngjì de měilì。
The flying snow adds more charm to winter.
北京入冬以来经常出现大风天气。
Běijīng rùdōng yǐlái jīngcháng chūxiàn dàfēng tiānqì。
Since the beginning of winter, it has been very windy in Beijing.
天冷了，咱们应该买些煤斤过冬了。
Tiānlěng le，zánmen yīnggāi mǎi xiē méijīn guòdōng le。
It is getting cold. We should buy some coal for the winter.
天气越来越冷了，银鹰都南飞过冬了。
Tiānqì yuèláiyuè lěng le，yínyīng dōu nánfēi guòdōng le。
The weather is getting cold, all silver-eagles have flown to the south to pass the winter.
冬天一过，商店的皮大衣纷纷打折出售

冬天里我照顾了生病的父亲，他那时病得很重。

我今年冬天需要件羊毛衫。
This winter was extremely cold.
这个冬天真是寒冷至极。
He caught a cough during the winter.
他冬天得了一场病，不停地咳嗽。

Winter will come soon.

She carried on wearing her winter clothing until May.

幸运的是，首领在冬天死了。

Tāmen tán zhe dōngbùlā，chàng zhe huānkuài de míngē。
They played the tamboura as they were singing happily.
我打算把这些剩余的大白菜冬藏起来。
Wǒ dǎsuan bǎ zhèxiē shèngyú de dàbáicài dōngcáng qǐlai。
I intend to store these surplus Chinese cabbages for winter.
他们正在开展冬防工作。
Tāmen zhèngzài kāizhǎn dōngfáng gōngzuò。
They are taking precautions this winter against disasters in other seasons.
加强冬防，杜绝火灾。
Jiāqiáng dōngfáng，dùjué huǒzāi。
In winter, measures should be taken to prevent fires from breaking out.
起义的士兵攻占了冬宫。
Qǐyì de shìbīng gōngzhàn le dōnggōng。
Revolting soldiers attacked and occupied the Winter Palace.
她是南方人，不适应北方的冬寒气候。
Tā shì nánfāngrén，bùshìyìng běifāng de dōnghán qìhou。
She comes from the south and is not accustomed to the cold winter of the north.
他常年坚持锻炼，冬练三九，夏练三伏。
Tā chángnián jiānchí duànliàn,dōng liàn sānjiǔ,xià liàn sānfú.
He keeps exercising all year around, even in the hottest days in summer and the coldest days in winter.
像白菜这种冬令蔬菜还是要多储存一些。
Xiàng báicài zhèzhǒng dōnglìng shūcài háishi yào duō chǔcún yìxiē。
We should hoard more winter vegetables like cabbages.
北方的冬令寒冷干燥。
Běifāng de dōnglìng hánlěng gānzào。
The winter in the north is cold and dry.
冬日的午后，他坐在院子晒太阳。
Dōngrì de wǔhòu，tā zuò zài yuànzi shài tàiyáng。
In winter afternoons, he likes to bask in the sun in his courtyard.
天气很好，冬日暖暖。
Tiānqì hěn hǎo，dōngrì nuǎnnuǎn。
It\'s a fine winter day, and the sun is shining brightly.
趁着冬闲，我们出去打工吧。
Chènzhe dōngxián，wǒmen chūqù dǎgōng ba。
Since it\'s the slack winter season, let\'s go out to find a temporary job, shall we?
他收割完地里的玉米，开始准备冬小麦的播种。
Tā shōugē wán dìlǐ de yùmǐ，kāishǐ zhǔnbèi dōngxiǎomài de bōzhòng。
He embarked on the preparations for planting winter wheat immediately after he had finished harvesting corn.
村长打算利用今年的农闲时节，组织一次冬学。
Cūnzhǎng dǎsuan lìyòng jīnnián de nóngxián shíjié，zǔzhī yícì dōngxué。
The village head is planning a learning program for villagers in this year\'s slack winter season.
中国乒乓球队进行了一个月的封闭式冬训。
Zhōngguó pīngpāngqiú duì jìnxíng le yígèyuè de fēngbìshì dōngxùn。
The China National Table Tennis Team had a month\'s closed training in winter.
这几个节气都是在冬月之中的。
Zhè jǐgè jiéqi dōushì zài dōngyuè zhī zhōng de。
These solar periods all fall in the eleventh month of the lunar calendar.
我们学校举办了一年一度的冬运会。
Wǒmen xuéxiào jǔbàn le yìnián yí dù de dōngyùnhuì。
Our school has a yearly winter games.
每逢冬至点，白天的时间是一年之中最短的。
Měiféng dōngzhì diǎn，báitiān de shíjiān shì yìnián zhī zhōng zuì duǎn de。
The day when the sun passes the winter solstice is the shortest of the year.
这个地区的冬种工作已经基本结束。
Zhège dìqū de dōngzhòng gōngzuò yǐjing jīběn jiéshù。
The winter planting job has almost been finished in this area.
地窖里有几十斤冬贮大白菜。
Dìjiào lǐ yǒu jǐ shí jīn dōngzhù dàbáicài。
There are dozens of cabbages stored in winter.
即使在冬季，我们也可以吃到新鲜的洞子菜。
Jíshǐ zài dōngjì，wǒmen yě kěyǐ chī dào xīnxiān de dòngzicài。
Even in winter, fresh vegetables are still available because we can plant them in greenhouses.
冬至这一天，下起了鹅毛雪。
Dōngzhì zhè yì tiān，xià qǐ le émáoxuě。
On the Winter Solstice, it snowed heavily.
入冬以来，天气骤冷，感冒的发病率大增。
Rùdōng yǐlái，tiānqì zhòulěng，gǎnmào de fābìnglǜ dàzēng。
As winter comes and the temperature drops sharply, the number of people who get colds increases a lot.
漫天的飞雪，妆扮着冬季的美丽。
Màntiān de fēixuě，zhuāngbànzhe dōngjì de měilì。
The flying snow adds more charm to winter.
由于暖冬，黄河的封河期比往年推迟了一个月。
Yóuyú nuǎndōng，Huáng Hé de fēnghéqī bǐ wǎngnián tuīchí le yígè yuè。
The ice-locked season is a month later then usual due to the warm weather.
冬天空气很干，很容易在碰到导体的时候过电。
Dōngtiān kōngqì hěngān，hěnróngyì zài pèngdào dǎotǐ de shíhou guòdiàn。
It\'s very dry during winter, people get electric shocks easily.
冬天在室外，人们一说话，嘴边就出现一团团哈气。
Dōngtiān zài shìwài，rénmen yì shuōhuà，zuǐbiān jiù chūxiàn yìtuántuán hāqì。
During winter, bodies of air can be seen when people speak.
正值寒冬，有心血管病的老人一定要注意冷暖变化，防止病发。
Zhèngzhí hándōng，yǒu xīnxuèguǎnbìng de lǎorén yídìng yào zhùyì lěngnuǎn biànhuà，fángzhǐ bìngfā。
During the chill of winter, old people with angiocardiopathy should be careful about changes in the temperature in order to prevent disease from reoccurring.
寒星点点布满冬日的夜空。
Hánxīng diǎndiǎn bùmǎn dōngrì de yèkōng。
The winter sky is studded with numerous stars.
你知道黄河在山西的河段冬天什么时候结冰吗？
Nǐ zhīdào Huáng Hé zài Shānxī de héduàn dōngtiān shénme shíhou jiébīng ma?
Do you know when the Shanxi section of the Yellow river begins to freeze?
今年冬天，他家买了一个烘炉。
Jīnnián dōngtiān，tā jiā mǎi le yígè hōnglú。
This winter, his family bought a bakery.
这个读书人真是穷得可怜，冬天只穿着件夹衣。
Zhège dúshūrén zhēnshì qióng de kělián，dōngtiān zhǐ chuān zhe jiàn jiá yī。
The student is so poor that he only wears one lined garment in the cold winter.
他家的羊又啃青了，啃掉的那些可都是越冬小麦啊！
Tā jiā de yáng yòu kěnqīng le，kěndiào de nàxiē kě dōushì yuè dōng xiǎomài a！
Their goats are eating winter wheat again.
牧场准备春天时扩大饲养规模，所以我们在冬天提前修建了两个空栏。
Mùchǎng zhǔnbèi chūntiān shí kuòdà sìyǎng guīmó，suǒyǐ wǒmen zài dōngtiān tíqián xiūjiàn le liǎnggè kōnglán。
The are plans to expand the pasture, so we built two vacant sheds in preparation for winter.
寒冬腊月，外边冷风袭人。
Hándōng làyuè，wàibiān lěngfēng xírén。
In the severe winter, the cold wind outside pricks people.
今年冬天我们一定要做好预防林火的宣传工作。
Jīnnián dōngtiān wǒmen yídìng yào zuòhǎo yùfáng línhuǒ de xuānchuán gōngzuò。
This winter we must fully promote the prevention of forest fires.
她从商店买来了炉具，准备在这过冬。
Tā cóng shāngdiàn mǎilái le lújù，zhǔnbèi zài zhè guòdōng。
She bought a cooker from the store, planning to live here for the winter.
冬天，露宿街头的人都挛曲着身子。
Dōngtiān，lòusù jiētóu de rén dōu luánqū zhe shēnzi。
In winter, people sleeping out in the street all curled themselves up.
天冷了，咱们应该买些煤斤过冬了。
Tiānlěng le，zánmen yīnggāi mǎi xiē méijīn guòdōng le。
It is getting cold. We should buy some coal for the winter.
这年头儿气候太反常了，冬天里气温竟然高达20度！
Zhè niántóur qìhou tài fǎncháng le，dōngtiān lǐ qìwēn jìngrán gāodá èrshí dù！
The climate in recent years has been so abnormal, the temperature in winter even sometimes gets up to 20 Centigrade!
冬天的早晨弥漫着浓雾，能见度只有不到2米。
Dōngtiān de zǎochén mímàn zhe nóngwù，néngjiàndù zhǐyǒu búdào èrmǐ。
The winter morning is permeated with dense mist. Visibility is less than 2 meters.
北方的冬天，吃饭时人们都要喝些暖肚汤。
Běifāng de dōngtiān，chīfàn shí rénmen dōuyào hē xiē nuǎndùtāng。
In the winter, people in the north have some warming soup every dinner.
她很怕冷，每到冬天就爱抱着她的暖水袋。
Tā hěnpà lěng，měi dào dōngtiān jiù ài bào zhe tā de nuǎnshuǐdài。
She is susceptible to cold. She likes to have a hot-water bottle in her arms during the winter.
坐在狗拉的扒犁上在雪地里滑行，是北方冬季里最有趣的运动。
Zuòzài gǒulā de pálí shàng zài xuědì lǐ huáxíng，shì běifāng dōngjì lǐ zuì yǒuqù de yùndòng。
Sleighing over the snow is the most interesting sport in the north in winter.
北方的冬天太冷了，很多人出门都要戴皮帽。
Běifāng de dōngtiān tài lěng le，hěnduōrén chūmén dōuyào dài pímào。
The winter in the north is very cold, many people have to wear fur hats when they go outdoors.
冬天的海深沉而有魄力，颇富奇趣。
Dōngtiān de hǎi shēnchén ér yǒu pòlì，pōfù qíqù。
The ocean in winter is deep and bold, and rich in unusual charm.
我们打算在今年冬天起墙，明年春天完工。
Wǒmen dǎsuàn zài jīnnián dōngtiān qǐqiáng，míngnián chūntiān wángōng。
We plan to start building the walls in winter this year and complete the project next spring.
我打算去趟秋交会，买几件秋冬时装。
Wǒ dǎsuàn qù tàng qiūjiāohuì，mǎi jǐ jiàn qiūdōng shízhuāng。
I plan to go to the autumn commodities fair to buy some autumn and winter clothes.
高山滑雪是我们这里开展冬季旅游的拳头项目。
Gāoshān huáxuě shì wǒmen zhèlǐ kāizhǎn dōngjì lǚyóu de quántóu xiàng mù。
Alpine skiing is the key item of business for us to develop winter tourism.
北京入冬以来经常出现大风天气。
Běijīng rùdōng yǐlái jīngcháng chūxiàn dàfēng tiānqì。
Since the beginning of winter, it has been very windy in Beijing.
每年冬天都会有很多游客来这里观赏塞北的雪景。
Měinián dōngtiān dūhuì yǒu hěnduō yóukè lái zhèlǐ guānshǎng sàiběi de xuějǐng。
Every winter many tourists came here to view, and admire the snow covered view of the north Great Wall.
现在是深冬，一年中最冷的时候，大家一定要注意防寒。
Xiànzài shì shēn dōng，yì nián zhōng zuì lěng de shíhou，dàjiā yídìng yào zhùyì fánghán。
It\'s the depth of winter, the coldest time of the year. Take care to keep yourself warm!
今年冬天西瓜销售的市况很好，明年我们要有计划地进行补充。
Jīnnián dōngtiān xīguā xiāoshòu de shìkuàng hěnhǎo，míngnián wǒmen yào yǒu jìhuà de jìnxíng bǔchōng。
Watermelons are selling well in the market this winter, so we\'ll supply more next year in a planned way.
冬季供暖的标准是：室温不得低于16度。
Dōngjì gōngnuǎn de biāozhǔn shì：shìwēn bùdé dīyú shíliùdù。
The standard for heating in winter: the room temperature should not be lower than 16 degrees centigrade.
入冬以来医院收诊的感冒病人越来越多。
Rùdōng yǐlái yīyuàn shōuzhěn de gǎnmào bìngrén yuèláiyuè duō。
The hospital has taken in and cured more and more patients with colds since the winter.
我国的短道速滑运动员在这次冬运会上取得了优异的成绩。
Wǒ guó de duǎndào sùhuá yùndòngyuán zài zhècì dōngyùnhuì shàng qǔdé le yōuyì de chéngjì。
Our country\'s short-track speed skaters did very well in this winter Olympics.
冬天到了，树叶在凄冷的寒风中萎落了。
Dōngtiān dào le，shùyè zài qīlěng de hánfēng zhōng wěiluò le。
It\'s winter now, and leaves wither and fall in the cold wind.
秋风袭来，带来丝丝凉意，让人感觉冬的脚步近了。
Qiūfēng xílái，dàilái sīsī liángyì，ràng rén gǎnjué dōng de jiǎobùjìn le。
The autumn wind brings coolness, and makes one feel the approaching of winter.
时间太久了，妈妈去年冬天腌制的咸鱼都变味了。
Shíjiān tài jiǔ le，māma qùnián dōngtiān yānzhì de xiányú dōu biànwèi le。
The salted fish made in winter goes bad if it is preserved for too long.
每年冬天，阿玉都会穿妈妈专门为她织的线袜。
Měinián dōngtiān，Ā Yù dōuhuì chuān māma zhuānmén wéi tā zhī de xiànwà。
Every winter, Ah Yu will wear woolen socks made by her mother.
冬天风干物燥，必须小心管理香火，否则易引发火灾。
Dōngtiān fēnggān wùzào，bìxū xiǎoxīn guǎnlǐ xiānghuǒ，fǒuzé yì yǐnfā huǒzāi。
It is dry in winter, you must take charge of the burning joss sticks and watch out for fire.
今年冬天，我们家就靠橡子面生活。
Jīnnián dōngtiān，wǒmen jiā jiù kào xiàng zǐmiàn shēnghuó。
We will live on acorn noodles for the winter this year.
北国的冬天，每家门口都可以看见雪罗汉。
Běiguó de dōngtiān，měijiā ménkǒu dōu kěyǐ kànjiàn xuěluóhàn。
In winter, there are snowmen in front of every house in north China.
冬天妈妈做了很多风味独特的腌菜。
Dōngtiān māma zuò le hěnduō fēngwèi dútè de yāncài。
Mother made a lot of delicious pickles in winter.
冬天吃点羊羹可以祛寒。
Dōngtiān chī diǎn yánggēng kěyǐ qūhán。
Eating some bean flour pastry in winter can dispel colds.
越冬前播下的种子将会在翌年发芽。
Yuèdōng qián bōxià de zhǒng zi jiāng huì zài yìnián fāyá。
The seeds that live through the winter will sprout in the following year.
天气越来越冷了，银鹰都南飞过冬了。
Tiānqì yuèláiyuè lěng le，yínyīng dōu nánfēi guòdōng le。
The weather is getting cold, all silver-eagles have flown to the south to pass the winter.
她在冬天收集了许多雪水，准备夏天用来降暑。
Tā zài dōngtiān shōují le xǔduō xuěshuǐ，zhǔnbèi xiàtiān yònglái jiàngshǔ。
She collected lots of snow water in winter so as to reduce the heat in summer.
我国东北天气太冷，冬天是很难看到雨淞的。
Wǒ guó dōngběi tiānqì tài lěng，dōngtiān shì hěn nán kàndào yǔsōng de。
It is not very cold in the northeast of China so it is hard to see glazed frost in winter.
冬天喝枣茶对身体有益。
Dōngtiān hē zǎochá duì shēntǐ yǒuyì。
Drinking date tea in winter is good for health.
她很喜欢冬瓜盅子的味道。
Tā hěn xǐhuan dōngguā zhōng zǐ de wèidào。
She likes the taste of waxground handleless cups very much.
建筑工人冬天还在徒手搬运砖瓦。
Jiànzhù gōngrén dōngtiān hái zài túshǒu bānyùn zhuānwǎ。
In winter, the construction workers still carry bricks and tiles with their bare hands.
这里的冬天太冷了，一定要及时在发动机冷却水中添加防冻剂。
Zhèlǐ de dōngtiān tài lěng le，yídìng yào jíshí zài fādòngjī lěngquè shuǐ zhōng tiānjiā fángdòngjì。
It\'s too cold here in winter, one must add anti-freezing agent to the engine cooling water in time.
今年冬天比去年冷。
Jīnnián dōngtiān bǐ qùnián lěng。
It is colder this winter than last winter.
初冬
chūdōng
early winter
都到寒冬了，他衣服还穿得很少。
Dōu dào hándōng le，tā yīfu hái chuānde hěnshǎo。
It\'s mid-winter already, but he\'s still lightly dressed.
大冬天他还光着上身。
Dàdōngtiān tā hái guāngzheshàngshēn。
He went bare-chested even in the depths of winter.
时令已交立冬。
Shílìng yǐ jiāo lìdōng.
It\'s already the beginning of winter.
此时正是秋冬之交。
Cǐshí zhèngshì qiūdōng zhī jiāo.
We are just on the cusp between autumn and winter.
冬天，她用暖水袋焐脚。
Dōngtiān，tā yòng nuǎnshuǐdài wù jiǎo。
During winter she uses a hot water bottle to warm her feet up.
到了冬天，某些动物停止了活动，销声匿迹了。
Dàole dōngtiān，mǒuxiē dòngwù tíngzhǐle huódòng，xiāoshēng-nìjì le。
When winter arrives, some animals cease being active and disappear from sight.
入冬以来，这里已经下了5场雪。
Rùdōng yǐlái，zhèlǐ yǐjīng xià le wǔchǎng xuě。
There have been five snowfalls here since the beginning of the winter.
经济寒冬下，如何破解中小企业融资难题？
Jīng jì hán dōng xià，rú hé pò jiě zhōng xiǎo qǐ yè róng zī nán tí？
Under these difficult economic conditions, how do we solve the problem of financing small and medium sized businesses?
加强冬防，保证牲畜安全越冬。
兴修水利，冬闲变冬忙。

哮喘是犯节气的病，入冬以后要特别注意。
正值寒冬。
隆冬寒夜。
冬季需要大批烧锅炉的季节工。
良言一句三冬暖。

冬天越来越近了。

Xióng wèi dōngmián qījiān bǎocún zhīfáng，yīnwèi tā zài gāi qījiān bù chī dōngxi。
熊为冬眠期间保存脂肪，因为它在该期间不吃东西。
Birds migrate in the Winter.
Niǎo\'er zài dōngtiān qiānyí。
鸟儿在冬天迁移。
More fuel is needed during the winter months.
Dōngjì xūyào gèngduō de ránliào。
冬季需要更多的燃料。
They slaughtered their only goat to survive the winter.
Tāmen zǎishāle tāmen wéiyī de yì zhī shānyáng，yǐbiàn dùguò hándōng。
他们宰杀了他们唯一的一只山羊，以便度过寒冬。
We wintered on the Riviera.
Wǒmen zài Lǐwéiāilā guòdōng。
我们在里维埃拉过冬。
I fear the winters in moscow.
Wǒ duì Mòsīkē de dōngtiān gǎndào kǒngjù。
我对莫斯科的冬天感到恐惧。
Female holly trees bear the berries.
Cíxìng dōngqīngshù yǒu jiāngguǒ。
雌性冬青树有浆果。
Bears must eat a lot of food before they hibernate in their caves.
Xióng zài dòngxué zhōng dōngmián zhīqián bìxū chīdiào xǔduō dōngxi。
熊在洞穴中冬眠之前必须吃掉许多东西。
He goes south every winter for the golfing.
Tā měi gè dōngtiān dōu qù nánfāng dǎ Gāo\'ěrfūqiú。
他每个冬天都去南方打高尔夫球。
Only the fittest animals were survivors of the cold winters.
Zhǐyǒu shēntǐ zuì qiángjiàn de dòngwù cáinénggòu áo guò yándōng。
只有身体最强健的动物才能够熬过严冬。
The children love to snowboard in winter.
Háizǐmen xǐhuan zài dōngtiān wán huáxuěbǎn。
孩子们喜欢在冬天玩滑雪板。
Plants from a cold clime travel best in winter.
Láizì hánlěng qìhòu de zhíwù zuì nénggòu shìyìng dōngjì。
来自寒冷气候的植物最能够适应冬季。
The window must be weatherstripped before the cold weather sets in.
Yándōng dàolái zhīqián，wǒmen bìxū wèi chuānghu tiēshàng dàngfēngyǔtiáo。
严冬到来之前，我们必须为窗户贴上档风雨条。
He dreaded the storminess of the north Atlantic in winter.
Tā hàipà běidàxīyáng dōngtiān de fēngbàoqī。
他害怕北大西洋冬天的风暴期。
Winter has set in.
Dōngtiān yǐjīng dàolái le。
冬天已经到来了。
Winter harshened the look of the city.
Dōngtiān shǐ zhè zuò chéngshì kàn qǐlái háowúshēngqì。
冬天使这座城市看起来毫无生气。
At long last the winter was over.
Dōngjì zǒngsuàn guòqù le。
冬季总算过去了。
山洞里水声丁冬，此起彼伏。
Shāndòng lǐ shuǐshēng dīngdōng，cǐqǐ bǐfú。
Water tinkles in the mountain cave and waves are rising over one another.

春夏秋冬
春夏秋冬。
春夏秋冬，四季递变。
春耕夏种，秋收冬藏。

chūdōng

Yuèzhī shì gǔdài xīyù de yígè qiángdà de guójiā。
In ancient times,Yueshi was a big power in the western region .
司马在汉族姓氏里是复姓。
Sīmǎ zài Hànzú xìngshì lǐ shì fùxìng。
司马 (Sīmǎ) is a compound surname among Chinese surnames.
在中国的姓氏中，有单姓和复姓。
Zài Zhōngguó de xìngshì zhōng，yǒu dānxìng hé fùxìng。
In China, there are two kinds of surnames: single-character and double-character.
因为我家的姓氏比较少见，所以就和一个同姓的家族联宗了。
Yīnwéi wǒjiā de xìngshì bǐjiào shǎojiàn，suǒyǐ jiù hé yígè tóngxìng de jiāzú liánzōng le。
Because the clan name of my family is rare, we recognized another family with the same surname to be combined branches of the same clan.
以姓氏笔划为序
yǐ xìngshì bǐhuà wéi xù
arranged in the order of the number of strokes in the surnames
英语姓氏中教名是放在最前面的吗？

Do native English speakers put Christian names at the beginning of their names?
这份名单的排名顺序依据的是姓氏笔画。
Zhè fèn míngdān de páimíng shùnxù yījù de shì xìngshì bǐhuà。
This list of surnames is arranged in the order of the number of strokes.

传说是神农氏教会了人类种植庄稼。

This poem is written by an unknown writer.
不知道作者的作品一般都被称为佚名氏的作品。

We name the author of the works for which we don\'t know  the author &quot;Yiminshi&quot;.

一百摄氏度是水从液态转变为气态的临界温度。
Yìbǎi shèshìdù shì shuǐ cóng yètài zhuǎnbiànwéi qìtài de línjiè wēndù。
100℃ is the critical temperature for water to change from liquid state to gas state.

全球的温度会上升三摄氏度。

当恒星的核心温度达到13亿摄氏度的时候，氖就会通过化学反应变成氧。

Shuǐ zài yìbǎi shèshìdù shí huì fèiténg。
水在100摄氏度时会沸腾。
A critical temperature of water is 100 degrees C--its boiling point at standard atmospheric pressure.

水的临界温度是100摄氏度——即在标准低气压下的沸点。

他看着爱丽丝圆润的易于辨认的字体。
The hollows under her eyes are gone and her cheeks are as chubby as a baby\'s.
Tā yǎnjing xiàmiàn de āoxiàn bújiànle，liǎnjiá xiàng gè yīnghái yíyàng yuánrùn。
她眼睛下面的凹陷不见了，脸颊像个婴孩一样圆润。
She has the most beautiful blue eyes and a voice as smooth as silk.
Tā yǒuzhe měilì de lánsè yǎnjing hé shífēn yuánrùn de sǎngyīn。
她有着美丽的蓝色眼睛和十分圆润的嗓音。

The porcelain is fine and glossy.
叶子细润有光。

The blossoms were kissed by the soft rain.

盛开的鲜花接受霏霏细雨的滋润。
我们应该尽量开发职工的头脑资源，为公司创造利润。

We should try our best to develop our employees\' talents to produce profits for the company.
公司决定从今年的利润中提存一部分用作证券投资。
Gōngsī juédìng cóng jīnnián de lìrùn zhōng tícún yíbùfen yòngzuò zhèngquàn tóuzī。
The company has decided to earmark a portion of this year\'s profits to invest in securities.
投资相等，利润各半
an investment that yielded high profits
产生高额利润的投资
Fundamentals include a company\'s growth, revenues, earnings, management, and capital structure.
Jīběnmiàn bāokuò gōngsī chéngzhǎng、yíngshōu、lìrùn、guǎnlǐ hé zīběnjiégòu。
基本面包括公司成长、营收、利润、管理和资本结构。
The profits from capitalism are redistributed to millions of people through collective investment trusts.
Láizì zìyóumàoyì de lìrùn tōngguò jízhōng tóuzī tuōlāsī chóngxīn fēnpèi gěi shùbǎiwàn tóuzīzhě。
来自自由贸易的利润通过集中投资托拉斯重新分配给数百万投资者。
Most of the profit is shared out among investors at the end of the year.
Niánzhōng shí，zài tóuzīzhě zhōngjiān jiāng dàbùfèn lìrùn jìnxíngle fēnhóng。
年终时，在投资者中间将大部分利润进行了分红。
As profits are made by the business, equity investors are paid their portion of profits.
Yóuyú jīngyíng yínglìle，tóuzīzhě men dédàole tāmen de lìrùn fèn\'é。
由于经营盈利了，投资者们得到了他们的利润份额。

公司今年利润不错，年底分账时咱们应该可以多分些。

We can get more benefits at the end of the year as the company has achieved good profits.
勇于创新使这家企业获得了高额利润。

The enterprise made huge profits because they were bold in blazing new trails.
他嗓子容易发炎，所以随身带着润喉的含片。

His throat easily gets sore, so he takes throat tablets with him all the time.
今年的红盘比往年要低，商家的利润普遍降低了。
Jīnnián de hóngpán bǐ wǎngnián yào dī，shāngjiā de lìrùn pǔbiàn jiàngdī le。

商贩经常报谎价以便获得更高的利润。

His resounding and mellow aria was received with the audience\'s applause.

Dàlǐshí shàng de diāokè qīngrùn ér huálì。

由于营销策略失误，今年商品的利润下滑50%。

Due to the wrong sales strategy, the profit of this year\'s goods dropped by 50%.
街角这家水果店的货架上摆满了鲜润的水果。

The racks in this fruit store are stacked with fresh fruit.
要想大幅度提高利润就必须在技术上下硬功。
Yào xiǎng dàfúdù tígāo lìrùn jiù bìxū zài jìshù shàng xià yìnggōng。
If you want to increase profits by a large margin, you should work hard on technological development.
只要有利可图，奸商就会不择手段去获取利润。
Zhǐyào yǒulì kětú，jiānshāng jiùhuì bùzé shǒuduàn qù huòqǔ lìrùn。
As long as something is profitable, the unscrupulous merchant will use every means in his power to get the profit.
使用这款润滑油对发动机的工作起到了增效的作用。
Shǐyòng zhè kuǎn rùnhuáyóu duì fādòngjī de gōngzuò qǐdào le zēngxiào de zuòyòng。
This lubricating oil increases the work efficiency of the engine.
由于经营不善，公司利润骤降。
Yóuyú jīngyíng búshàn，gōngsī lìrùn zhòujiàng。

My eyes are moist from seeing his memorial in the newspaper.
这个国家的气候为海洋性气候，全年都很湿润。
Zhège guójiā de qìhou wéi hǎiyángxìng qìhou，quánnián dōu hěnshīrùn。
The country is of maritime climate, and is wet all year round.
由于公司今年营销策略得当，利润源源而来。
Yóuyú gōngsī jīnnián yíngxiāo cèlüè dédàng，lìrùn yuányuán érlái。
Thanks to a proper marketing strategy, the company\'s profit comes in a steady stream.
你的汽车该添加润滑油了。
Nǐ de qìchē gāi tiānjiā rùnhuáyóu le。
You need to add lubricant to your car.

chuàngbàn lìrùn 
promoter\'s profit
截留上交利润
jiéliú shàngjiāo lìrùn 
retain profits which ought to be turned over to the state

jù\'é lìrùn
enormous profits

利润(外汇)留成
lìrùn(wàihuì) liúchénɡ
retain a portion of the profits (foreign exchange) brought in
留成利润(外汇)
liúchénɡ lìrùn(wàihuì) 
retained profits (foreign exchange)

利润
lìrùn
profit
由于经营不善，公司的利润逐年递降。
Yóuyú jīngyíng búshàn，gōngsī de lìrùn zhúnián dìjiàng。
The company\'s profits are decreasing year by year due to mismanagement.
公司今年利润不错，年底分账时咱们应该可以多分些。
Gōngsī jīnnián lìrùn búcuò，niándǐ fēnzhàng shí zánmen yīnggāi kěyǐ duō fēn xiē。
We can get more benefits at the end of the year as the company has achieved good profits.
勇于创新使这家企业获得了高额利润。
Yǒngyú chuàngxīn shǐ zhè jiā qǐyè huòdé le gāoé lìrùn。
The enterprise made huge profits because they were bold in blazing new trails.
今年的红盘比往年要低，商家的利润普遍降低了。
Jīnnián de hóngpán bǐ wǎngnián yào dī，shāngjiā de lìrùn pǔbiàn jiàngdī le。
This year the new year quotation was lower than that of  past years, and companies generally gained a reduced profit.
商贩经常报谎价以便获得更高的利润。

Peddleries usually overbid to gain more profits.

The company has decided to earmark a portion of this year\'s profits to invest in securities.
我们应该尽量开发职工的头脑资源，为公司创造利润。

We should try our best to develop our employees\' talents to produce profits for the company.
由于营销策略失误，今年商品的利润下滑50%。

要想大幅度提高利润就必须在技术上下硬功。

只要有利可图，奸商就会不择手段去获取利润。

As long as something is profitable, the unscrupulous merchant will use every means in his power to get the profit.
由于经营不善，公司利润骤降。

由于公司今年营销策略得当，利润源源而来。

Thanks to a proper marketing strategy, the company\'s profit comes in a steady stream.

This year\'s company profits are the same as last year\'s.

他去寺院烧香拜佛，祈求神灵庇佑。

工人们正在修缮这座寺院的大屋顶。

The workers are repairing the roof of the temple.

Zhèzuò sìyuàn de dāngjiā de xiàshān hóngfǎ qù le。

听着寺院里的梵呗，他觉得心静了许多。

He felt calm when listening to the Buddhist service.
每年的四月初八，寺院里总要举行大型佛会。
Měinián de sì yuè chū bā，sìyuàn lǐ zǒngyào jǔxíng dàxíng fóhuì。
A large Buddhist meeting is organized in the temple every eighth day of the fourth lunar month.
请问你这座寺院的戒坛在哪里？
Qǐngwèn nǐ zhèzuò sìyuàn de jiètán zài nǎlǐ？
Can you tell me where the monks\' altar is?
这座寺院是几位居士组织建造的。

她戴的那个护身符，是经过寺院高僧开光的。

The old abbot is the most respected person in the temple.

Sìmiào hòuyuàn de língtǎ，cúnfàng zhe zhèwèi gāosēng de yígǔ。
Inside the pagoda in the backyard of the temple, there lay the remains of the dignitary.

The backyard of the temple is where the monks live.
寺院
终年隐遁在寺院的晨钟暮鼓中。

法门寺
Fǎménsì
the Temple of the Law Gate
近几年，到杭州灵隐寺进香的善男信女真不少。
Jìn jǐ nián，dào Hángzhōu Língyǐn Sì jìnxiāng de shànnánxìnnǚ zhēn bùshǎo。
These years, there has indeed been a large number of devout men and women going on pilgrimages to the Ling Yin Temple in Hangzhou.
少林寺
Shàolínsì
the Shaolin Temple
昨天我们参观了少林寺的大雄宝殿。
Zuótiān wǒmen cānguān le shàolínsì de dàxióng bǎodiàn。
Yesterday, we visited Daxiong temple hall of Shaolin Temple.
他去寺院烧香拜佛，祈求神灵庇佑。
Tā qù sìyuàn shāoxiāng bàifó，qíqiú shénlíng bìyòu。
He went to the temple to pray for the god\'s protection.
一些信徒们跪在串烟弥漫的寺庙里祈求神灵保佑。

Some disciples knelt down and prayed for the gods\' blessings at the temple, which was filled with strings of smoke.
寺院的打鬼仪式就要开始了。
Sìyuàn de dǎguǐ yíshì jiùyào kāishǐ le。
The rite of dancing to exorcise demons will soon be held in the temple.
这个佛寺的大殿建造得真气派！
Zhège fósì de dàdiàn jiànzào de zhēn qìpài！
The main hall of the temple is so imposing!

The head monk of the temple went out to spread Buddhism.
这套刀法是少林寺的高僧传授的。
Zhètào dāofǎ shì shǎolínsì de gāosēng chuánshòu de。
This swordsmanship set is taught by a senior monk at the Shaolin Temple.
寺里的这位住持是得道的高僧。
Sì lǐ de zhèwèi zhùchí shì dédào de gāosēng。
The abbot of this temple is a monk of great achievements in the Tao.
抵近那座高山，可以发现有一座寺庙。
Dǐjìn nà zuò gāoshān，kěyǐ fāxiàn yǒu yízuò sìmiào。
Approaching that mountain, you will find a temple.
这些珍贵的古籍都保存在寺庙的地宫里面。

他看过了地脉，决定在这里建一座寺庙。

白马寺是佛教传入中国后最早的梵刹。

The White Horse Temple was the earliest Buddhist temple to be built after the introduction of Buddhism to China.
每年的四月初八，寺院里总要举行大型佛会。

We saw a tall pagoda before entering the temple.
前些时候，我和母亲观览了五台山的寺庙群。

Earlier, my mother and I visited the group of temples on Wudai Mountain.
在寺庙我们合手祈祷。
Zài sìmiào wǒmen héshǒu qídǎo。
We put our palms together in prayer at the temple.
现在的雍和宫属于黄教的寺庙，香火很旺。
Xiànzài de yōnghégōng shǔyú huángjiào de sìmiào，xiānghuǒ hěnwàng。
Now Yonghegong is a temple belonging to the Yellow Hats, and it is very prosperous.
每逢既望之日他都会去寺庙烧香。
Měiféng jìwàng zhī rì tā dōuhuì qù sìmiào shāoxiāng。
He goes to the temple to burn joss sticks every 15th day of the month.
请问你这座寺院的戒坛在哪里？
Qǐngwèn nǐ zhèzuò sìyuàn de jiètán zài nǎlǐ？

Chuánshuō Zhōngguó zuìzǎo de lǐbàisì shǐjiàn yú Tángcháo。
It is said China\'s earliest mosque was built during the Tang Dynasty.
寺庙的后院就是僧人居住的寮房了。
Sìmiào de hòuyuàn jiùshì sēngrén jūzhù de liáofáng le。
The backyard of the temple is where the monks live.

Inside the pagoda in the backyard of the temple, there lay the remains of the dignitary.
贫僧自幼出家，在少林寺修道。
Pínsēng zì yòu chūjiā，zài shàolínsì xiūdào。
I entered into religion and have practiced doctrine in the Shaolin Temple since my childhood.
今天在清真寺举行了开斋节庆典。
Jīntiān zài qīngzhēnsì jǔxíng le kāizhāijié qìngdiǎn。
There was a Festival of the Fast-Breaking Ceremony in the mosque today.
我国的寺观庙宇很多都是人文历史遗产，要有步骤地进行保护。
Wǒ guó de sìguān miàoyǔ hěnduō dōushì rénwén lìshǐ yíchǎn，yào yǒu bùzhòu de jìnxíng bǎohù。
Most temples in our country are a cultural and historical inheritance, which should be protected gradually.
这座寺庙的香火很旺，前来拜佛许愿的人很多。
Zhèzuò sìmiào de xiānghuǒ hěnwàng，qiánlái bàifó xǔyuàn de rén hěnduō。
There are endless stream of pilgrims in this temple, who come here to worship the gods and pray.
为了欢迎少林寺方丈来访，我们特准备了一桌素筵。
Wèile huānyíng shàolínsì fāngzhàng láifǎng，wǒmen tè zhǔnbèi le yì zhuō sùyàn。
We especially prepared a feast of vegetable dishes to welcome the head of Shaolin Temple.
少林寺塔林是历代高僧长眠的地方，如今成了著名景点。

久闻大名，但恨无缘拜识。
Jiǔwén dàmíng，dàn hèn wúyuán bàishí。
I have long been aware of your exalted name, and I regret never getting a chance to make your acquaintance.
我和酒无缘。
Wǒ hé jiǔ wúyuán。
I never touch the bottle.
猴子性喜攀缘。
Hóuzi xìngxǐ pānyuán。
Monkeys have a natural inclination for climbing.
她最爱寻根究底，寻求事物隐蔽的、内在的缘由。
Tā zuì ài xúngēn jiūdǐ，xúnqiú shìwù yǐnbì de、nèizài de yuányóu。
She liked to get to the root of a matter and find out its hidden and internal causes.
美满姻缘
měimǎn yīnyuán 
a happy marriage; conjugal felicity
我们真有缘，又碰见了。
Wǒmen zhēn yǒuyuán，yòu pèngjiàn le。
It\'s fate for us, we meet again.
你两个结为夫妻，是前世有缘。
Nǐ liǎnggè jiéwèi fūqī，shì qiánshì yǒuyuán。
Your union was predestined from a previous incarnation.
缘何到此？
Yuán hé dào cǐ?
What\'s your reason for coming here?
外缘
wàiyuán
outer fringe (or edge)
这个城市处于沙漠南缘。
Zhège chéngshì chǔyú shāmò nányuán。
This city is located on the southern fringe of the desert.
缘溪而行
yuánxī ér xíng
walk along the stream
咱俩又在一起了，真是有缘分。
Zán liǎ yòu zài yìqǐ le，zhēn shì yǒu yuánfèn。
So we\'re together again. It must be fate.
烟、酒跟我没有缘分。
Yān、jiǔ gēn wǒ méiyǒu yuánfèn。
Smoking and drinking don\'t appeal to me.
他这样生气，不知什么缘故。
Tā zhèyàngshēngqì，bùzhī shénme yuángù。
I wonder what reason he had for getting so angry.
文章缘起
wénzhānɡ yuánqǐ
the origins of literary forms
边缘注水
biānyuán zhùshuǐ 
edgewater flooding
姻缘
yīnyuán
the happy fate which brings lovers together
他们的半世情缘感人至深。
Tāmen de bànshì qíngyuán gǎnrén zhì shēn。
Their love lasting half of their lifetime, which touches people deeply.
红娘传书递柬，帮助张生和崔莺莺成就了姻缘。
Hóngniáng chuánshū dìjiǎn，bāngzhù Zhāng Shēng hé Cuī Yīngyīng chéngjiù le yīnyuán。
The matchmaker\'s letter-delivery helped bring about the union of the lovers, her mistress Yingying and the student Zhang.
他善于利用地缘关系结交朋友。
Tā shànyú lìyòng dìyuán guānxì jiéjiāo péngyou。
He is good at making friends by using regional contacts.
她经常无缘无故诟詈养子，邻居们都看不惯了。
Tā jīngcháng wúyuán wúgù gòulì yǎngzǐ，línjūmen dōu kànbùguàn le。
She constantly abused her adopted son for no reason. Even the neighbors couldn\'t stand it.
此事甚奇，迹象全无，想必是因缘际会，造化弄人。
Cǐshì shènqí，jì xiàng quánwú，xiǎngbì shì yīnyuán jìhuì，zàohuà nòngrén。
It is very strange that no trace can be found. I guess it must be predestinated, we are the sport of faith.
他们两人虽没有血缘关系，但却亲如胶漆。
Tāmen liǎng rén suī méiyǒu xuèyuán guānxì，dàn què qīnrú jiāoqī。
There is no kinship between them, but they two are very close.
竹木制品是绝缘体，具有很好的防导电功能。
Zhúmù zhìpǐn shì juéyuántǐ，jùyǒu hěnhǎo de fáng dǎodiàn gōngnéng。
Things made of bamboo are insulators, which function very well.
时间长了，电线杆上的那些绝缘子也需要检修更换。

After being in use for a long time, the insulators on the electric wire poles should be examined and replaced with new ones.
你俩的结合真是良缘天配。
Nǐ liǎ de jiéhé zhēnshì liángyuán tiānpèi。
Your combination is destined to be good match for marriage.

Wǒ bāng tā lǚxī le shìqing de yuányóu。
I helped him analyze the matter in detail.

Liǎnggèrén méiyuán，bùkěnéng shēnghuó zài yìqǐ。
With no opportunity, two people can not live together.
看来我俩的情缘还没有了结。
Kànlái wǒ liǎ de qíngyuán hái méiyǒu liǎojié。
It seems that the love between us has not fulfilled its course.

张贴标语
zhāngtiē biāoyǔ 
put up slogans (or posters)
张贴布告
zhānɡtiē bùɡào 
paste up a notice
张贴海报
zhānɡtiē hǎibào 
put up posters
张贴通告
zhāngtiē tōnggào 
post a notice
禁止张贴。
Jìnzhǐ zhāngtiē。
Post no bills.
两个公人正在张贴文榜。

张贴通告
zhāngtiē tōnggào 
put up a notice

Nǐ mǒ jiànghu，wǒ lái tiē bùgào。
You smear the wall with paste and I\'ll stick the notice on it.
体贴病人
tǐtiē bìngrén 
show a patient every consideration
他对妻子很体贴。
Tā duì qīzi hěn tǐtiē。
He\'s very considerate of his wife.

tiē yóupiào

tiēshàngjiāobù
stick on a piece of adhesive tape

贴墙站着
tiēqiángzhàn zhe 
be standing against the wall

Zhè háizi jǐnjǐn tiē zài māma shēnbiān。
The child was nestling closely to its mother.

Wǒ měi yuè tiē tā shí kuài qián。

米贴
mǐtiē 
food allowance
一贴膏药
yì tiē gàoyao 
a piece of (medicated) plaster
还有存的料子贴补着用，现在先不买。
Hái yǒu cún de liàozi tiēbǔ zhe yòng，xiànzài xiān bùmǎi。

tiējǐ pénɡyou 
a person one can confide in; bosom friend
贴己钱
tiējǐqián 
private savings of a family member
别尽往自己脸上贴金了。
Bié jìn wǎng zìjǐ liǎnshàng tiējīn le。
Don\'t put feathers in your own cap. or Don\'t go blowing your own trumpet.
那孩子贴近他身边，轻声说了几句话。
Nà háizi tiējìn tā shēnbiān，qīngshēngshuō le jǐ jù huà。
The child nestled up against him and murmured a few words.
这个比喻很贴切。
Zhège bǐyù hěn tiēqiè。
This metaphor is very appropriate.
措词贴切
cuòcí tiēqiè 
aptly worded; well-put

tiēshēn yīfu

tiēshēn yāhuɑn

Zhuómò bùduō，dànshì shífēn tiētí 
brief but very much to the point

Nǐ de huà bùtiētí。

tiēxiànlǜ

wēixiǎn gōngzuò jīntiē

Tā gēnběn méiyǒu xīlián tǐtiē nǚrén de xíguàn。

bǎ bùgào tiēzài xiǎnyǎn de dìfang

Tāmen yòng jiānóngpào gōngjī lìng yī sōu chuán。
他们用加农炮攻击另一艘船。
The mortars burst at the edge of the forest.
Pǎijīpào duìzhe sēnlín de biānyán dìdài kāihuǒ。
迫击炮对着森林的边沿地带开火。
A Red Cross convoy winding along a small country road was hit by mortar bombs.
Yánzhe cūnjiān gōnglù wānyán xíngjìn de hóngshízìhuì de hùwèi chēduì zāodàole pǎijīpào de hōngzhà。
沿着村间公路蜿蜒行进的红十字会的护卫车队遭到了迫击炮的轰炸。
an avalanche of blows
连珠炮似的打击
The striker attacked in the 30th minute, rifling home a super shot from 20 yards away.
Zhuàngzhēn zài dì-sānshí fēnzhōng zhuàngjī，tóuchū pàodàn dào èrshí mǎ kāiwài，
撞针在第三十分钟撞击，投出炮弹到20码开外，
The first shot bounced off the tank\'s turret.
Dì-yī cì shèjī cóng tǎnkèpào tǎ shàng fāshè chūqù。
第一次射击从坦克炮塔上发射出去。
to reply to the enemy\'s fire with a barrage
以一阵排炮回敬敌人的射击
炮火很猛。

There was heavy gunfire.

多管火箭炮
duōguǎn huǒjiànpào
multibarrel (rocket) launcher

Guònián rán yànhuǒ、fàng biānpào yǐjing chéngwéi dāngdì de xíshàng。
It is customary to set off firecrackers and fireworks during the Spring Festival.
摔炮落地的瞬间，火星迸射。

In the eyes of the warmongers, soldiers are nothing but cannon fodder.
震耳欲聋的鞭炮声
zhèn\'ěryùlóng de biānpàoshēng
the deafening noise of firecrackers
炮声在耳边震荡。
大炮的吼声震耳欲聋。
The musical sound as the bomb left the barrel of the mortar still fascinated me.

one shell

fāshè pàodàn

这种炮弹杀伤力很强。

This is a powerful antipersonnel shell.
他没有抵抗住糖衣炮弹的袭击，被犯罪分子拉下了水。
Tā méiyǒu dǐkàng zhù tángyī pàodàn de xíjī，bèi fànzuìfènzǐ lāxià le shuǐ。
He failed to resist the sugarcoated bullet, and was dragged into crime by hardcore criminals.
炮弹自己不会爆炸。

The shell won\'t detonate by itself.

远处传来了炮弹爆炸声，预示着战争即将到来。
Three shells had landed close to a crowd of people.
3颗炮弹在人群附近落下。
The cannon fired from the tank destroyed the building.

to reply to the enemy\'s fire with a barrage

A Regiment will generally have three or four gun batteries under command.
Yí gè tuán yìbān pèibèi sān huò sì páipào dàimìng。
一个团一般配备三或四排炮待命。
切记不要使问题成了堆，才来一个总结，放马后炮。
Qièjì búyào shǐ wèntí chéng le duī，cái lái yígè zǒngjié，fàngmǎhòupào。
Make sure that you don\'t wait until problems pile up before making a reckoning —that would be firing belated shots.
我这个建议也许是马后炮。
Wǒ zhège jiànyì yěxǔ shì mǎhòupào。
It\'s probably already too late for my suggestion to do any good.
他总是爱放马后炮。
Tā zǒngshì ài fàng mǎhòupào.
He\'s always too slow to act.
事后才提建议，这不是马后炮嘛！
Shìhòu cái tíjiànyì，zhè búshì mǎhòupào ma！
Isn\'t it a bit late to be making suggestions after the event?
说话像连珠炮

chatter away like a machine gun

bombard him with questions; fire questions at him

山那边响起了连珠炮

to bombard sb with questions/requests
连珠炮似地向某人提问题/要求

“在很多文章中，”，他连珠带炮地说着，然后突然有点不安地停顿下来。

别总放大炮了，还是说些实在的吧！

他总是张口就放大炮，有时让人很难忍受。

我们从敌人手中又缴了些小钢炮。

We captured some small caliber guns from the enemy again.
在这一年更始之时，家家户户放起了鞭炮。
Zài zhè yìnián gēngshǐ zhī shí，jiājiāhùhù fàngqǐ le biānpào。
Every family sets off fire-crackers at the turn of the new year.
部队装备了一台号炮。
Bùduì zhuāngbèi le yìtái hàopào。
The army installed a signal gun.
抗日影片中，经常能看到中国军人拿着盒子炮。
Kàngrì yǐngpiàn zhōng，jīngcháng néng kàndào Zhōngguó jūnrén ná zhe hézipào。
In films about resisting Japanese aggression, Chinese soldiers are often seen with Mauser pistols.
这架机关炮的转速很高，每分钟可达到５００转。
Zhè jià jīguānpào de zhuànsù hĕn gāo,mĕi fēnzhōng kě dádào 500 zhuàn.
This machine cannon has a high rotating speed reaching 500 revolutions a minute.
小明总是放空炮，每年他都说要努力学习，可每年又都不努力。
Xiǎo Míng zǒngshì fàng kōngpào，měinián tā dōu shuō yào nǔlì xuéxí，kě měinián yòu dōu bùnǔlì。
Xiaoming always makes empty promises. Every year he says that he\'ll work hard, but he doesn\'t.
突然，战场上响了一声冷炮。
Tūrán，zhànchǎng shàng xiǎng le yìshēng lěngpào。
Suddenly, a sporadic cannonball bombed in the battle field.
他看起来蔫蔫的，但偶尔发一句冷炮，就会逗得大家前仰后合。
Tā kànqǐlái niānniān de，dàn ǒuěr fā yíjù lěngpào，jiùhuì dòu de dàjiā qiányǎng hòuhé。
He looks listless, but occasional he will say something unexpected and make others burst out laughing.
当他们开始新的远航时，我们鸣炮欢送了他们。
Dāng tāmen kāishǐ xīn de yuǎnháng shí，wǒmen míngpào huānsòng le tāmen。
Before they took a long voyage, we fired firecrackers to see them off.
帝国主义侵略者总是向被侵略国施展他们的炮舰外交。
Dìguózhǔyì qīnlüèzhě zǒngshì xiàng bèi qīnlüè guó shīzhǎn tāmen de pàojiàn wàijiāo。
Imperialistic aggressors always use gunboat diplomacy to invade countries.
博物馆里的这个炮艇，曾在战争中立过战功。
Bówùguǎn lǐ de zhège pàotǐng，céng zài zhànzhēng zhōng lìguò zhàngōng。
The gunboat in the museum made a great contribution to the war.
春节的时候燃放炮竹，是个古老的民俗。
Chūnjié de shíhou ránfàng pàozhú，shì gè gǔlǎo de mínsú。
It\'s an old custom to set off firecrackers during Spring Festival.
经过炮制以后，青皮就成了一味中药。
Jīngguò pàozhì yǐhòu，qīngpí jiù chéng le yíwèi zhōng yào。
The green orange peel turns into a kind of Chinese traditional medicine after roasting and refining.
他没有抵抗住糖衣炮弹的袭击，被犯罪分子拉下了水。
Tā méiyǒu dǐkàng zhù tángyī pàodàn de xíjī，bèi fànzuìfènzǐ lāxià le shuǐ。
He failed to resist the sugarcoated bullet, and was dragged into crime by hardcore criminals.
这些炮竹经检验是由土药制成的。
Zhèxiē pàozhú jīng jiǎnyàn shì yóu tǔyào zhìchéng de。
Tests show that these fireworks are made of locally produced gunpowder.
过年燃焰火、放鞭炮已经成为当地的习尚。
Guònián rán yànhuǒ、fàng biānpào yǐjing chéngwéi dāngdì de xíshàng。
It is customary to set off firecrackers and fireworks during the Spring Festival.
打仗的时候，小钢炮也可以发挥大作用。

混凝土马路上的冰雪已经被清扫干净。
The thief posed as a chimney sweep to enter the house.

小偷装成烟囱清扫工人进了房子。
He advocated public investment to mop up the savings surplus.

他提倡公共投资以清扫完储蓄盈余。

Tā zhèngzài qīngsǎo chuángxià de huīchén。
她正在清扫床下的灰尘。
They came with big trucks and swept up the ashes.

他们开着几辆大卡车过来清扫灰烬。

老师来时，他们已把打碎的玻璃清扫过了。

清剿、扫荡行动

Zhàndòu shènglìle，zhǐshì háiyào sǎoqīng yìxiē língxīng de dǐkàng。

to clean/tidy/clear up after sb
替某人打扫/整理/清理
I swept and scrubbed, and cleaned the windows.
Wǒ dǎsǎo，cāxǐ，hái qīngxǐle bōli。
我打扫，擦洗，还清洗了玻璃。
She cleared the table, cleaned the cooker and swept the floor.
Tā qīnglǐ le zhuōzi，qīngxǐle chújù bìng sǎole dì。
她清理了桌子，清洗了厨具并扫了地。
He crumbed the table by sweeping them to the floor.
Tā qīngchúle zhuōshàng de miànbāoxiè，bǎ tāmen sǎodàole dìbǎn shàng。
他清除了桌上的面包屑，把它们扫到了地板上。
名誉扫地
míngyù sǎodì
be thoroughly discredited
作弊抄袭的事情一经暴露，立刻使他名誉扫地。
Zuòbì chāoxí de shìqing yìjīng bàolù，lìkè shǐ tā míngyù sǎodì。
The disclosure of cheating, and plagiary discredited him thoroughly.
If someone is under a cloud, they are not trusted or not popular because people think they have done something bad.
一个人如果名誉扫地了，那么他就再不会得到信任，也不再受欢迎，因为所有人都觉得他做了错事。
It is said that he must end his career under a cloud.
据说是因为他在公司名誉扫地，所以才不得不辞职。
He is unpopular and blamed; his name is mud.
Tā bú shòu huānyíng，bèishòu zhǐzé；tā yǐjīng míngyùsǎodì le。
他不受欢迎，备受指责；他已经名誉扫地了。
横扫千军如卷席
他向大家横扫了一眼，才开口讲话。
Tā xiàng dàjiā héngsǎo le yì yǎn，cái kāikǒu jiǎnghuà。
He threw a glance across the room before he started to speak.
横扫一切
héngsǎo yíqiè
sweep everything away; be overwhelming
秋风横扫落叶。
Qiūfēng héngsǎo luòyè。
The autumn wind swept away the fallen leaves.
横扫千军如卷席
横扫一切害人虫。
横扫了大家一眼。
A wave of strikes swept through the country and the government was concerned.
新一轮的罢工横扫了整个国家，政府非常忧虑。
A small tornado passed through this farm and cut across this field.
一场小龙卷风穿过了农场，横扫了田地。
Do not attempt to sweep or hook a solidly planted opponent.
Búyào shìtú héngsǎo huò yòng gōuquán gōngjī yì míng wánqiáng de duìshǒu。
不要试图横扫或用勾拳攻击一名顽强的对手。
The visiting team swept the series.
Kèduì héngsǎole xìlièsài。
客队横扫了系列赛。
屋子打扫得很彻底。
Wūzi dǎsǎo de hěn chèdǐ。
The room has been given a thorough cleaning.
打扫房间
dǎsǎo fángjiān 
clean a room

dǎsǎo lājī 
sweep away rubbish

dǎsǎo zhànchǎng

bǎ yuànzi dǎsǎo gānjìng 
sweep the courtyard clean
屋子里里外外都打扫得很干净。
Wūzi lǐlǐwàiwài dōu dǎsǎo de hěn gānjìng。
The house has been given a thorough cleaning inside and out.
这几位公务员正在打扫卫生。
Zhè jǐ wèi gōngwùyuán zhèngzài dǎsǎo wèishēng。

Wǒmen jīngcháng qù bāngzhù cūn lǐ de gūlǎo dǎsǎo wèishēng，mǎimǐ mǎimiàn。

我们花了一上午时间来打扫厨房。

我不喜欢给荷兰猪打扫粪便。

着凉
zháoliáng
catch cold; catch a chill
最近的天气变幻莫测，一定不要着凉了。
Zuìjìn de tiānqì biànhuàn mòcè，yídìng búyào zháoliáng le。
Due to the recent unpredictable weather, one can easily catch a cold.
杯子里晾着凉白开，渴了就去喝。
Bēizi lǐ liàngzhe liángbáikāi，kě le jiù qù hē。
In the cup there is cool water.  If you are thirsty, you can go and drink it.
奶奶怕宝贝孙子着凉，亲自给他缝了个厚实的屁帘儿。
Nǎinai pà bǎobèi sūnzi zháoliáng，qīnzì gěi tā féng le gè hòushí de pìliánr。
The grandmother feared that her grandson would catch a cold, so she made a piece of thick cloth to tie to his waist with slit pants to cover his bottom.
他在外边站了那么久，肯定会着凉受病的。
Tā zài wàibiān zhàn le nàme jiǔ，kěndìng huì zháoliáng shòubìng de。
He has been standing for so long outside, he must have caught a cold.
我生怕着凉，多盖了条毯子。
Wǒ shēngpà zháoliáng，duō gàile tiáo tǎnzi。
So as not to get cold, I put on another blanket.
小心着凉。
Xiǎoxīn zháoliáng。
Be careful not to get cold.
他这场病的诱因是着了凉。
Tā zhè chǎngbìng de yòuyīn shì zháo le liáng。
His illness was brought on by a chill.
他穿着湿透了的衣服，风一吹，就感到透心凉。
Tā chuān zhe shītòu le de yīfu，fēng yì chuī，jiù gǎndào tòuxīnliáng。
In his soaked clothes, he felt bitterly cold when a blast of wind passed by.
着凉。
这几天着凉了，浑身不得劲儿。

in the shade
在阴凉处

fēngbì de shèhuì
a closed society
中国乒乓球队进行了一个月的封闭式冬训。
Zhōngguó pīngpāngqiú duì jìnxíng le yígèyuè de fēngbìshì dōngxùn。
The China National Table Tennis Team had a month\'s closed training in winter.
奥运会前的最后一次封闭式训练，我国乒乓球队状态良好。
Àoyùnhuì qián de zuìhòu yícì fēngbìshì xùnliàn，wǒguó pīngpāngqiúduì zhuàngtài liánghǎo。
The players of the national table tennis team performed well in the last closed training before the Olympics.
他在理财顾问的建议下，购买了一些封闭性基金。
Tā zài lǐcái gùwèn de jiànyì xià，gòumǎi le yìxiē fēngbìxìng jījīn。
He bought some close-ended funds at the advice of his financial consultant.
这个学校实行的是半军事化封闭式管理。

This school applies semi-military closed management.

The men and women of the CIA must penetrate closed societies and secretive organizations.

The canal was to be closed and emptied for repairs.

该航道将被封闭、排空，以便进行修理。

封闭的车库中充满了尾气。

The hives were boxed up for the summer.

蜂房夏天被木板封闭起来。

企业倒闭
qǐyè dǎobì 
bankruptcy of an enterprise
这家公司欠款数百万，倒闭了。
Zhèjiā gōngsī qiànkuǎn shù bǎi wàn，dǎobì le。
This company was several million yuan in debt and went bankrupt.
只有改辙更张才能救这家濒临倒闭的企业。
Zhǐyǒu gǎizhé gēngzhāng cáinéng jiù zhè jiā bīnlín dǎobì de qǐyè。
Only by changing over to new methods can we save the enterprise from bankruptcy.
这个即将倒闭的企业和经济雄厚的大公司交欢，成功地挽救了自己。
Zhège jíjiāng dǎobì de qǐyè hé jīngjì xiónghòu de dà gōngsī jiāohuān，chénggōng de wǎnjiù le zìjǐ。
The company on the verge of bankruptcy saved itself by building a good relationship with a large prosperous company.
这个工厂在内外交困的情况下倒闭了。
Zhège gōngchǎng zài nèiwài jiāokùn de qíngkuàng xià dǎobì le。
The factory, plagued by difficulties both inside and outside, went bankruptcy
公司倒闭了我们都要面临失业，这就是“皮之不存，毛将焉附”吧！
Gōngsī dǎobì le wǒmen dōuyào miànlín shīyè，zhè jiùshì“pízhībùcún，máojiāngyānfù”ba！
If the company goes bankrupt, we shall lose our jobs. It\'s a typical example of &quot;with the skin gone, what can the hair attach itself to?&quot;.
该公司因经营不善而倒闭清盘。
Gāi gōngsī yīn jīngyíng búshàn ér dǎobì qīngpán。
The company collapsed and went into liquidation because of bad management.
公司快倒闭了，职员们都走了，唯独他留下了。
Gōngsī kuài dǎobì le，zhíyuánmen dōu zǒu le，wéidú tā liúxià le。
The company is on the verge of bankruptcy, all the employees have left except him.
如果大家继续窝里斗，那么这公司早晚是要倒闭的。
Rúguǒ dàjiā jìxù wōlǐdòu，nàme zhè gōngsī zǎowǎn shì yào dǎobì de。
If we continue this internal fighting, the company will close down sooner or later.
这原先是国家一级企业，现在倒闭了。
Zhè yuánxiān shì guójiā yījí qǐyè，xiànzài dǎobì le。
There used to be one of the nation\'s first-level enterprises here, now it has gone bankrupt.
由于周转金不足，房产公司被迫倒闭。
Yóuyú zhōuzhuǎnjīn bùzú，fángchǎn gōngsī bèipò dǎobì。
With an insufficent turnover fund, the real-estate company was forced to declare bankruptcy.
公司倒闭后，只有经理在收拾残局。
Gōngsī dǎobìhòu，zhǐyǒu jīnglǐ zài shōushícánjú。
When the company closed only the manager was left to clear up the mess.

倒闭

qícì，bìxū ràng Yínháng kěyǐ ānquán de dǎobì。

闭上嘴

keep one\'s mouth shut

由于天气恶劣，户外游泳池关闭了。
The doors will shut automatically.
门将自动关闭。
The airport was closed because of the heavy snow storm.
由于暴风雪的影响，机场被迫关闭了。
The train crossing was temporarily closed due to an accident.
火车辙叉处由于发生事故被暂时关闭。
The Cryobiology Laboratory is opening again after the government enforced closure.
低温生物实验室在被政府强令关闭后又将再度开启。
Once the Will Call window closes, unclaimed tickets will not be available.
预定零售窗口一旦关闭，那些没人认领的票就不能使用了。
They closed the local college.
他们关闭了当地的学院
Please ensure that your computer is turned off before leaving the office.
请在离开办公室前确定你的电脑已关闭。
There are occasions when we would like to disable the close button on a dialog or any other window.
有时我们需要禁用对话框或其它任何窗口的关闭按钮。
Some coal mines had to shut down.
有些煤矿不得不关闭。
The westbound carriageway of the motorway is not closed.
朝西面去的车道没有关闭。
His employment of illegal aliens forced the city to shut down his store.
Yóuyú gùyōng fēifǎyímín，tā de diànpù bùdébù bèi guānbì。
由于雇佣非法移民，他的店铺不得不被关闭。
The commercial terminal was closed for maintenance.
Shānggǎng yóuyú wéixiū ér zànshí guānbì。
商港由于维修而暂时关闭。
The windows are down.
Chuānghu bèi guānbì le。
窗户被关闭了。
The draft was accidently closed.
Tōngfēng shèbèi bèi yìwài guānbì le。
通风设备被意外关闭了。
They will close all surplus factories over the next six months.
Tāmen jiāng zài jiēxiàlái de liù gè yuè guānbì suǒyǒu duōyú de gōngchǎng。
他们将在接下来的六个月关闭所有多余的工厂。
I hastily closed the window and restarted the computer.
Wǒ cōngmáng de guānbì diànnǎo chuāngkǒu，chóngxīn qǐdòng jìsuànjī。
我匆忙地关闭电脑窗口，重新启动计算机。
At least half are believed to be switched off by remote control every night.
Wǒmen rènwéi，měi wǎn zhìshǎo bànshù de jīqì huì bèi yuǎnchéng kòngzhìqì guānbì。
我们认为，每晚至少半数的机器会被远程控制器关闭。
The gates into the fields where the cows were grazing were all shut.
Suǒyǒu tōngxiàng nǎiniú chīcǎo de tiányě de mén dōu guānbì le。
所有通向奶牛吃草的田野的门都关闭了。
The sense of crisis was heightened by dramatic closures in the airline industry.
Hángkōngyè xìjùxìng de guānbì jiājùle wēijīyìshí de tígāo。
航空业戏剧性的关闭加剧了危机意识的提高。
The inner gate closed behind the new intake of prisoners.
Nèimén zài xīn yìpī qiúfàn dàolái zhīhòu guānbì le。
内门在新一批囚犯到来之后关闭了。
Lakes and reservoirs may have to be shut during the summer as increasing pollution.
Zài xiàjì wūrǎn zēngjiā shí，yìxiē húpō hé xùshuǐchí bèipò guānbì。
在夏季污染增加时，一些湖泊和蓄水池被迫关闭。
The castle may be closed for brief periods for filming.
Zhè zuò chéngbǎo kěnéng guānbì yí duàn shíjiān yònglái pāishè diànyǐng。
这座城堡可能关闭一段时间用来拍摄电影。
That road has been closed up recently.
Zuìjìn，zhè tiáo lù bèi guānbì le。
最近，这条路被关闭了。
They closed down the propaganda ministry and combed out party offices.
Tāmen guānbìle xuānchuánbù，jīngjiǎnle dǎng de bànshì jīgòu。
他们关闭了宣传部，精简了党的办事机构。
Pat\'s full of plans to lobby against the school closure.

派特对游说阻止学校关闭做足了准备工作。
Half of the primary health clinics have shut down.
Yíbàn yǐshàng de chūjí bǎojiàn zhěnsuǒ yǐ guānbì。
一半以上的初级保健诊所已关闭。
They tend to protect themselves by shutting themselves off from the world.
Tāmen zhǔnbèi tōngguò guānbì zìjǐ de shìjiè lái bǎohù tāmen zìjǐ。
他们准备通过关闭自己的世界来保护他们自己。
We decided to stand out against their decision to close the school.
Wǒmen juédìng jiānjué fǎnduì tāmen guānbì xuéxiào de juédìng。
我们决定坚决反对他们关闭学校的决定。
Sure enough , the alarm was turned off.
Guǒrán， jǐngbào bèi guānbì le。
果然，警报被关闭了。
The door swung to a close.
Zhè dào mén zìdòng guānbì le。
这道门自动关闭了。
The engines were shut down and switched over to emergency control.
Fādòngjī yǐjīng guānbì，zhuǎndàole jǐnjí kòngzhì zhuàngtài。
发动机已经关闭，转到了紧急控制状态。
Warning notices were posted to the effect that the beach was closed.
Jǐnggào yǐjīng tiēle chūlái，dàyì shì shuō hǎitān yǐjīng guānbì。
警告已经贴了出来，大意是说海滩已经关闭。
He trained off in a different direction after the road was closed.
Dàolù guānbì yǐhòu，tā zhuǎn xiàng yí gè bùtóng de fāngxiàng。
道路关闭以后，他转向一个不同的方向。
He switched his phone off before meeting.
Zài huìyì qián，tā guānbìle zìjǐ de shǒujī。
在会议前，他关闭了自己的手机。
He closed in the doors and windows every night.
Tā měi wǎn dōuhuì guānbì ménchuāng。
他每晚都会关闭门窗。

Yèzhǔ dǎsuan bānqiān，guānbì gōngchǎng。
业主打算搬迁，关闭工厂。
The factory went down during the strike.
Gōngchǎng zài bàgōng qījiān guānbì le。
工厂在罢工期间关闭了。
The pakistan government decided to close down madrasas that provided military training for their students.

巴基斯坦政府决定关闭向学生提供军事训练的穆斯林学校。

Tāmen wèi tuō\'érsuǒ de guānbì gǎndào yíhàn。
他们为托儿所的关闭感到遗憾。
We shut off the valve.
Wǒmen guānbìle fámén。
我们关闭了阀门。
Nocturnal plants have flowers that open at night and close by day.
Yèjiānzhíwù de huā zài wǎnshang dǎkāi，zài báitiān guānbì。
夜间植物的花在晚上打开，在白天关闭。
Diurnal flowers are open during the day and closed at night.
Zhòujiānhuā zài báitiān dǎkāi，zài wǎnshang guānbì。
昼间花在白天打开，在晚上关闭。

Gap closed its 10 stores in Germany in 2004.
2004 nián，Gap guānbìle zài Déguó de 10 jiā diànpù。

他的牙关紧闭

闭门
bì mén 
shut the door
闭上眼
bìshàngyǎn 
close one\'s eyes
闭嘴！
Bì zuǐ! 
Hold your tongue! or Shut up!
他笑得闭不上嘴。
Tā xiào de bìbushàng zuǐ。
He just couldn\'t stop laughing.

Dúlìzìzhǔ bìng bú yìwèi zhe bìguānzìshǒu。
Independence does not mean isolation from other countries.
委员会闭会期间
wěiyuánhuì bìhuì qījiān 
when the committee is not in session
闭卷考试
bìjuàn kǎoshì 
closed-book examination (during which examinees are not allowed to use any reference)
飨以闭门羹
xiǎng yǐ bìméngēng 
shut the door in sb.\'s face—refuse to receive sb.
吃闭门羹
chī bìméngēng 
find the door closed on one—be denied a reception

Huìyì yǐ shènglì bìmù。

Tā diē le yì jiāo，bìzhù qì le。
He fell over and almost stopped breathing.

The nurse held her breath and walked quietly towards the patient\'s bed.
鼻孔闭塞
bíkǒng bìsè
with one\'s nose stuffed up
以前这一带交通闭塞。

xiāoxi bìsè
ill-informed
企业倒闭
qǐyè dǎobì 
bankruptcy of an enterprise

yòng là fēngbì píngkǒu
seal a bottle with wax

fēngbì jīchǎng

fēngbì de shèhuì

他在大街上碰见了老师，一闭眼就过去了。

单纯

A simplex word has no affixes and is not part of a compound--like &quot;boy&quot; compared with &quot;boyish&quot; or &quot;house&quot; compared with &quot;houseboat&quot;.
Dānchúncí méiyǒu cízhuì，bú shì fùhécí de yí bùfēn —— rú yǔ“boyish”xiāng bǐjiào de“boy”huòzhě yǔ“houseboat”xiāng bǐjiào de“house”jiùshì dānchúncí。
单纯词没有词缀，不是复合词的一部分——如与“boyish”相比较的“boy”或者与“houseboat”相比较的“house”就是单纯词。

Tā hěn měimào，érqiě chúnzhēn-wúxié。

nà shì gè chúnzhēnniándài。

A simplex word has no affixes and is not part of a compound--like &quot;boy&quot; compared with &quot;boyish&quot; or &quot;house&quot; compared with &quot;houseboat&quot;.
Dānchúncí méiyǒu cízhuì，bú shì fùhécí de yí bùfēn —— rú yǔ“boyish”xiāng bǐjiào de“boy”huòzhě yǔ“houseboat”xiāng bǐjiào de“house”jiùshì dānchúncí。
单纯词没有词缀，不是复合词的一部分——如与“boyish”相比较的“boy”或者与“houseboat”相比较的“house”就是单纯词。

冬天的早晨弥漫着浓雾，能见度只有不到2米。

The winter morning is permeated with dense mist. Visibility is less than 2 meters.

元旦
Yuándàn
New Year\'s Day

元旦
元旦。
元旦和春节之间
元旦放假一天
元旦前夕我们开了联欢会。
元旦献词。
on New Year\'s Day
在元旦那天
十年心血毁于一旦！
Shí nián xīnxuè huǐyúyídàn！
The fruits of ten years\' labours destroyed in one day!
一旦无常万事休。
Yídàn wúchángwànshìxiū。
When death comes, everything is ended.
坏习惯一旦养成，需要很长的时间才能根除。
Huài xíguàn yídàn yǎngchéng，xūyào hěn cháng de shíjiān cái nénggēnchú。
A bad habit once contracted takes a very long time to uproot (or root up).
他们多年相处，一旦分别，不免依依不舍。
Tāmen duōnián xiāngchǔ，yídàn fēnbié，bùmiǎn yīyībùshě。
After being together for years, they can\'t bear to part from each other.
做好准备，一旦有事，马上出动。
Zuòhǎo zhǔnbèi，yídàn yǒushì，mǎshàngchūdòng。
Get prepared so that you can set off immediately if something happens.
新制度一旦产生，便会推动旧制度的崩解。
Xīn zhìdù yídàn chǎnshēng，biàn huì tuīdòng jiù zhìdù de bēngjiě。
The creation of a new system will further the collapse of the old one.
赛场上一旦进攻乏力，那还怎么得分啊！
Sàichǎng shàng yídàn jìngōng fálì，nà hái zěnme défēn a！
If a team is incapable of launching an attack, how can it score in the game?
我们这个工作小组分属两个部门，一旦发生问题，责任很难分清。
Wǒmen zhège gōngzuò xiǎozǔ fēnshǔ liǎnggè bùmén，yīdàn fāshēng wèntí，zérèn hěn nán fēnqīng。
Our group belongs to two separate departments at the same time. If there is a problem, it will be hard to determine whose responsibility it is.
他平时平易近人，可一旦发起脾气来也不是好惹的。
Tā píngshí píngyì jìnrén，kě yídàn fāqǐ píqi lái yě búshì hǎo rě de。

学生一旦违反校纪，就将受到严厉惩处。
Xuésheng yídàn wéifǎn xiàojì，jiù jiāng shòudào yánlì chéngchǔ。
The students will be severely punished if they break school regulations.

旦角儿
旦角
他信誓旦旦的承诺不可信。
Tā xìnshì-dàndàn de chéngnuò bùkěxìn。

震旦纪
zhèndànjì 
the Sinian Period
命在旦夕
mìnɡzàidànxī
be on the verge of death; be dying
天有不测风云，人有旦夕祸福。
Tiānyǒubúcèfēngyún，rényǒudànxīhuòfú。
Storms gather without warning and bad luck befalls men overnight. or In nature there are unexpected storms and in life unpredictable vicissitudes.
生命危在旦夕。
Shēnɡmìnɡ wēizàidànxī。 
Death is expected at any moment.
该城危在旦夕。
Gāi chénɡ wēizàidànxī。 
The city may fall at any moment.
一旦无常万事休。
Yídàn wúchángwànshìxiū。
When death comes, everything is ended.
坏习惯一旦养成，需要很长的时间才能根除。
Huài xíguàn yídàn yǎngchéng，xūyào hěn cháng de shíjiān cái nénggēnchú。
A bad habit once contracted takes a very long time to uproot (or root up).
他们多年相处，一旦分别，不免依依不舍。
Tāmen duōnián xiāngchǔ，yídàn fēnbié，bùmiǎn yīyībùshě。
After being together for years, they can\'t bear to part from each other.
做好准备，一旦有事，马上出动。
Zuòhǎo zhǔnbèi，yídàn yǒushì，mǎshàngchūdòng。
Get prepared so that you can set off immediately if something happens.
通宵达旦
tōngxiāodádàn
all night long; all through the night
元旦
Yuándàn
New Year\'s Day
元旦那天，我和弟弟伴同逛商场。
Yuándàn nàtiān，wǒ hé dìdi bàntóng guàng shāngchǎng。
I went shopping with my younger brother on New Year\'s day.
新制度一旦产生，便会推动旧制度的崩解。
Xīn zhìdù yídàn chǎnshēng，biàn huì tuīdòng jiù zhìdù de bēngjiě。
The creation of a new system will further the collapse of the old one.
彩旦一般都由男性演员来饰演。
Cǎidàn yìbān dōu yóu nánxìng yǎnyuán lái shìyǎn。

隔壁好像有些什么声音，他侧耳谛听。

He listened carefully to the sounds from next door.

neighbour (英)

客厅的墙壁上挂着一幅字，写着“龙腾虎跃”四个草字。
Kètīng de qiángbì shàng guà zhe yìfú zì，xiě zhe “lóngténghǔyuè”sì gè cǎozì。
There is a cursive Chinese character scroll on the living room wall that reads; &quot;Long Teng Hu Yue&quot; (the dragon is jumping and the tiger is leaping).
隔壁音响声音很大，吵扰了老人的休息。
Gébì yīnxiǎng shēngyīn hěndà，chǎorǎo le lǎorén de xiūxi。
The stereo is so loud that it disturbs the old who are having rest.
由于钻孔时用力过猛，他把墙壁穿破了。
Yóuyú zuànkǒng shí yònglì guòměng，tā bǎ qiángbì chuānpò le。
Because he used much strength, he drilled through the wall.
我家的窗机坏了，爸爸决定换个分体式的壁挂机。
Wǒjiā de chuāngjī huài le，bàba juédìng huàn gè fēntǐshì de bìguàjī。
Our window air conditioner is broken, so my father has decided to replace it with a separate hanging air conditioner.
隔壁好像有些什么声音，他侧耳谛听。
Gébì hǎo xiàng yǒuxiē shénme shēngyīn，tā cèěr dìtīng。
He listened carefully to the sounds from next door.
你把电烤炉内壁上的油垢清洗一下。
Nǐ bǎ diànkǎolú nèibì shàng de yóugòu qīngxǐ yíxià。
Please clean the oil on the inside walls of the electric oven.
子弹穿过墙壁，留下了一个洞眼儿。
Zǐdàn chuānguò qiángbì，liúxià le yígè dòngyǎnr。
A bullet went through the wall, leaving a hole on it.
这条山路非常崎岖，旁边就是陡壁悬崖。
Zhè tiáo shānlù fēicháng qíqū，pángbiān jiùshì dǒubì xuányá。
The mountain path is rough and rugged. On one side is a sheer cliff.
大火过后，这里只剩下一片断壁残垣。
Dàhuǒ guòhòu，zhèlǐ zhǐ shèngxià yípiàn duànbìcányuán。
After the fire, there is nothing left except broken walls.
进了二门，就见一面青砖影壁出现在面前。
Jìn le èrmén，jiù jiàn yí miàn qīngzhuān yǐngbì chūxiàn zài miànqián。
After going through the inner gate, I saw a black screen wall in front of me.
我们去戈壁滩探险吧。
Wǒmen qù gēbìtān tànxiǎn ba。
Let\'s explore the desert.
我家的护壁是绿色的。
Wǒjiā de hùbì shì lǜsè de。
The breast wall of my home is green.
在建盖房屋墙壁时对墙面的基底是有要求的。
Zài jiàngài fángwū qiángbì shí duì qiángmiàn de jīdǐ shì yǒu yāoqiú de。
When walls are built, their foundations must meet certain standards
有的峰岭夹峙峡谷自然形成了陡壁深壑。
Yǒu de fēnglǐng jiázhì xiágǔ zìrán xíngchéng le dǒubì shēnhè。
Some peaks and ridges face each other and form deep cliffs and gullies.
隔壁新搬过来一家子，看起来挺好相处的。
Gébì xīn bānguòlái yìjiāzi，kànqǐlái tǐng hǎo xiāngchǔ de。
A new family moved into our neighborhood, they seem to be easy to get along with.
我们要及时坚壁以防敌人侵入。
Wǒmen yào jíshí jiānbì yǐ fáng dírén qīnrù。
We should enhance our defenses to keep off the invading enemy.
我们要把粮食都坚壁起来，绝不能让粮食落在敌人手里。
Wǒmen yào bǎ liángshí dōu jiānbì qǐlái，jué bùnéng ràng liángshí luòzài dírén shǒulǐ。
We shall place food in a cache to prevent  the enemy seizing it.
间壁是间录音室，经常会有歌声传来。
Jiānbì shì jiān lùyīnshì，jīngcháng huì yǒu gēshēng chuánlái。
The next room is a recording room, which often gives off  the sound of singing.
这个品牌是同类产品中最有技术实力的，因而在市场上它已据有半壁江山。
Zhège pǐnpái shì tónglèi chǎnpǐn zhōng zuì yǒu jìshù shílì de，yīnér zài shìchǎng shàng tā yǐ jùyǒu bànbì jiāngshān。
This brand is the most competitive product among all similar products, therefore it occupies half of the market.
借助珂啍版印刷术，我们复制出了几幅完美逼真的敦煌壁画。
Jièzhù kēhēngbǎn yìnshuāshù，wǒmen fùzhì chū le jǐ fú wánměi bīzhēn de dūnhuáng bìhuà。
With the help of collotype printing, we copied several Dunhuang frescoes, which are quite similar to the originals.
成语故事“完壁归赵”中那个主角的身份是个客卿。
Chéngyǔ gùshì“wánbìguīzhào”zhōng nàge zhǔjué de shēnfèn shì gè kèqīng。
The protagonist of the story &quot;Returning the Jade Intact to the State of Zhao&quot; is a person from one feudal state serving in the court of another.
这个剧场的墙壁经过特殊处理，可以更好地拢音。
Zhège jùchǎng de qiángbì jīngguò tèshū chǔlǐ，kěyǐ gèng hǎo de lǒngyīn。
After going through a special technique, the wall of the theater carries sound well.
他面壁三年，终于完成了这部长篇小说。
Tā miànbì sān nián，zhōng yú wánchéng le zhèbù chángpiān xiǎoshuō。
He studied with undivided attention for three years, and finally finished this long novel.

The big tree grows between the cliffs. It is a towering tree.
这是一种藤本植物，它会沿着墙壁生长的。

她家四壁萧然，空空荡荡什么都没有。

Zhōngwén zìmù 
Chinese subtitles (or captions)

Kàn diànyǐng shí wǒ xǐhuan bǎ tā qiēhuàn chéng zhōng wén zìmù。
I like to switch onto Chinese sub-titles when watching movies.
Captions on the screen can give brief information about what they were saying.

屏幕上的字幕为正在进行的演讲提供简要的同步翻译。

带有字幕，这很有帮助。
When the screen font resembles a printed font a document may look approximately the same on the screen as it will when printed.
Rúguǒ píngmù zìtǐ yǔ dǎyìn zìtǐ xiāngxiàng，nàme wénjiàn zài píngmù shàng de xiǎnshì jiù huì yǔqí bèi dǎyìn chūlái de yàngzi dàzhìxiāngtóng。
如果屏幕字体与打印字体相像，那么文件在屏幕上的显示就会与其被打印出来的样子大致相同。

He went over in his mind what happened this morning.
过去的一幕一幕在他的回忆里越发清切了。
Guòqù de yímù yímù zài tā de huíyì lǐ yuèfā qīngqiè le。
Past times become more and more distinct in his memory.
大幕一拉开，观众顿时安静下来。
Dàmù yì lākāi，guānzhòng dùnshí ānjìng xiàlái。
As soon as the curtain rose, the audience quieted down.
在观众热烈掌声中闭幕。
Zài guānzhòng rèliè zhǎngshēng zhōng bìmù。
The curtain fell to the loud applause of the audience.
会议已胜利闭幕。
Huìyì yǐ shènglì bìmù。
The conference has come to a successful close.
学生在为运动会开幕式加紧操演。
Xuéshēngzài wèi yùndònghuì kāimùshì jiājǐn cāoyǎn。
The students are drilling hard for the opening ceremony of the coming sports meet.
幕后操纵
mùhòu cāozònɡ 
manipulate from behind the scenes; pull strings
第二幕第三场
dì\'èr mù dìsān chǎng 
Act II, Scene iii

Night has fallen.

duǎnxiǎo de xùmù

jiēchuān hēimù

Shìzhǎngwèi zhǎnlǎnhuì jiēmù。
The mayor inaugurated the exhibition.

jiūchū mùhòu cāozònɡzhě
uncover (or ferret out) the wirepuller
戏已经开幕了。
Xì yǐjing kāimù le。
The opera has begun.

Zhǎnlǎnhuì míngtiān kāimù。

Dàhuì jīntiān shàngwǔ kāimù le。

Yǒu rén zài qiántái biǎoyǎn，yǒu rén zài mùhòu zhǐhuī。

展览会开幕的日期延迟了。
Zhǎnlǎnhuì kāimù de rìqī yánchí le。
The opening of the exhibition has been postponed.
夜幕降临。
Yèmù jiànglín。
Night has fallen.
她初上荧幕。
Tā chū shàngyíngmù。
This is her TV debut.
一幕难忘的情景，立即在他脑海映现。
Yí mù nánwàng de qíngjǐng，lìjí zài tā nǎohǎi yìngxiàn。
Unforgettable scenes flashed across his mind.
使红军过雪山的场面在银幕上再现

Jīngguò ànfǎng，wǒmen fāxiàn bùshǎo nèimù。
Undercover investigation has brought us quite a lot of secrets.
夜幕降临了，篝火毕剥毕剥地点起来了。
Yèmù jiànglín le，gōuhuǒ bìbō bìbō de diǎn qǐlái le。
As night fell, the needfires were kindled with cracking noise.
看到这感人的一幕，他不由得老泪纵横。
Kàndào zhè gǎnrén de yí mù，tā bùyóudé lǎolèi zònghéng。
Seeing the touching moment he couldn\'t hold back his tears.
今天，全国残疾人运动会落下了帷幕。
Jīntiān，quánguó cánjírén yùndònghuì luòxià le wéimù。
Today was the end of the National Disabled Games.
有时候，他会再次想起那惨烈的一幕。
Yǒu shíhou，tā huì zàicì xiǎngqǐ nà cǎnliè de yí mù。
Sometimes, he would remember that tragic and heroic scene.
想起刚看到的那一幕，他醋劲儿大发。
Xiǎngqǐ gāng kàndào de nà yí mù，tā cùjìnr dàfā。
Thinking about what he had just seen, he was seized with a fit of jealousy.
开幕式上，低年级的同学走在队伍的最前面。
Kāimùshì shàng，dī niánjí de tóngxué zǒu zài duìwu de zuì qiánmiàn。
At the opening ceremony, low-grade students march ahead in the procession.
每天晚上她都端坐在电视前，目不转睛地盯着屏幕。
Měitiān wǎnshàng tā dōu duānzuò zài diànshì qián，mùbùzhuǎnjīng de dīng zhe píngmù。
Every night, she sits upright in front of the television, with her eyes fixing on the screen.
演出之后掌声雷动，演员数次返场谢幕。
Yǎnchū zhīhòu zhǎngshēng léidòng，yǎnyuán shùcì fǎnchǎng xièmù。
The performance won thundering applause and the actors and actresses gave several encores at the request of the audience.
那惊心动魄的一幕不断地在我脑海中复现。
Nà jīngxīndòngpò de yí mù búduàn de zài wǒ nǎohǎi zhōng fùxiàn。
The soul-stirring scene flashes through my mind continuously.
这场宫廷政变的幕后操纵者是当朝的太后。
Zhèchǎng gōngtíng zhèngbiàn de mùhòu cāozòngzhě shì dāngcháo de tàihòu。
This palace coup was secretly controlled by the mother of the present emperor.
这出戏的结幕真令人震撼！
Zhè chū xì de jiémù zhēn lìngrén zhènhàn！
The ending of this play is very shocking.

Kāimùcí de xiězuò yàodiǎn shì：duǎnxiǎo jiǎnjié，biǎodá zhùfú hé xīwàng。
The key points for writing an opening speech are: short and clear, express blessings and hopes.
开幕式上的那个大型团体操表演，盛大而华丽。
Kāimùshì shàng de nàge dàxíng tuántǐcāo biǎoyǎn，shèngdà ér huálì。
The large-scale group calisthenics performance at the opening ceremony was grand and magnificent.
这部科幻电影是适合于宽银幕播放的。
Zhèbù kēhuàn diànyǐng shì shìhéyú kuānyínmù bōfàng de。
This science fiction film lends itself well to wide screen.
领导要求开幕式不要弄得太隆盛。
Lǐngdǎo yāoqiú kāimùshì búyào nòng de tài lóngshèng。
The leader demanded that the opening ceremony not be too grand.
看电影时我喜欢把它切换成中文字幕。
Kàn diànyǐng shí wǒ xǐhuan bǎ tā qiēhuàn chéng zhōng wén zìmù。

我们已经把这个开幕式进行了全程摄象。

Bìmùshì hòu jǔxíng le shòuqí yíshì，zǔwěihuì jiāng àoyùnhuì de huìqí yíshòuyǔ xiàjiè de zhǔbàn chéngshì。

Shuǐmù diànyǐng gāng chūxiàn shí，xīyǐn le xǔduō rén qiánqù guānshǎng。

奥运会的开幕式就是在这座体育场举行的。
Àoyùnhuì de kāimùshì jiùshì zài zhèzuò tǐyùchǎng jǔxíng de。

The gradually falling heavy curtain showed that the live theatre had ended.
赵国正在招幕侠士，准备与强秦对抗。

The Zhao kingdom is recruiting knights to fight against the stronger Qing kingdom.
夏日向晚，幕霞似锦，天空十分美丽。

The summer sky and the rosy clouds look beautiful at dusk.

如果屏幕字体与打印字体相像，那么文件在屏幕上的显示就会与其被打印出来的样子大致相同。

Píngmùbǎohù chéngxù kě fángzhǐ yóuyú guāngliàng hé hēi\'àn qūyù de chángshíjiān xiǎnshì ér duì píngmù zàochéng de sǔnhài。

开幕典礼
kāimùdiǎnlǐ
opening ceremony
开幕词
kāimùcí
opening speech (or address)
开幕词的写作要点是：短小简洁，表达祝福和希望。
Kāimùcí de xiězuò yàodiǎn shì：duǎnxiǎo jiǎnjié，biǎodá zhùfú hé xīwàng。
The key points for writing an opening speech are: short and clear, express blessings and hopes.

对这一友好行动表示赞赏

赞赏
zànshǎng
appreciate; admire

Tā guǒjué de zuòfēng hěn ràng rén zànshǎng。

向某人表示赞赏
to heap praise/criticism on sb
对某人大加赞赏/批评
to salute sb for sth
[fig] 因某事对某人表示赞赏

玩赏风景

enjoy (or admire) the scenery

Wǒmen jǐgè tóngxué jiébàn yóuwán，guānshǎng chūnjǐng。

tànshǎng bù jué
express profuse admiration (for)
叹赏。
他的散文令人击节叹赏

He was awarded a prize for excellence in his studies.
寸功未成，怎好受此赐赏。
Cùngōng wèichéng，zěn hǎo shòu cǐ cìshǎng。
Without any accomplishments, how can I take such a reward?
他办事灵利，很受老板赏识。
Tā bànshì línglì，hěnshòu lǎobǎn shǎngshí。
He is much appreciated by his boss, because he is quick witted when handling affairs.
连连受赏。
备受赞赏
立大功者受重赏。
They have been widely commended for their policy of restraint.
Tāmen yīn tāmen de xiànzhì zhèngcè ér guǎngshòu zànshǎng。
他们因他们的限制政策而广受赞赏。
Criminals must be punished, but people of good character must be rewarded.
Zuìfàn bìxū shòudào chéngfá，ér pǐnxíng duānzhèng de rén bìxū shòudào jiǎngshǎng。
罪犯必须受到惩罚，而品行端正的人必须受到奖赏。
He was unable to make his motion because he couldn\'t get recognition by the chairman.
Tā de tíyì bú bèi cǎinà shì yīnwèi tā bú shòu zhǔxí de shǎngshí。
他的提议不被采纳是因为他不受主席的赏识。
At the end of the day, everyone will receive his just deserts.
最终每个人都将受到应有的赏罚。

赏月
shǎngyuè
enjoy a beautiful full moon
中秋佳节二人对饮赏月。
Zhōngqiū jiājié èr rén duìyǐn shǎngyuè。
On the Mid-Autumn Festival, they sat across from each other drinking.
老夫妻俩回忆起甜蜜的往事，一边赏月一边叙旧。
Lǎofūqī liǎ huíyìqǐ tiánmì de wǎngshì，yìbiān shǎngyuè yìbiān xùjiù。
While appreciating the moon, the couple recounted their happy stories.
八月十五那天大家团坐一堂，吃饭赏月。
Bāyuèshíwǔ nàtiān dàjiā tuánzuò yìtáng，chīfàn shǎngyuè。

晚上老爷们都将去月台赏月。
Wǎnshàng lǎoyemen dōu jiāng qù yuètái shǎngyuè。
Tonight, all the masters will go to the platform to see the moon.
赏月
shǎngyuè
look at the moon
我喜欢独自欣赏荷塘的月色。
Wǒ xǐhuan dúzì xīnshǎng hétáng de yuèsè。
I like enjoying the moonlight beside a lotus pond.
赏月
清秋赏月
中秋赏月。
People celebrate Mid-Autumn Day by eating moon cakes and admiring the moon.
Rénmen chī yuèbing、shǎngyuè yǐ qìngzhù zhōngqiūjié。
人们吃月饼、赏月以庆祝中秋节。
主编很赏识他这篇文章。
Zhǔbiān hěn shǎngshí tā zhèpiān wénzhāng。
The editor in chief thinks highly of this article of his.
这个奴才深得其主子的赏识。
Zhège núcái shēndé qí zhǔzi de shǎngshí。
That flunkey was in his master\'s good graces.
老板认为小王是所有员工中最有才力的，十分赏识他。

The boss regards Junior Wang as the most able member of the team and thinks highly of him.
他很赏识有宏才的人，经常提拔这样的人。
Tā hěnshǎngshí yǒu hóngcái de rén，jīngcháng tíbá zhèyàng de rén。

赏识
他深得领导赏识
老师很赏识他的文章。
人们都赞赏他的胆识和魄力。
His company must appreciate him, or he wouldn\'t rate a yearly raise.
Tā de gōngsī yídìng hěn shǎngshí tā，fǒuzé tā jiù búhuì niánnián zhǎng gōngzī。
他的公司一定很赏识他，否则他就不会年年涨工资。
Those who do not appreciate Kafka\'s work say his style is obscure.
Nàxiē bù shǎngshí Kǎfūkǎ zhùzuò de rén rènwéi tā de fēnggé tài ménglóng。
那些不赏识卡夫卡著作的人认为他的风格太朦胧。

今天天气很好，来公园赏花的人真是满坑满谷。

他根本就没有参与这项工作，居然敢冒功领赏。

Tā gōngzuò qínkǔ，lǎobǎn hěnxīnshǎng tā。
He is hard-working and appreciated by his boss.
清秋正是赏红叶的最佳时节。
Qīngqiū zhèngshì shǎng hóngyè de zuì jiā shíjié。
The best time to enjoy maple leaves is in late autumn.

Tā de shànxíng dédào le fùjìn jūmín de zànshǎng。

In order to arrest the criminal on the run as soon as possible, the police increased the reward offered.
我家的牡丹开花了，欢迎你来我家赏花！

这些珍贵的热带观赏鱼对水温的的变化十分敏感。

Yuányè shǎngdēng de xísú zài Zhōngguó yǐjing yǒu jǐqiān nián de lìshǐ le。
The Chinese custom of seeing the lanterns on the night of the 15th of the 1st lunar month has a history thousands of years old.
晚上老爷们都将去月台赏月。
Wǎnshàng lǎoyemen dōu jiāng qù yuètái shǎngyuè。
Tonight, all the masters will go to the platform to see the moon.

Zài yèwù shàng zhè gǔ zuānjìnr ràng tā dédào le xǔduō lǐngdǎo de zànshǎng。
His spurt of effort for the business has gained him a lot of praise from many leaders.
他在领导面前作势，就是想得到领导的赏识。

He couldn\'t just sit back and watch, he had to speak up.
Tā bù néng zhǐshì xiùshǒu-pángguān，tā bìxū shuō chūlái。
他不能只是袖手旁观，他必须说出来。
We can\'t afford to sit idly by while the children are missing.
Nàxiē háizi bújiànle，wǒmen bù kěnéng xiùshǒu-pángguān。
那些孩子不见了，我们不可能袖手旁观。
They were fighting for their independence and we couldn\'t stand aside.
Tāmen zài wèi zìjǐ de dúlì ér dòuzhēng，wǒmen bù néng zhàn zài yìbiān xiùshǒu-pángguān。
他们在为自己的独立而斗争，我们不能站在一边袖手旁观。

I asked Susan to sew up the rip in my sleeve.
我拜托苏珊把我袖子上的裂口缝好了。

《Hánfēizǐ·Wǔtán》：“chángxiù shànwǔ，duōqián shàngǔ。”tā zài gōngsī yěshì chū lemíng de chángxiù shànwǔ。
In Han Feizi, Wu Du,&quot;Long sleeves help one to dance skifully, and much money helps one to achieve success in business.&quot; He is well known in his company for using tricks to serve himself.

juǎnqǐ xiùzi

一把抓住他的袖子
yì bǎ zhuāzhù tā de xiùzi
seize him by the sleeve
你的袖子扯破了，我给你缀上两针。
Nǐ de xiùzi chěpò le，wǒ gěi nǐ zhuìshàngliǎngzhēn。
Your sleeve\'s torn. I\'ll put in a few stitches for you.
白露以后，就要穿长袖的衣服了。

Every year after Bailu (shortly before or after September 8th), people begin to wear long-sleeved clothes.
我袖子上的墨水斑痕洗不掉了。
Wǒ xiùzi shàng de mòshuǐ bānhén xǐ búdiào le。
The ink mark on my sleeve cannot be washed off.
这件半袖衬衫是他在商场刚买的。

He just bought this short-sleeved shirt in the shopping mall.
她买了一件蝙蝠袖的外套，很漂亮。

She bought a nice dolman sleeved shirt.
今年非常流行紫色的短袖衫。
jīnnián fēicháng liúxíng zǐsè de duǎnxiùshān。

天气冷了，不要再穿短袖了。
Tiānqì lěng le，búyào zài chuān duǎnxiù le。
It\'s getting cold, don\'t wear short-sleeved shirts any more.

她那件罗纹袖口的衣服很好看。
Tā nà jiàn luówén xiùkǒu de yīfu hěnhǎo kàn。
Her coat with screwed sleeves is very beautiful.
清朝的官服都有马蹄袖。
Qīngcháo de guānfú dōu yǒu mǎtíxiù。
All official robes in Qing dynasty had horse-hoof-shaped cuffs.
保洁员的手臂上都戴了红袖箍。
Bǎojiéyuán de shǒubì shàng dōu dài le hóngxiùgū。
All the cleaners wear red sleeve badges around their arms.
衣服的袖管有点大了，最好改一下。
Yīfu de xiùguǎn yǒudiǎn dà le，zuìhǎo gǎi yíxià。
The sleeves of the clothes are a little bit baggy. You\'d better make some alterations to them.
武侠剧里经常有人用袖箭伤人。
Wǔxiájù lǐ jīngcháng yǒurén yòng xiùjiàn shāngrén。
In swordsmen plays, people often hurt others with darts hidden in their sleeves.
瞧你这件衣服的袖头脏的，赶快洗洗。
Qiáo nǐ zhèjiàn yīfu de xiùtóu zāng de，gǎnkuài xǐxǐ。
How dirty the cuff of your sleeve is! Go and wash it at once.

He flicked a tiny piece of cotton off the sleeve of her dress.

海拔四千米 4，000
hǎibá sìqiān mǐ
metres above sea level; at an elevation of 4,000 metres
海拔
hǎibá
height above sea level; elevation
山顶的标石上刻着这座山的海拔高度。
Shāndǐng de biāoshí shàng kè zhe zhèzuò shān de hǎibá gāodù。
The mark stone on the top of the mountain is inscribed with its height above sea water of the mountain.
海拔越高，气压越低，反之亦然。
Hǎibá yuè gāo，qìyā yuè dī，fǎnzhī yìrán。
The higher the altitude, the lower the air pressure is, and vice versa.
海拔
hǎibá
height above sea level

to gain/lose altitude

At this height, a climber can peg out from lack of oxygen.
在这样的海拔,登山运动员可能因缺氧而死亡。

虎口拔牙
这两颗龋齿应该拔掉。也说蛀齿。俗称虫牙。
to extract a tooth
拔牙
to have a tooth out {or} &gt; pulled
[US] 拔牙
The dentist gave her a local anesthetic prior to the extraction.
Yīshēng zài gěi tā bá yá qián duì tā jìnxíngle júbù mázuì。
医生在给她拔牙前对她进行了局部麻醉。
Dentists had no financial incentive to extract teeth.
Bǎ yá bále duì yáyī men láishuō méiyǒu rènhé hǎochù。
把牙拔了对牙医们来说没有任何好处。
The dentist just pulled my tooth.
牙医刚刚给我拔了牙。
to pull a tooth
拔一颗牙齿
The doctor gave me a local when he pulled out my tooth.
Yīshēng bá wǒ de yá shí，gěi wǒ zuòle júbù mázuì。
医生拔我的牙时，给我做了局部麻醉。
She yanked out a loose tooth.
她猛拔出一颗松动了的牙。
The tooth erupted and had to be extracted.
Zhè kē yá chángwāile，bìxū báchū。
这颗牙长歪了，必须拔出。

hǎibá sìqiān mǐ

height above sea level; elevation

hǎibá
