Tā hěnshǎngshí yǒu hóngcái de rén，jīngcháng tíbá zhèyàng de rén。
He appreciates people of extraordinary talents very much, and always elevates such people.
美酒佳酿让多少人沉醉其中，不能自拔。
Měijiǔ jiāniàng ràng duōshǎo rén chénzuì qí zhōng，bùnéng zìbá。
Good wine is irresistible to many people and tempts them to indulge.
他穿着将校呢制的大衣，很是英俊挺拔。
Tā chuān zhe jiàngxiàoní zhì de dàyī，hěnshì yīngjùn tǐngbá。
He looks handsome and upright in a worsted coat.
公园里种了三棵挺拔的金松。
Gōngyuán lǐ zhòng le sān kē tǐngbá de jīnsōng。
There are three tall golden pines in the garden.
这棵百年老松历经了百年风雨依然树身劲拔。
Zhè kē bǎinián lǎosōng lìjīng le bǎinián fēngyǔ yīrán shùshēn jìnbá。
This old pine has undergone extreme weather but still stands tall and straight.
抬头仰望，峻拔的山峰直插到了云里。
Táitóu yǎngwàng，jùnbá de shānfēng zhí chādào le yúnlǐ。
Looking up, the high and steep mountain went directly into the clouds.
这次南极探险之旅，定于下周一开拔。
Zhècì nánjí tànxiǎn zhī lǚ，dìngyú xià zhōuyī kāibá。
The exploration of the South Polar will set off next Monday.
这棵大树生长在悬崖峭壁间，身姿奇拔。
Zhè kē dàshù shēngzhǎng zài xuányá qiàobì jiān，shēnzī qíbá。
The big tree grows between the cliffs. It is a towering tree.
他深陷在失去亲人的痛苦之中，无法自拔。
Tā shēnxiàn zài shīqù qīnrén de tòngkǔ zhī zhōng，wúfǎzìbá。
He couldn\'t disengage himself from the pain of losing his family.
他的公司受困于巨额的债务中，不能自拔。
Tā de gōngsī shòukùn yú jùé de zhàiwù zhōng，bùnéng zìbá。
His company is trapped in huge debt, and can\'t disengage itself from it.
从这里就可以看到远处挺拔高耸的电视塔。
Cóng zhèlǐ jiù kěyǐ kàndào yuǎnchù tǐngbá gāosǒng de diànshìtǎ。
You can see the distant, tall TV tower from here.
解放军战士挺拔的动作是刻苦训练的结果。
Jiěfàngjūn zhànshì tǐngbá de dòngzuò shì kèkǔ xùnliàn de jiéguǒ。
The soldiers look vigorous and forceful partly because of the long-term hard training.
我们荣获女子拔河团体赛第一名。
Wǒmen rónghuò nǚzǐ báhé tuántǐsài dìyī míng。
We were very honored to win first place in the women\'s team tug-of-war competition.
你这么快就得到了提拔，这是从未有过的事。
Nǐ zhème kuài jiù dédào le tíbá，zhèshì cóngwèi yǒuguò de shì。
You got promoted so soon, such a thing has never happened before.
这次选拔赛很重要，你一定要加油啊！
Zhècì xuǎnbásài hěn zhòngyào，nǐ yídìng yào jiāyóu a！
This selective trial is very important. You must do your best!
海拔越高，气压越低，反之亦然。
Hǎibá yuè gāo，qìyā yuè dī，fǎnzhī yìrán。
The higher the altitude, the lower the air pressure is, and vice versa.
他经不住妻子的枕边风，终于答应把他小舅子提拔成院长。
Tā jīngbùzhù qīzǐ de zhěnbiānfēng，zhōng yú dāying bǎ tā xiǎojiùzi tíbá chéng yuàncháng。
He couldn\'t stand his wife\'s pillow talk, and finally agreed to make his brother-in-law the president.
经主创人员的层层选拔，她最终被定为影片的女主角。
Jīng zhǔchuàng rényuán de céngcéng xuǎnbá，tā zuì zhōng bèi dìngwéi yǐngpiàn de nǚzhǔjué。
After a series of selections by the main production staff, she was finally chosen as the heroine of this film.
我拔擢员工向来不拘一格。
Wǒ bázhuó yuángōng xiàng lái bùjūyìgé。
I promote whoever deserves a promotion.
能进入国家队的运动员都是出类拔萃的。

The athletes who play for the national team are among the best.

There were houses on both sides of the river.

他们沿着河岸走了近一英里。

沿着河岸快速回家，它会更快。
The boat skirted the coast.

向敌人左侧迂回
xiàng dírén zuǒcè yūhuí 
outflank the enemy on the left
左 (右)侧
zuǒ（yòu）cè
the left (right) side
从左侧斜过去。
请在您选中项目的左侧&quot;□&quot;内打钩。
大轮船靠泊在码头的左侧。
左侧船帮被撞破
从左侧兜抄过去，切断敌军退路
《春秋》三传中，《左传》侧重于记事。
左右两侧。
The near or nigh horse is the one on the left.
Zuǒcèmǎ jiùshì zài zuǒbiān de mǎ。
左侧马就是在左边的马。
Take away the metal cover and push the last button on the left.
打开金属外壳，然后按左侧最后一个按钮。
I found a dent in the left wing of your car.
我看见你车左侧的翼子板上有块凹痕。
It is the shop to the left of the Bank.
就是银行左侧的那家商店。
it\'s on the left as you go in
在你进入时的左侧
There was a strong light coming from the left.
有一道强光从左侧射来。

颅骨检查正常，磁共振血管造影示左侧大脑后动脉轻度狭窄。
The car went hard left to avoid the deer in the road.

为躲避道路上的那条鹿，这辆车猛地向左侧偏过去。

Guāngxiàn bèi zhéhuí xiǎnshìqì de zuǒcè。
光线被折回显示器的左侧

动物的左边是其左侧。

左 (右)侧
zuǒ（yòu）cè
the left (right) side

靠{或}在右侧

不予批准
bùyǔ pīzhǔn 
not grant approval
不予考虑
bùyǔ kǎolǜ 
refuse to take into consideration; will not consider
不予理睬
bùyǔ lǐcǎi 
ignore; turn a deaf ear to; pay no heed to
不予置评
bùyǔ zhìpíng
give no comment

zhǔnyǔ （bùzhǔn）bǎoshì

Suíjí， wǒmen wéirào zhèngzhì zhǎnkāile yí gè màncháng de tǎolùn。
随即，我们围绕政治展开了一个漫长的讨论。
In October his troops landed on Leyte Island to begin the lengthy campaign.
Tā de bùduì yú shí yuè zài Láitèdǎo dēnglù，suíjí kāishǐ màncháng de zhēngchéng。
他的部队于10月在莱特岛登陆，随即开始漫长的征程。
He was finally laid to rest after a long life.
Zǒuguòle màncháng de rénshēng zhī hòu，tā zuìzhōng háishì rùtǔwéi\'ānle。
走过了漫长的人生之后，他最终还是入土为安了。
Shakespeare\'s tales have been meat and drink to me for many a long evening.
Xǔduō mànmàn chángyè， Shāshìbǐyà de gùshi yǐ chéngwéi wǒ kuàilè de yuánquán。
许多漫漫长夜，莎士比亚的故事已成为我快乐的源泉。
We spent long evenings poring over the map for the fastest route.
Wèile zuì kuàijié de lùxiàn，wǒmen yánjiū dìtú huāfèile hǎo jǐ gè màncháng de yèwǎn。
为了最快捷的路线，我们研究地图花费了好几个漫长的夜晚。
We slept in after the long night.
Jīngguò màncháng de yí yè zhī hòu，wǒmen shuìle gè lǎnjiào。
经过漫长的一夜之后，我们睡了个懒觉。
Billy took to the road again after a long month.
Màncháng de yí gè yuè zhī hòu，Bǐlì yòu chéngwéile liúlàngzhě。
漫长的一个月之后，比利又成为了流浪者。
I was winding down after a long day at work.
Jiéshù màncháng de yì tiān gōngzuò，wǒ kěyǐ fàngsōng yíxià le。
结束漫长的一天工作，我可以放松一下了。
The two countries share a long border.
Zhè liǎng gè guójiā yǒu màncháng de gòngtóng biānjiè。
这两个国家有漫长的共同边界。
She could not cut the long days in the office.
Tā wúfǎ rěnshòu dāizài bàngōngshì lǐ de mànmànchángrì。
她无法忍受呆在办公室里的漫漫长日。
The child yawned during the long performance.
Zhège háizi zài guānkàn màncháng de biǎoyǎn shí búduàn dǎhāqiàn。
这个孩子在观看漫长的表演时不断打哈欠。
She published 25 books during her long career.
Zài tā màncháng de zhíyè shēngyá zhōng，tā chūbǎnle èrshíwǔ běn shū。
在她漫长的职业生涯中，她出版了25本书。
He launched into a long history of the birth of communism, giving credit punctiliously to the work of Marx and Engels.
Tā shēnxìn Mǎkèsī hé Ēngésī de zhùzuò，bìng kāishǐ zhuānxīn yánjiū màncháng de gòngchǎnzhǔyì dànshēngshǐ。
他深信马克思和恩格斯的著作，并开始专心研究漫长的共产主义诞生史。
The modernization of nigeria will be a long process.
Nírìlìyà de xiàndàihuà jiāng shì yí gè màncháng de guòchéng。
尼日利亚的现代化将是一个漫长的过程。
漫步街头
mànbù jiētóu 
stroll along the street
在星光下漫步
zài xīnɡɡuānɡ xià mànbù
go for a walk under the starlight
和心爱的人在雨中漫步，也别有一番意趣。
Hé xīnài de rén zài yǔ zhōng mànbù，yě biéyǒu yì fān yìqù。
Walking in the rain with the one you love is of peculiar interest and charm.
漫步湖畔。
幽径漫步。
漫步街头
棋坛漫步。
to range the woods
在林中漫步(或徘徊)
to rove the woods
在林中漫步
He assigns that he was the first person to walk on the moon.
Tā wàngchēng zìjǐ shì zài yuèqiú shàng mànbù de dì-yī rén。
他妄称自己是在月球上漫步的第一人。
Wandering on, they climbed a hill and came to the woods.
Sìchù mànbùzhe，tāmen páshàngle yí zuò xiǎoshān，láidàole shùlín lǐ。
四处漫步着，他们爬上了一座小山，来到了树林里。
People in swimsuits or shorts and tops strolled on the wide sands.
Rénmen chuānzhe yǒngyī，duǎnkù hé shàngyī zài guǎngkuò de shātān shàng mànbù。
人们穿着泳衣，短裤和上衣在广阔的沙滩上漫步。
The housemate wanders over to the window and surveys the scene.
Shìyǒu zài chuāngbiān mànbù，xīnshǎng měijǐng。
室友在窗边漫步，欣赏美景。
The cattle roam across the prairie.
Niú zài dà Píngyuán shàng mànbù。
牛在大平原上漫步。
They were walking along the beach slowly and deliciously.
Tāmen yúkuài de yánzhe shātān mànmàn de mànbù。
他们愉快地沿着沙滩慢慢地漫步。
Michael Jackson perfected the moonwalk in the 1980s.
Màikè\'ěr·Jiékèxùn zài èrshí shìjì bāshí niándài wánměi yǎnyìle“Yuèqiú mànbù”。
迈克尔·杰克逊在20世纪八十年代完美演绎了“月球漫步”。
They wandered on, aimlessly kicking at the pine cones.
Tāmen jìxù sànbù，mànwúmùdì de tīzhe sōngguǒ。
他们继续散步，漫无目的地踢着松果。
漫不经心地说
mànbùjīngxīn de shuō
speak in an offhand way
看他那漫不经心的样子，能把事情办好么？
Kàn tā nà mànbùjīngxīn de yàngzi，néngbǎ shìqingbànhǎo ma? 
He looks as if he couldn\'t care less, so I doubt he\'ll do a good job.
In spite of the recent rash of problems she has experienced, she looked careless.
尽管最近已经接二连三地犯了很多错误，但她看起来还是那么漫不经心。
Madeleine was toying with her food and looking increasingly bored.
Mǎdélín mànbùjīngxīn de chīzhe dōngxi，kànqǐlái yuèláiyuè bú nàifán。
玛德琳漫不经心的吃着东西，看起来越来越不耐烦。
He drew out the phrase book and flicked through the pages.
Tā tāochū chángyòngyǔ shǒucè,mànbùjīngxīn de fānyuèzhe。
他掏出常用语手册，漫不经心地翻阅着。
He flung away his advice to strangers.
Tā mànbùjīngxīn de gěi mòshēngrén tí jiànyì。
他漫不经心的给陌生人提建议。
He flinged off a question to get her attention.
Tā mànbùjīngxīn de shuōchū yí gè wèntí，lái xīyǐn tā de zhùyì。
他漫不经心地说出一个问题，来吸引她的注意。
I kicked around the chair after I was rejected.
Zāodào jùjué zhī hòu， wǒ mànbùjīngxīn de tīzhe yǐzi。
遭到拒绝之后，我漫不经心地踢着椅子。
I was kicking about the old neighborhood.
Wǒ zài fùjìn mànbùjīngxīn de yóudàngzhe。
我在附近漫不经心地游荡着。
Decisions should not be lightly swept aside.
Zuò juédìng bù yīnggāi mànbùjīngxīn。
做决定不应该漫不经心。
He toyed with the idea of creating a platform for this project.
Tā mànbùjīngxīn de kǎolǜ wèi zhège xiàngmù chuàngjiàn yí gè píngtái。
他漫不经心地考虑为这个项目创建一个平台。
You have already spent a long time toying with the idea of going abroad.
Nǐ yǐ huāfèi tàiduō de shíjiān mànbùjīngxīn de zuómo chūguó de jìhuà。
你已花费太多的时间漫不经心地琢磨出国的计划。
四野都是一眼望不到头的漫漫白雪。
Sìyě dōushì yì yǎn wàngbú dào tóu de mànmàn báixuě。
A boundless expanse of snow stretched out as far as the eye could see.
烟霭漫漫，这是神仙住的地方，你真会享受。
Yānǎi mànmàn，zhè shì shénxiān zhù de dìfāng，nǐ zhēn huì xiǎngshòu。
This misty place is like the residence of an immortal, you do know how to enjoy yourself.
尘烟弥漫
chényān mímàn 
be heavy with smoke and dust

Kōngqì lǐ mímàn zhe méigui de fēnfāng。
The sweet smell of roses fills the air.
山花烂漫
shān huā lànmàn
bright mountain flowers in full bloom
《梁山伯与祝英台》是个很浪漫的爱情故事。
《Liáng Shānbó yǔ Zhù Yīngtái》shìgè hěnlàngmàn de àiqínggùshì。

她的生活很浪漫。
Tā de shēnghuó hěn làngmàn。

a romantic writer (poet)
浪漫主义诗歌
lànɡmàn zhǔyì shīɡē

池塘的水漫出来了。
Chítáng de shuǐ mànchūlái le。

他们虽然是一对柴米夫妻，生活中却也不乏浪漫。

春深的北京已经草木着绿，柳絮漫天了。

Kàndào màntiān fēixuě，tā shīxìng dàfā。
He bursts with poetic sentiment when seeing the snowflakes dance in the air.
连日暴雨使大水有漫过堤围的危险。

Màntiān de fēixuě，zhuāngbànzhe dōngjì de měilì。

Hányè màncháng，dúduì gūdēng。

这是一片河漫滩，村里没有人敢在这里种庄稼。

This is an alluvial flat where no villager dares to plant crops.
由于刮起了沙尘暴，整个城市黄沙漫天。

Because of the sweep of the sandstorm, sand was all over the sky of the entire city.
垒垒的山峦，云雾弥漫，这风景真是迷人。

漫道是这点小事，就是再大的困难我们也要克服。
Màndào shì zhè diǎn xiǎoshì，jiùshì zàidà de kùnnan wǒmen yěyào kèfú。
We should overcome any hard difficulties, let alone this trivial thing.
这个节目的内容就是漫话最近热门的一些话题。
Zhège jiémù de nèiróng jiùshì mànhuà zuìjìn rèmén de yìxiē huàtí。

书信上的字迹已经漫冹，很难辨认了。
Shūxìn shàng de zìjì yǐjing mànfǎ，hěnnán biànrèn le。
The characters on the letter have blurred, and are hard to recognize.
广场上的旗帜在大风中漫卷飘扬。
Guǎngchǎng shàng de qízhì zài dàfēng zhōng mànjuǎn piāoyáng。
The flag on the square is fluttering freely in the strong wind.
水位不断上涨，洪水已经从堤坝上漫流出来了。
Shuǐwèi búduàn shàngzhǎng，hóngshuǐ yǐjing cóng dībà shàng mànliú chūlái le。
The water level has been increasing, and the flood has overflowed over the bank.
这篇文章漫议了京剧发展的现状。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng mànyì le jīngjù fāzhǎn de xiànzhuàng。
This article discusses freely the development of Beijing opera.
澡盆中的水漫溢出来，白白浪费了。
Zǎopén zhōng de shuǐ mànyì chūlái，báibái làngfèi le。
The water in the bathtub overflows and is wasted.
他当时只是随口漫应了我们的请求，能不能帮忙我现在心里也没底。
Tā dāngshí zhǐshì suíkǒu mànyìng le wǒmen de qǐngqiú，néngbunéng bāngmáng wǒ xiànzài xīnlǐ yě méidǐ。
He agreed to our request casually, so I am not sure whether he can give us a hand or not.
漫游生物都有很广阔的生活范围。
Mànyóu shēngwù dōu yǒu hěnguǎngkuò de shēnghuó fànwéi。
Nomadic marine animals have a broad living area.
《漫语长江》这个节目受到了观众的喜爱。
《Mànyǔ Cháng Jiāng》 zhège jiémù shòudào le guānzhòng de xǐ\'ài。
Rambling Speech on the Yangtze River is a program popular with the audience.
一个晚上他漫语不断，不知道是不是睡糊涂了。
Yígè wǎnshàng tā mànyǔ búduàn，bùzhīdào shìbushì shuì hútú le。
He had been saying irrelevant remarks all evening. I’ve no idea whether he fell asleep.
冬天的早晨弥漫着浓雾，能见度只有不到2米。
Dōngtiān de zǎochén mímàn zhe nóngwù，néngjiàndù zhǐyǒu búdào èrmǐ。
The winter morning is permeated with dense mist. Visibility is less than 2 meters.
这些诗歌的风格偏于浪漫主义。
Zhèxiē shīgē de fēnggé piānyú làngmànzhǔyì。
The style of these poems is a bit romantic.
晴岚弥漫开来，我已看不清下山的路。
Qínglán mímàn kāilái，wǒ yǐ kànbùqīng xiàshān de lù。
The smoke and fog in the mountain fill the air, I cannot distinguish the roads down the mountain.
站在山顶上可以看到漫山遍野的山花。
Zhàn zài shāndǐng shàng kěyǐ kàndào mànshānbiànyě de shānhuā。
Standing on the hilltop, you can see beautiful flowers blanketing hill and dale.
虽然我有赔偿你损失的责任，但你也不能狮子大开口漫天要价！
Suīrán wǒ yǒu péicháng nǐ sǔnshī de zérèn，dàn nǐ yě bùnéng shīzi dàkāikǒu màntiān yàojià！
Although I have the responsibility to compensate you for your loss, you can\'t go too far in demanding money!
这个小姑娘天真烂漫，十分可爱。

浪漫主义作家(诗人)
làngmànzhǔyì zuòjiā（shīrén）
a romantic writer (poet)
浪漫主义诗歌
lànɡmàn zhǔyì shīɡē
romantic poetry
这些诗歌的风格偏于浪漫主义。
Zhèxiē shīgē de fēnggé piānyú làngmànzhǔyì。
The style of these poems is a bit romantic.
浪漫主义
Làngmànzhǔyì
romanticism
当时作家中有一派是主张现实主义和浪漫主义相结合的。
a born-again romantic
激烈主张浪漫主义学派的人
romanticism as contrasted with classicism
浪漫主义与古典主义相较
The romantic gets trapped in his or her own small world.
Làngmànzhǔyìzhě bèi júxiàn yú tā zìjǐ de xiǎo shìjiè。
浪漫主义者被局限于他自己的小世界。

Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai is a very romantic love story.
她的生活很浪漫。
Tā de shēnghuó hěn làngmàn。
She leads a loose life.

làngmànzhǔyì zuòjiā（shīrén）
a romantic writer (poet)
浪漫主义诗歌
lànɡmàn zhǔyì shīɡē
romantic poetry

浪漫主义
Làngmànzhǔyì
romanticism

romanticism as contrasted with classicism
浪漫主义与古典主义相较

Xǔduō mànmàn chángyè， Shāshìbǐyà de gùshi yǐ chéngwéi wǒ kuàilè de yuánquán。
许多漫漫长夜，莎士比亚的故事已成为我快乐的源泉。
高悬在旗杆上的彩幡迎风飘舞
我生病了，身体虚飘飘的。
Wǒ shēngbìng le，shēntǐ xūpiāopiāo de。
I am sick and feel very weak and wobbly.
病了几天，走起路来虚飘飘的。
四海飘零，无容身之地。
Sìhǎi piāolíng，wú róngshēnzhīdì。
I drifted from one place to another with nowhere to rest.
垂柳轻飘飘地摆动。
Chuíliǔ qīngpiāopiāo de bǎidòng。
Willow branches were swaying lightly.
她高兴地走着，脚底下轻飘飘的。
Tā gāoxìng de zǒu zhe，jiǎodǐxià qīngpiāopiāo de。
She tripped joyfully along, as if treading on air.
这种酒很醉人，喝一点就有轻飘飘的感觉。
Zhèzhǒng jiǔ hěn zuìrén，hē yìdiǎn jiù yǒu qīngpiāopiāo de gǎnjué。
This wine makes people drunk easily. They feel as if treading on air after drinking just a little of it.
一头轻飘飘的秀发
两只脚轻飘飘的，走路不稳。
她走路一阵风，轻飘飘的。
卸下了这个压在她心上十多年的沉重负担，她感到浑身轻飘飘的。

Chéngtóu piāoyáng zhe hóngqí。
Red flags are flying on top of the city wall.

Dàjiēxiǎo xiàng cǎiqí piāoyáng。

The Five-Star Red Flag flies high above Tian\'anmen Square.

On the city wall, there is a big flag flying.
广场上的旗帜在大风中漫卷飘扬。
Guǎngchǎng shàng de qízhì zài dàfēng zhōng mànjuǎn piāoyáng。
The flag on the square is fluttering freely in the strong wind.
他们看到战旗飘扬，知道他们胜利了。

她的长发被海风吹得狂乱飘舞。

The blood-stained flag is flowing in the wind.
她穿着柔姿纱的裙子翩翩起舞，显得格外轻盈飘逸。

飘忽不定
piāohūbúdìnɡ

an errant wind
飘忽不定的风

She gazed into the distance, the clouds in the sky flying away.

fleecy snow
轻飘飘的雪花

He was so happy it was like he was walking on air.
Tā fēicháng kāixīn，dōu yǒuxiē piāopiāorán le。
他非常开心，都有些飘飘然了。
an errant wind
飘忽不定的风

find oneself in an isolated position

isolated and cut off from help

ɡūlì dírén

陷入完全孤立的境地
xiànrù wánquán gūlì de jìngdì
land oneself in utter isolation
孤立地看，每一个情节都很平淡，连缀在一起，就有趣了。
Gūlì de kàn，měi yígè qíngjié dōu hěn píngdàn，liánzhuì zài yìqǐ，jiù yǒuqù le。

xiànyú ɡūlì
find oneself isolated

为孤老户组织助耕队
wèi gūlǎohù zǔzhī zhùgēngduì 
organize farm aid for the aged and those who live alone
我们经常去帮助村里的孤老打扫卫生，买米买面。
Wǒmen jīngcháng qù bāngzhù cūn lǐ de gūlǎo dǎsǎo wèishēng，mǎimǐ mǎimiàn。
We often go and help lonely old people do the cleaning and buy rice and flour for them.
这次的队日活动是去养老院探望孤寡老人。
Zhècì de duìrì huódòng shì qù yǎnglǎoyuàn tànwàng gūguǎ lǎorén。
Our collective activity this time is go and visit the elderly in a nursing home.
家里只剩下她一个孤寡老婆儿。

The old woman is the only one left in the family.

她这次的竞赛成绩很好，没有孤负老师对她的希望。

As a civilian policeman, he always thinks about the old people with no family that live in his district.
这个辖区的民警特别关心孤寡老人的寒暖，经常来看望他们，帮他们解决困难。

The police in these districts are very concerned about the life of elderly without children.  They visit them frequently, and solve problems for them.
这孤苦的老人终于找到了失散多年的儿子。

This lonely and helpless old man finally found the son that he had lost for many years.
这位老人很孤单，没有人来看望。

The old man is lonely, and never has any visitors.

Tā yòng àilián de mùguāng kàn zhe nàxiē gū\'ér。
She looked at the orphans with love and sympathy.
他对那个孤儿起了恻隐之心。
Tā duì nàge gū\'ér qǐ le cèyǐnzhīxīn。
His heart went out to the orphan.
孤峰
gūfēng
a solitary peak
她一人把那三个孤儿抚养成人。
Tā yì rén bǎ nà sāngè gū\'ér fǔyǎngchéngrén。
She brought up the three orphans all by herself.
孤雁
ɡū yàn
a solitary wild goose
去掉孤傲习气
qùdiào ɡū\'ào xíqì
rid oneself of aloofness and arrogance
孤残儿童
ɡū cán értónɡ
orphaned and disabled children
感到孤单
gǎndào gūdān
feel lonely
力量孤单
lìlianggūdān
weak and helpless
孤胆英雄
ɡūdǎn yīnɡxiónɡ
a lone fighter
过着孤独的生活
guò zhe gūdú de shēnghuó
live in solitude
同学们都回家去了，剩下自己一个人不免感到孤独、烦闷。
Tóngxuémen dōu huíjiā qù le，shèngxià zìjǐ yígèrén bùmiǎn gǎn dào gūdú、fánmèn。
The other students have all gone home, leaving me here all alone, and I can\'t help feeling lonely and depressed.
家里只剩下她一个孤寡老婆儿。
Jiā lǐ zhǐ shèngxià tā yígè gū guǎ lǎopór。
The old woman is the only one left in the family.
处境孤立
chǔjìng gūlì
find oneself in an isolated position
孤立无援
gūlì wú yuán
isolated and cut off from help
任何事物都不是孤立地存在着的。
Rènhé shìwù dōu búshì gūlì de cúnzài zhe de。
Nothing exists in isolation.
孤立敌人
ɡūlì dírén
isolate the enemy
性情孤僻
xìnɡqínɡ ɡūpì
of an uncommunicative and eccentric disposition
孤身前往
ɡūshēn qiánwǎnɡ
go there alone
他哥哥去世后，家里只剩下他孤身一人了。
Tā gēge qùshì hòu，jiā lǐ zhǐ shèngxià tā gūshēn yì rén le。
After the death of his brother, he was the only one left in the family.
敌人龟缩在几个孤立的据点里。
Dírén guī suō zài jǐgè gūlì de jùdiǎn lǐ。
The enemy was holed up in a few isolated strongholds.
陷入完全孤立的境地
xiànrù wánquán gūlì de jìngdì
land oneself in utter isolation
这位老人很孤单，没有人来看望。
Zhèwèi lǎorén hěn gūdān，méiyǒu rén lái kànwàng。
The old man is lonely, and never has any visitors.
困守孤城
kùnshǒu ɡūchénɡ
be entrenched in a beseiged city
孤立地看，每一个情节都很平淡，连缀在一起，就有趣了。
Gūlì de kàn，měi yígè qíngjié dōu hěn píngdàn，liánzhuì zài yìqǐ，jiù yǒuqù le。
When taken separately, each of the episodes is rather dull, but when linked together, they\'re very interesting.
他性情孤傲，落落寡合。
Tā xìngqínggū\'ào，luòluòguǎhé。
He is proud and arrogant, holding himself aloof from the others.
南面称孤
nánmiàn chēnggū
face south and call oneself the Lonely One—become a ruler
收养孤儿
shōuyǎng gū\'ér
adopt an orphan
无依无靠的孤儿
wúyīwúkào de gū\'ér 
a helpless orphan
陷于孤立
xiànyú ɡūlì
find oneself isolated
震灾中失去父母的孤儿
zhènzāi zhōng shīqù fùmǔ de gū\'ér 
children orphaned in the earthquake
为孤老户组织助耕队
wèi gūlǎohù zǔzhī zhùgēngduì 
organize farm aid for the aged and those who live alone
鳏寡孤独
guānguǎgūdú
widowers, widows, orphans and the childless—those who have no kith and kin and cannot support themselves
孤儿
gū\'ér
a fatherless child
秋风悲号孤雁低，长天连衰草。
Qiūfēng bēiháo gūyàn dī，chángtiān lián shuāicǎo。
Everything is old and worn. Even the wind seems to be whimpering.
孤帆远景碧空尽，唯见长江天际流。
Gūfān yuǎnjǐng bìkōngjìn，wéijiàn Chǎná Jiāng tiānjì liú。
The sail is lost in the boundless sky, where the only thing that one can see is the flowing of the Yangzi river.
村长带着几个人为村里的孤寡老人代耕田地。
Cūnzhǎng dài zhe jǐgè rén wèi cūn lǐ de gūguǎ lǎorén dàigēng tiándì。
The village head led several farmers to plough for the heirless elderly.
这次的队日活动是去养老院探望孤寡老人。
Zhècì de duìrì huódòng shì qù yǎnglǎoyuàn tànwàng gūguǎ lǎorén。
Our collective activity this time is go and visit the elderly in a nursing home.
刚刚别离老友，我顿觉孤单。
Gānggāng biélí lǎoyǒu，wǒ dùnjué gūdān。
Moments after I said goodbye to my old friend, a sudden loneliness hit me.
这些孤儿在福利院里受到了无微不至的关怀。
Zhèxiē gū\'ér zài fúlìyuàn lǐ shòudào le wúwēibùzhì de guānhuái。
These orphans have received good care in the orphanage.
这座孤城估计也坚守不了多久了。
Zhèzuò gūchéng gūjì yě jiānshǒu bùliǎo duōjiǔ le。
This isolated city may not remain for too long.
他从小生活在这座孤城，不知道外面的世界是什么样。
Tā cóng xiǎo shēnghuó zài zhèzuò gūchéng，bùzhīdào wàimiàn de shìjiè shì shénmeyàng。
He has been living in this isolated city since he was little and has no idea about what it is like outside.
孤雌生殖有偶发性、经常性、周期性三种类型。
Gūcí shēngzhí yǒu ǒufāxìng、jīngchángxìng、zhōuqīxìng sān zhǒng lèixíng。
Apomixes is divided into three types, including sporadic, constant and periodic.
他独对孤灯，悲伤不已。
Tā dúduì gūdēng,bēishāng bùyǐ.
Facing the lamp alone, he was in deep sorrow.
人家孤儿寡母的不容易，咱应该多帮帮他们。
Rénjiā gū\'ér guǎmǔ de bùróngyì，zán yīnggāi duō bāngbāng tāmen。
Life must be hard for the widow and her child. We should help them more often.
他从小在孤儿院长大，从来不知亲生父母是谁。
Tā cóng xiǎo zài gū\'éryuàn zhǎngdà，cónglái bùzhī qīnshēng fùmǔ shì shéi。
He grew up in an orphanage and has no idea who his parents are.
前面是一座孤峰，至今没有人攀登上去。
Qiánmiàn shì yízuò gūfēng，zhìjīn méiyǒu rén pāndēng shàngqù。
Until now, no one has reached the top of the isolated peak in front of us.
她这次的竞赛成绩很好，没有孤负老师对她的希望。
Tā zhè cì de jìngsài chéngjì hěnhǎo，méiyǒu gūfù lǎoshī duì tā de xīwàng。
She hasn\'t let down the teacher\'s expectations for her and has done very well in this competition.
他的孤高自傲实在让人讨厌。
Tā de gūgāo zìào shízai ràng rén tǎoyàn。
His arrogance is so annoying.
同宿舍的其他人都已放弃考研，就剩我一人孤军奋战。
Tóng sùshè de qítārén dōu yǐ fàngqì kǎoyán，jiù shèng wǒ yì rén gūjūn fènzhàn。
All the others in my dorm have given up on preparing for the postgraduate entrance exams, leaving me to fight the battle alone.
这孤苦的老人终于找到了失散多年的儿子。
Zhè gūkǔ de lǎorén zhōng yú zhǎodào le shīsàn duōnián de érzi。
This lonely and helpless old man finally found the son that he had lost for many years.
我们经常去帮助村里的孤老打扫卫生，买米买面。
Wǒmen jīngcháng qù bāngzhù cūn lǐ de gūlǎo dǎsǎo wèishēng，mǎimǐ mǎimiàn。
We often go and help lonely old people do the cleaning and buy rice and flour for them.
陷入困境的她孤立无援，只能靠自己了。
Xiànrù kùnjìng de tā gūlì wúyuán，zhǐnéng kào zìjǐ le。
Being caught in a dilemma, she is cut off from help and has to rely on herself.
这个孤女已经找到了收养她的人家。
Zhège gūnǚ yǐjing zhǎodào le shōuyǎng tā de rénjiā。
This orphan girl has found a family that would like to adopt her.
他们孤孀相依为命，生活过得很艰难。
Tāmen gūshuāng xiāngyīwéimìng，shēnghuó guò de hěnjiānnán。
This widow and her child depend on each other for survival, life is really hard for them.
她年纪轻轻就失去丈夫，到现在已经是40年的孤孀了。
Tā niánjì qīngqīng jiù shīqù zhàngfū，dào xiànzài yǐjing shì sìshínián de gūshuāng le。
Her husband died when she was young. Now she has been a widow for 40 years.
孤雁哀鸣，他心中也一阵凄凉。
Gūyàn āimíng，tā xīn zhōng yě yízhèn qīliáng。
Hearing the wail of one lonely wild goose, he suddenly sensed a thrill of desolation in his heart.
我们一定要保护这个孤证，不能再有任何闪失。
Wǒmen yídìng yào bǎohù zhège gūzhèng，bùnéng zài yǒu rènhé shǎnshī。
We must protect the only proof, nothing can go wrong any more.
他们孤儿寡母的生活实在不容易，我们应该帮助一下他们。
Tāmen gū\'ér guǎmǔ de shēnghuó shízai bùróngyì，wǒmen yīnggāi bāngzhù yíxià tāmen。
The life of the widow and her children is so hard, we should offer them some help.
他是个民警，时常挂怀着自己辖区的孤寡老人。
Tā shì gè mínjǐng，shícháng guàhuái zhe zìjǐ xiáqū de gūguǎ lǎorén。
As a civilian policeman, he always thinks about the old people with no family that live in his district.
这个辖区的民警特别关心孤寡老人的寒暖，经常来看望他们，帮他们解决困难。
Zhège xiáqū de mínjǐng tèbié guānxīn gūguǎ lǎorén de hánnuǎn，jīngcháng lái kànwàng tāmen，bāng tāmen jiějué kùnnan。
The police in these districts are very concerned about the life of elderly without children.  They visit them frequently, and solve problems for them.
寒夜漫长，独对孤灯。
Hányè màncháng，dúduì gūdēng。
I stayed alone during the endless winter night.
那个孤儿被送到一所教会学校上学。
Nàge gū\'ér bèi sòngdào yìsuǒ jiàohuì xuéxiào shàngxué。
That orphan was sent to a missionary school for education.
这位老人的儿女都在国外，老人孑立一人，生活很孤单。
Zhèwèi lǎorén de érnǚ dōu zài guówài，lǎorén jiélì yì rén，shēnghuó hěngūdān。
Since his children are all abroad, the old men leads a lonely life.
他冷孤丁地从黑处蹦了出来，吓了我一大跳。
Tā lěnggūdīng de cóng hēichù bèng le chūlái，xià le wǒ yí dà tiào。
He jumped out from the dark suddenly, which frightened me badly.
他从小孤苦零丁，孑然一身。
Tā cóng xiǎo gūkǔ língdīng，jiérán yìshēn。
He has been living a solitary and poor life since he was young.
她经常为自己孤苦的命运暗自弹泪。
Tā jīngcháng wèi zìjǐ gūkǔ de mìngyùn ànzì tánlèi。
Tears comes into her eyes when she thinks of her own hard lot.
除了孤独，一个人在岛上的生活倒也萧然。
Chúle gūdú，yígèrén zài dǎo shàng de shēnghuó dàoyě xiāorán。
Apart from loneliness, there is nothing unpleasant about living on an island alone.
无法排遣的萧疏让他感觉无比孤单。
Wúfǎ páiqiǎn de xiāoshū ràng tā gǎnjué wúbǐ gūdān。
He couldn\'t dispel his loneliness and felt very lonesome.
深夜，她一个人走在街头，越发显得身单影孤。
Shēnyè，tā yígèrén zǒu zài jiētóu，yuè fā xiǎnde shēndān yǐnggū。
Late at night she walked alone in the street, appearing even more lonely and solitary.
生活在单亲家庭的她性格变得越来越孤僻。
Shēnghuó zài dānqīnjiātíng de tā xìnggé biànde yuèláiyuè gūpì。
小李为保育院的孤儿捐赠了些学习用品。
Xiǎo Lǐ wèi bǎoyùyuàn de gū\'ér juānzèng le xiē xuéxí yòngpǐn。
Xiaoli donated some stationary to the orphans in a child care center.
老人无儿无女，只能孤单单地度过残年。
Lǎorén wú\'érwúnǚ，zhǐnéng gūdāndānde dùguòcánnián。
The old man had no children, and lived out his final years in loneliness.
他身处他乡，倍感孤独。
Tā shēnchǔtāxiāng，bèigǎn gūdú。
When he\'s away from home he feels twice as lonely.
工党在该选区势力孤单。
Gōngdǎng zài gāixuǎnqū shìlìgūdān。
Support for the Labour Party is pretty weak in this constituency.
他时常感到孤单。
Tā shícháng gǎndàogūdān。
He often feels lonely.
这个案件绝对不是孤立的。
Zhège ànjiàn juéduì búshì gūlìde。
This is definitely not an isolated case.
他从不做孤注一掷的事。
Tā cóngbúzuò gūzhùyízhìde shì。
He never puts all his eggs in one basket.
他和女朋友分手后很孤独—活该！
Tā hé nǚpéngyǒu fēnshǒu hòu hěn gūdú — huógāi！
He has been lonely after breaking up with his girlfriend – serves him right!

to have or get one\'s own way
为所欲为；想怎样就怎样；一意孤行
She is comfortable, yet lonely.
她很舒服，不过很孤独。
Originally, the charity was set up to help orphans in urban areas.
最开始，这个慈善机构成立的目的是帮助城市里的孤儿。
I left the orphanage I grew up in at the age of 18.
我是在孤儿院长大的，十八岁时我离开了那儿。
I found my dog alone and sick right behind my building.
我发现我的狗孤零零地躺在我家楼后，而且还病怏怏的。
You know Peter is an orphan. He has no parents behind him. We have to help him.
你知道彼特是个孤儿，他没有父母的支持，我们得帮助他。
The last beach of the bay is solitary and peaceful.
海湾上的最后一片沙滩孤寂而宁静。
He left all his money to the orphanage.
他把自己所有的钱都留给了孤儿院。
The loneliness got him down when she moved to China.
她搬到中国后，他就变得孤独忧郁了。

I could see she was lonely.

to withdraw into o.s.
变得孤僻
She had to made a desperate attempt to leave her husband so she left under the cover of night.
她只能孤注一掷，离开她的丈夫，所以她趁着夜色跑了。
Tom thought her morose and uncompanionable.
汤姆认为她孤僻且难相处。
Two unique copies of ancient books were burned in the museum fire.
博物馆的两本古书孤本在火灾中烧毁了。
The lonely traveler was scared by the yip of tykes.
那个孤独的旅行者被野狗的狂吠声给吓坏了。
The lonely old man in the movie lived in an emotional desert.
电影中那个孤独的老人生活在情感的荒漠中。
He affiliated the orphan and sent him to school.
他收养了这个孤儿，并将他送到了学校。
The old lady conveyed all her property to the orphanage.
这位老妇人将所有的财产转让给了孤儿院。
The institution resources the orphanage by collecting money from the companies nearby.

刻板地模仿。

Háizimen jīngcháng mófǎng tāmen de fùmǔ huò gēgējiějiě。
孩子们经常模仿他们的父母或哥哥姐姐。
He did a funny impression of a politician.
Tā huájī de mófǎngle yí wèi zhèngkè。
他滑稽地模仿了一位政客。
His words echoed john f. Kennedy.
Tā de cuòcí mófǎngle Kěnnídí de yǎnjiǎng。
他的措辞模仿了肯尼迪的演讲。
Teenagers follow their friends in everything.
Qīngshàonián wǎngwǎng zài gè gè fāngmiàn mófǎng tóngbàn。
青少年往往在各个方面模仿同伴。
The mime imitated the passers-by.
Zhège yǎjù mófǎng guòlùrén。
这个哑剧模仿过路人。
Often imitations are extended to provide a more accurate rendition of the child\'s intended meaning.
Értóng de mófǎng xíngwéi tōngcháng bèi xiáng jiā jiědú，yònglái zhǔnquè quánshì tāmen de zhēnshí xiǎngfǎ。
儿童的模仿行为通常被详加解读，用来准确诠释他们的真实想法。
The parody was just a form of teasing.
Nàgè zhuōliè de mófǎng zhǐshì yì zhǒng yéyú。
那个拙劣的模仿只是一种揶揄。
Miss Burney protested indignantly, her long thin nose turning pink with mortification at this irreverent piece of mimicry.
Bóní xiǎojiě fènnù de kàngyì，gǎnjué zhè zhǒng bújìng mófǎng duì tā éryán shì yì zhǒng xiūrǔ，tā shòucháng de bízi yīncǐ yě biàn de fā hóng。
伯尼小姐愤怒地抗议，感觉这种不敬模仿对她而言是一种羞辱，她瘦长的鼻子因此也变得发红。
Acting is an imitative art.
Biǎoyǎn shì yì zhǒng mófǎng xìng yìshù。
表演是一种模仿性艺术。
The student irreverently mimicked the teacher in his presence.

这个学生当着老师的面极不尊敬地模仿了老师的举动。
Man is an imitative being.

这位演员非常准确地模仿了总统。

Yuǎnchù shānluán chóngdá，fǎngfó shì yìfúhuà。
In the distance lies a picturesque chain of towering mountains.
黄澄澄的谷穗随风摇摆，仿佛在庆祝即将到来的丰收。
Huángdèngdèng de gǔsuì suífēng yáobǎi，fǎngfó zài qìngzhù jíjiāng dàolái de fēngshōu。
The yellow grains are swaying with the wind as if to celebrate the coming harvest.
望着浩浩的田野，我仿佛回到了故乡。
Wàng zhe hàohào de tiányě，wǒ fǎngfú huídào le gùxiāng。
Staring at the vast field, it seems that have I returned to my birthplace.
几度提笔，又几度放弃，似有千言万语，又仿佛无话可说。
Jǐ dù tíbǐ，yòu jǐ dù fàngqì，sìyǒu qiānyán wànyǔ，yòu fǎngfú wúhuà kěshuō。
Picking up the pen and then giving up several times, I felt like I had a lot to say but was speechless at the same time.
我仿佛在黑暗中，看见了一道灵光闪现。
Wǒ fǎngfú zài hēi\'àn zhōng，kànjiàn le yídào língguāng shǎnxiàn。
I seemed to see a flash of miraculous brightness in the darkness.
这条针织的围巾仿佛是千里鹅毛，凝聚了她太多的情意。
Zhè tiáo zhēnzhī de wéijīn fǎngfú shì qiānlǐ émáo，níngjù le tā tài duō de qíngyì。
The knitted scarf is like a goose feather sent from a thousand li, which concentrates her profound feelings.
道长手持麈尾，口中念念有词，仿佛在诉说着死者的来世。
Dàozhǎng shǒuchí zhǔwěi，kǒu zhōng niànniàn yǒucí，fǎngfú zài sùshuō zhe sǐzhě de láishì。
The monk was holding a horsetail whisk in his hand and muttering incantations, as if talking about the future world of the dead.
她仿佛来到了梦幻世界。
Tā fǎngfú láidàole mènghuàn shìjiè.
She seemed to have entered a dreamworld.
他神色迷茫地望着前方，仿佛周围的一切都不存在了。
Tā shénsè mímáng de wàngzhe qiánfāng，fǎngfú zhōuwéi de yíqiè dōu bù cúnzàile.
He stared ahead in a daze as if nothing around him existed.
他俩的年龄相仿佛
河水奔腾咆哮，仿佛脱缰的野马
狂风仿佛要把屋顶掀掉
他仿佛并没有听懂
The news was sweet music to hear.
听到这条消息的感觉就仿佛是听到音乐一样美妙。
The room was swimming before his eyes.
房子仿佛在他眼前打转。
The film transported me back to Ancient Egypt.
这部电影仿佛把我带回到了古埃及时代。
it feels like {or} it feels as if...
仿佛觉得…
The two of them talked and laughed together, as though there was no such unbrotherly thing between them.
两人有说有笑，仿佛他们间没有兄弟反目这回事。
The blushing roses peeped into the cottage windows to bid good morning.
Fěnhóng de méiguī cóng nóngshè chuānghu zhōng tànchūtóulái，fǎngfú zài xiàng rénmen wènhǎo。
粉红的玫瑰从农舍窗户中探出头来，仿佛在向人们问好。
She touched the necklace as if it was a magic charm that could protect her.
Tā chùmōzhe xiàngliàn，fǎngfú tā shì yí gè néng shǒuhù tā de mófǎ hùshēnfú。
她触摸着项链，仿佛它是一个能守护她的魔法护身符。
His eyes seemed to shine in the purplish twilight.
Tā de yǎnjing fǎngfú zài zǐsè de mù guāng zhōng shǎnshuò。
他的眼睛仿佛在紫色的暮光中闪烁。
The sky seemed to flame in the Hawaiian sunset.
Zài xiàwēiyí de luòrì xià，tiānkōng fǎngfú shāozhele huǒ。
在夏威夷的落日下，天空仿佛烧着了火。
The insult passed as if unnoticed.
Zhèzhǒng wǔrǔ guòqù le，fǎngfú méiyǒu bèi rén zhùyì dào。
这种侮辱过去了，仿佛没有被人注意到。
The prime minister was wearing a grey suit and a white shirt with a soft collar, but his neck had become thinner and the collar stood away from it as if it had been bought haphazard.
Shǒuxiàng chuānzhe yí tào huīsè xīzhuāng hé yí jiàn báisè ruǎn lǐng chènshān，dànshì tā de bózi xiǎnde gèng shòu le，yīlǐng yuǎnlí bózi，fǎngfú yīfu shì suíbiàn mǎi lái yíyàng。
首相穿着一套灰色西装和一件白色软领衬衫，但是他的脖子显得更瘦了，衣领远离脖子，仿佛衣服是随便买来一样。
I had a creepy-crawly feeling.
Wǒ gǎnjué fǎngfú yǒu chóngzi zài shēnshàng pá。
我感觉仿佛有虫子在身上爬。
他俩见面不打招呼，仿佛谁也不认得谁。
Tāliǎ jiànmiàn bùdǎ zhāohu，fǎngfú shuí yě bú rèn de shuí。
The two of them never greet each other and behave as if they were strangers.
写一张仿
xiě yìzhāng fǎng
write a page of characters after a calligraphy model
这事她仿佛已经知道了。
Zhè shì tā fǎngfú yǐjing zhīdào le。
She seems to know about it already.
他的身体，看外表仿佛很好，其实有高血压病。
Tā de shēntǐ，kàn wàibiǎo fǎngfú hěn hǎo，qíshí yǒu gāoxuèyābìng。
He appears to be healthy, but has high blood pressure.
这两个人的年纪相仿佛。
Zhè liǎnggè rén de niánjì xiāng fǎngfú。
These two persons are about the same age.
他的模样还和十年前相仿佛。
Tā de múyàng hái hé shí nián qián xiāng fǎngfú。
He looks about the same as he did ten years ago.
仿古青铜器
fǎnggǔ qīngtóngqì
an imitation of an ancient bronze
他仿效那位名歌唱家的唱法，已经达到无懈可击的地步。
Tā fǎngxiào nà wèi mínggēchàngjiā de chàngfǎ，yǐjing dádào wúxièkějī de dìbù。
His imitation of that famous singer is perfect.
仿形车床
fǎngxíng chēchuáng
copying lathe; repetition lathe
仿形机械
fǎngxíng jīxiè
profiling mechanism
这个办法很好，各地可以仿照办理。
Zhège bànfǎ hěn hǎo，gè dì kěyǐ fǎngzhào bànlǐ。
This is a good method. It might well be adopted by other localities.
这部机器是模仿上海的一种新产品制造的。
Zhèbù jīqì shì mófǎngShànghǎi de yì zhǒng xīn chǎnpǐn zhìzào de。
This machine is modelled on one recently made in Shanghai.
儿童的模仿能力特强。
Értóng de mófǎngnénglì tè qiáng。
Children are very imitative.
他仿佛睡着了似的。
Tā fǎngfú shuìzháo le shì de。
He seems to be asleep.
内容相仿
nèiróngxiāngfǎng
be similar in content
年纪相仿
niánjì xiāngfǎng
be about the same age
仿造
fǎngzào
copy; be modelled on
相仿
xiāngfǎng
be similar; resemble each other; be more or less the same
模仿
mófǎng
imitate; copy; model oneself on
远处山峦重沓，仿佛是一幅画。
Yuǎnchù shānluán chóngdá，fǎngfó shì yìfúhuà。
In the distance lies a picturesque chain of towering mountains.
这些塑料的模特儿，都是模仿人类胴体制作的。
Zhèxiē sùliào de mótèr，dōushì mófǎng rénlèi dòngtǐ zhìzuò de。
The plastic dummies are made according to the size of human body.
这个仿古兜鍪的工艺品是我刚买的。
Zhège fǎnggǔ dōumóu de gōngyìpǐn shì wǒ gāng mǎi de。
I bought this copy of an ancient helmet recently.
他们的方法我们也可以仿办。
Tāmen de fāngfǎ wǒmen yě kěyǐ fǎngbàn。
We can follow their practice.
这塔是后来清代仿建的，已经不是明代原貌。
Zhè tǎ shì hòulái qīngdài fǎngjiàn de，yǐjing búshì míngdài yuánmào。
This tower built in the Qing dynasty was not the original Ming dynasty one.
工商局刚刚查获了一批仿冒商品。
Gōngshāngjú gānggāng cháhuò le yì pī fǎngmào shāngpǐn。
The industrial and commercial bureau has just seized an array of fake products.
他这钱包是仿皮的，价廉物美。
Tā zhè qiánbāo shì fǎngpí de，jiàliánwùměi。
His purse is made of artificial leather, it\'s cheap and good.
她太美了，仿若天使！
Tā tài měi le，fǎngruò tiānshǐ！
She is beautiful, like an angel!
我看你很面熟，仿若以前在哪儿见过？
Wǒ kàn nǐ hěn miànshú，fǎngruò yǐqián zài nǎ\'ér jiàn guò?
You look familiar, have we met before?
仿生其实就是在大自然中寻找解决问题的方法。
Fǎngshēng qíshí jiùshì zài dàzìrán zhōng xúnzhǎo jiějué wèntí de fāngfǎ。
Bionics is the approach of finding solutions from nature.
仿生建筑已经成为一种新的潮流。
Fǎngshēng jiànzhù yǐjing chéngwéi yìzhǒng xīn de cháoliú。
Bionic architecture has become a new trend.
文章的标题文字应该设成仿宋体。
Wénzhāng de biāotí wénzì yīnggāi shèchéng fǎngsòngtǐ。
The title of this article should be designed in a printed typeface imitating a Song-Dynasty script.
他们的方法很好，我们可以照此仿行。
Tāmen de fāngfǎ hěn hǎo，wǒmen kěyǐ zhàocǐ fǎngxíng。
We can follow their approach.
她手握毛笔，正在练习仿影摹写。
Tā shǒu wò máobǐ，zhèngzài liànxí fǎngyǐng móxiě。
She is copying model characters to practice calligraphy.
她刚开始学习书法，只能使用仿纸进行摹写。
Tā gāng kāishǐ xuéxí shūfǎ，zhǐnéng shǐyòng fǎngzhǐ jìnxíng móxiě。
She has just begun to learn calligraphy and can only use the practice paper to copy model characters.
黄澄澄的谷穗随风摇摆，仿佛在庆祝即将到来的丰收。
Huángdèngdèng de gǔsuì suífēng yáobǎi，fǎngfó zài qìngzhù jíjiāng dàolái de fēngshōu。

Picking up the pen and then giving up several times, I felt like I had a lot to say but was speechless at the same time.
他在模仿小鸟喈喈的叫声。
Tā zài mófǎng xiǎoniǎo jiējiē de jiàoshēng。
He is imitating the chirping of a bird.
她又失眠了，只好一直听那个仿古的刻漏滴水到天明。
Tā yòu shīmián le，zhǐhǎo yìzhí tīng nàge fǎnggǔ de kèlòu dīshuǐ dào tiānmíng。
She couldn\'t sleep and listened to the clock until daybreak.
我仿佛在黑暗中，看见了一道灵光闪现。

I seemed to see a flash of miraculous brightness in the darkness.
从他的仿古名剌上看，他的头衔是博物馆馆长。

From the archaized visiting card, he is a curator of a museum.
北京新建的那个奥运场馆，仿照了鸟巢的结构造型。
Běijīng xīnjiàn de nàge àoyùnchǎngguǎn，fǎngzhào le niǎocháo de jiégòu zàoxíng。
The Olympic stadium just built in Beijing follows the structure of a nest.
这条针织的围巾仿佛是千里鹅毛，凝聚了她太多的情意。

他靠非法生意发财后，很多人都如蝇逐臭，仿效他的做法。
Tā kào fēifǎ shēngyì fācái hòu，hěnduōrén dōu rúyíng zhúchòu，fǎngxiào tā de zuòfǎ。
After he got rich through an illegal business, many people followed him, like flies going after a rank smell.
要买古玩的话可一定要识辨真伪，谨防仿品乱真。
Yào mǎi gǔwán de huà kě yídìng yào shíbiàn zhēnwěi，jǐnfáng fǎngpǐn luànzhēn。
One must distinguish between the real and the fake if one wants to buy antiques.
他模仿起赵本山来还真是维妙维肖的。
Tā mófǎng qǐ Zhào Běnshān lái hái zhēnshì wéimiàowéixiào de。
He can imitate Zhao Benshan perfectly.
这个花瓶仿制得太像了，我都有点真伪莫辨了。
Zhège huāpíng fǎngzhì dé tài xiàng le，wǒ dōu yǒu diǎn zhēnwěi mòbiàn le。
This fake vase is so real that I can\'t distinguish between the real from the fake.

仿佛觉得…
to do an imitation of sb
模仿某人
to follow sb\'s lead
仿效某人的做法

许多人效仿了他的做法。

这本书模仿了另一位作者的风格。
She touched the necklace as if it was a magic charm that could protect her.
Tā chùmōzhe xiàngliàn，fǎngfú tā shì yí gè néng shǒuhù tā de mófǎ hùshēnfú。
她触摸着项链，仿佛它是一个能守护她的魔法护身符。
The children started to copy the behaviour of the television characters.
Háizǐmen kāishǐ mófǎng diànshì rénwù de xíngwéi。
孩子们开始模仿电视人物的行为。
Paste is usually used as an imitation for diamonds.
Qiānbōlí tōngcháng bèi yòngyú zhìzào zuànshí de fǎngzhìpǐn。
铅玻璃通常被用于制造钻石的仿制品。
The above examples are all slightly parodied versions of classical dance steps.
Shàngshù lìzi dōu kěyǐshuō shì jīngdiǎn wǔbù de mófǎng bǎnběn。
上述例子都可以说是经典舞步的模仿版本。
His eyes seemed to shine in the purplish twilight.
Tā de yǎnjing fǎngfú zài zǐsè de mù guāng zhōng shǎnshuò。
他的眼睛仿佛在紫色的暮光中闪烁。
One American pilot mocked his captains\' accents.
Yí gè Měiguó fēixíngyuán gùyì mófǎng qí jīzhǎng de kǒuyīn。
一个美国飞行员故意模仿其机长的口音。
My little brother is also my parrot, always doing everything I do.
Wǒ de xiǎodìdì yě shì wǒ de mófǎng zhě，wǒ zuò shénme tā yě zuò shénme。
我的小弟弟也是我的模仿者，我做什么他也做什么。
You must look at the film and try to emulate his behavior.
Nǐmen bìxū guānkàn zhè bù diànyǐng，bìng jìnlì mófǎng tā de dòngzuò。
你们必须观看这部电影，并尽力模仿他的动作。
The program can emulate any video game in the market.
Zhège jiémù nénggòu mófǎng Shìchǎng shàng de rènhé shìpín yóuxì。
这个节目能够模仿市场上的任何视频游戏。
They were sick to death with bad imitations.
Tāmen duì dīliè de mófǎng shēnwùtòngjué。
他们对低劣的模仿深恶痛绝。
My brother often camps it up and imitates our mother.
Wǒ xiōngdi jīngcháng jiǎoróuzàozuò de mófǎng wǒmen de mǔqīn。
我兄弟经常矫揉造作地模仿我们的母亲。
We will climb on to their highly successful business practices and theories.
Wǒ huì xiàofǎng tāmen gāodù chénggōng de shāngyè shíjiàn zuòfǎ hé lǐlùn móshì。
我会效仿他们高度成功的商业实践做法和理论模式。
My little brother is so annoying he\'s always copying after me.
Wǒ de xiǎo dìdì hěn tǎoyàn，tā zǒngshì mófǎng wǒ。
我的小弟弟很讨厌，他总是模仿我。
I don\'t want to be a copy cat.
Wǒ bù xiǎng chéngwéi yí gè mángmù mófǎngzhě。
我不想成为一个盲目模仿者。
In the wake of his success, other filmmakers began to follow suit.
Suízhe tā de chénggōng，qítā diànyǐng zhìpiànrén fēnfēn kāishǐ xiàofǎng。
随着他的成功，其他电影制片人纷纷开始效仿。
For all his standard procedures, I don\'t think he is actually imitating anybody.
Suīrán tā yǒuzhe biāozhǔn de chéngxù，dàn wǒ bú rènwéi tā shì zài mófǎng rènhé rén。
虽然他有着标准的程序，但我不认为他是在模仿任何人。
All of the mechanics are dressed in the fashion of late 50\'s.
Suǒyǒu xiūlǐgōng de chuānzhe dōu mófǎng wǔshí niándài。
所有修理工的穿着都模仿五十年代。
You could kill two birds with one stone by following our example.
Fǎngxiào wǒmen de zuòfǎ，nǐ jiù kěyǐ yìjǔliǎngdé。
仿效我们的做法，你就可以一举两得。
This building was modeled after a museum.
Zhè zuò jiànzhù shì fǎngzhào yí gè bówùguǎn jiàn de。
这座建筑是仿照一个博物馆建的。
The dress was patterened after a Chinese dragon.
Fúzhuāng shì fǎngzhào Zhōngguólóng zhìzuò de。
服装是仿照中国龙制作的。
He patterned his approach on Steven\'s.
Tā xiàofǎngle Sīdìfēn de fāngfǎ。
他效仿了斯蒂芬的方法。
The class clown was taking off and pretending to be the principal.
Zhège bānjí xiǎochǒu zhèngzài mófǎng xiàozhǎng。
这个班级小丑正在模仿校长。
This first copy cat murder threw him for a loss.
Zhè dì-yì qǐ kèyì mófǎng de móushā shǐ tā gǎndào jīngyì bù\'ān。
这第一起刻意模仿的谋杀使他感到惊异不安。
The flower arrangement was created as an echo of a client\'s still life.
Zhège chāhuā shì fǎngzhào yí wèi kèhù de jìngwùhuà zuò chūlái de。
这个插花是仿照一位客户的静物画做出来的。
The architecture was a kind of bastard suggesting Gothic but not true Gothic.
Zhège jiànzhù shì mǒu zhǒng fǎng gētèshì jiànzhù de，bìngbúshì zhēnzhèng gētèshì de。
这个建筑是某种仿哥特式建筑的，并不是真正哥特式的。
She began to mimic him ironically.
Tā kāishǐ cháofěng de mófǎng tā。
她开始嘲讽地模仿他。
It imitates at many removes a Shakespearean tragedy.
Tā de mófǎng lí Shāshìbǐyà shì de bēijù hái hěn yuǎn。
它的模仿离莎士比亚式的悲剧还很远。
Her little brother apes her behavior.
Tā de xiǎodìdì mófǎng tā de xíngwéi。
她的小弟弟模仿她的行为。
The sky seemed to flame in the Hawaiian sunset.
Zài xiàwēiyí de luòrì xià，tiānkōng fǎngfú shāozhele huǒ。
在夏威夷的落日下，天空仿佛烧着了火。
Children often copy their parents or older siblings.
Háizimen jīngcháng mófǎng tāmen de fùmǔ huò gēgējiějiě。
孩子们经常模仿他们的父母或哥哥姐姐。
He did a funny impression of a politician.
Tā huájī de mófǎngle yí wèi zhèngkè。
他滑稽地模仿了一位政客。
The insult passed as if unnoticed.
Zhèzhǒng wǔrǔ guòqù le，fǎngfú méiyǒu bèi rén zhùyì dào。
这种侮辱过去了，仿佛没有被人注意到。
His words echoed john f. Kennedy.
Tā de cuòcí mófǎngle Kěnnídí de yǎnjiǎng。
他的措辞模仿了肯尼迪的演讲。
Teenagers follow their friends in everything.
Qīngshàonián wǎngwǎng zài gè gè fāngmiàn mófǎng tóngbàn。
青少年往往在各个方面模仿同伴。
The mime imitated the passers-by.
Zhège yǎjù mófǎng guòlùrén。
这个哑剧模仿过路人。
The prime minister was wearing a grey suit and a white shirt with a soft collar, but his neck had become thinner and the collar stood away from it as if it had been bought haphazard.
Shǒuxiàng chuānzhe yí tào huīsè xīzhuāng hé yí jiàn báisè ruǎn lǐng chènshān，dànshì tā de bózi xiǎnde gèng shòu le，yīlǐng yuǎnlí bózi，fǎngfú yīfu shì suíbiàn mǎi lái yíyàng。
首相穿着一套灰色西装和一件白色软领衬衫，但是他的脖子显得更瘦了，衣领远离脖子，仿佛衣服是随便买来一样。
Understanding affine transformations requires considerable mathematical sophistication.
Lǐjiě fǎng shè biànhuàn xūyào xiāngdāng shēnhòu de shùxué zhīshi。
理解仿射变换需要相当深厚的数学知识。
Often imitations are extended to provide a more accurate rendition of the child\'s intended meaning.
Értóng de mófǎng xíngwéi tōngcháng bèi xiáng jiā jiědú，yònglái zhǔnquè quánshì tāmen de zhēnshí xiǎngfǎ。
儿童的模仿行为通常被详加解读，用来准确诠释他们的真实想法。
The figure inside the boucle dress was stupefying.
Zhè jiàn fǎng gāo pí ne liányīqún bèihòu de jiàgé gāo de xiàsǐrén。
这件仿羔皮呢连衣裙背后的价格高得吓死人。
Doctors used to put people under by chloroforming them.
Yīshēng guòqù jīngcháng shǐyòng lǜfǎng mázuì。
医生过去经常使用氯仿麻醉。
In Britain they call a shirtwaist a shirtwaister.
Yīngguórén bǎ“shirtwaist”（fǎngnánshìnǚchènshān ）chēngwéi“shirtwaister”。
英国人把“shirtwaist”（仿男式女衬衫）称为“shirtwaister”。
The parody was just a form of teasing.
Nàgè zhuōliè de mófǎng zhǐshì yì zhǒng yéyú。
那个拙劣的模仿只是一种揶揄。
Miss Burney protested indignantly, her long thin nose turning pink with mortification at this irreverent piece of mimicry.
Bóní xiǎojiě fènnù de kàngyì，gǎnjué zhè zhǒng bújìng mófǎng duì tā éryán shì yì zhǒng xiūrǔ，tā shòucháng de bízi yīncǐ yě biàn de fā hóng。
伯尼小姐愤怒地抗议，感觉这种不敬模仿对她而言是一种羞辱，她瘦长的鼻子因此也变得发红。
Acting is an imitative art.
Biǎoyǎn shì yì zhǒng mófǎng xìng yìshù。
表演是一种模仿性艺术。
The student irreverently mimicked the teacher in his presence.
Zhège xuésheng dāngzhe lǎoshī de miàn jíbù zūnjìng de mófǎngle lǎoshī de jǔdòng。
这个学生当着老师的面极不尊敬地模仿了老师的举动。
Man is an imitative being.
Rénlèi shì yì zhǒng mófǎng xìng dòngwù。
人类是一种模仿性动物。
The actor mimicked the President very accurately.
Zhè wèi yǎnyuán fēicháng zhǔnquè de mófǎngle zǒngtǒng。
这位演员非常准确地模仿了总统。
I had a creepy-crawly feeling.
Wǒ gǎnjué fǎngfú yǒu chóngzi zài shēnshàng pá。
我感觉仿佛有虫子在身上爬。
Facial profiling is a new form of airport security.
Miànróng fǎng xíng shì yì zhǒng xīn xíngshì de jīchǎng ānbǎo cuòshī。
面容仿形是一种新形式的机场安保措施。
Onomatopoeic words are imitative of noises.
Nǐshēngcí shì yònglái mófǎng shēngyīn de。
拟声词是用来模仿声音的。
Memes are the cultural counterpart of genes.
Dànǎo mófǎng chuándì yǔ jīyīn zài wénhuàshàng duìděng。
大脑模仿传递与基因在文化上对等。
In November, they agreed to call a halt to the free trade area negotiations.
Zài shíyī yuèfèn，tāmen tóngyì hūyù zàntíng zìyóu màoyìqū tánpàn。
在11月份，他们同意呼吁暂停自由贸易区谈判。
国内厂商已经作好了充分准备，面对加入世界贸易组织后的自由竞争局面。
Guónèi chǎngshāng yǐjing zuòhǎo le chōngfèn zhǔnbèi，miànduì jiārù shìjiè màoyì zǔzhī hòu de zìyóu jìngzhēng júmiàn。
Domestic producers are fully prepared to face free competition formed after our entrance to the WTO.
They are trying to establish a free trade agreement between their countries.
两国正在设法缔结自由贸易协定。
Many Mexican small businesses folded due to NAFTA.
由于北美自由贸易协议的签订，许多墨西哥小企业不得不闭门关张。
The profits from capitalism are redistributed to millions of people through collective investment trusts.
Láizì zìyóumàoyì de lìrùn tōngguò jízhōng tóuzī tuōlāsī chóngxīn fēnpèi gěi shùbǎiwàn tóuzīzhě。
来自自由贸易的利润通过集中投资托拉斯重新分配给数百万投资者。
In November, they agreed to call a halt to the free trade area negotiations.
Zài shíyī yuèfèn，tāmen tóngyì hūyù zàntíng zìyóu màoyìqū tánpàn。
在11月份，他们同意呼吁暂停自由贸易区谈判。
The imperialist nation wanted to strangle the free trade between the two small countries.
Nàgè dìguózhǔyì guójiā xiǎng èshā zhè liǎng gè Xiǎoguó zhījiān de zìyóu màoyì。
那个帝国主义国家想扼杀这两个小国之间的自由贸易。
Prices were little changed in moderate trading nowadays.
Zài xiàndài yìbānxìng màoyì zhōng，jiàgé bōdòng hěn xiǎo。
在现代一般性贸易中，价格波动很小。
Nothing cements a friendship between countries so much as trade.
没有什么能像贸易一样如此这般地巩固两国之间的友谊。
外贸部部长
Wàimàobùbùzhǎng
Minister of Foreign Trade
对外贸易逆差
duìwài màoyì nìchā
foreign trade deficit; unfavourable balance of trade
对外贸易顺差
duìwài màoyì shùnchā
foreign trade surplus; favourable balance of trade
让外贸企业放开经营
ràng wàimào qǐyè fàngkāi jīngyíng
give foreign trade enterprises full authority over management
外贸
wàimào
foreign trade
他做了几年内贸，在有了一定的经验和资本以后又搞起外贸来了。
Tā zuò le jǐnián nèimào，zài yǒu le yídìng de jīngyàn hé zīběn yǐhòu yòu gǎoqǐ wàimào lái le。
After pursuing domestic trade for several years, he started foreign trade with a certain amount of experience and capital.
这一带的外贸发展态势良好，对此侨商功不可没。
Zhè yídài de wàimào fāzhǎn tàishì liánghǎo，duì cǐ qiáoshāng gōngbùkěmò。
Foreign trade of this area has maintained a good momentum, of which overseas Chinese businessmen have contributed a lot.
外贸
wàimào
foreign trade
他在一家对外贸易公司工作。
Tā zài yìjiā duìwàimàoyì gōngsī gōngzuò.
He works for a company that\'s engaged in foreign trade.
外贸。
对外贸易。
这几个公司都隶属外贸总公司。
They did much of their overseas trade in foreign bottoms.
Tāmen de dàbùfèn hǎiwài màoyì dōushì zài wàiguó shāngchuán shàng wánchéng de。
他们的大部分海外贸易都是在外国商船上完成的。
foreign trade
对外贸易
Merchants would benefit from loosening up foreign trade.
Shāngjiā jiāng cóng fàngkuān duì duìwàimàoyì de xiànzhì zhōng huòyì。
商家将从放宽对对外贸易的限制中获益。
Some overseas trade in grain arose.
Yìxiē hǎiwài màoyì zhēnzhèng chūxiàn le。
一些海外贸易真正出现了。
foreign and trade relations
外交及贸易关系
an escape clause
(贸易等的)例外条款，免责条款
The countries agreed to conduct their bilateral trade in hard currency，replacing previous barter arrangements.
Gèguó dōu tóngyì yǐ yìnghuòbì kāizhǎn shuāngbiān màoyì，qǔdài yǐqián de shíwù jiāoyì。
各国都同意以硬货币开展双边贸易，取代以前的实物交易。
a bilateral trade agreement
双边(性的)贸易协定
世界贸易组织是独立于联合国的永久性国际组织。
Shìjiè màoyì zǔzhī shì dúlì yú liánhéguó de yǒngjiǔxìng guójì zǔzhī。
The WTO is a permanent international organization independent from the United Nations.
中国是世界贸易组织协约国之一。
Zhōngguó shì shìjiè màoyì zǔzhī xiéyuēguó zhīyī。
China is a signing country of the WTO.
国内厂商已经作好了充分准备，面对加入世界贸易组织后的自由竞争局面。

Entering the World Trade Organisation will have a big impact on China\'s agriculture.

The coastal merchants of west Africa had been trading with Europe for several centuries.

Township fairs are often bustling.

贸然下结论
màorán xià jiélùn 
draw a hasty conclusion; jump to a conclusion
贸然同意
màorán tóngyì 
agree without careful consideration
贸然从事
màorán cónɡshì
act rashly
皇帝不顾众朝臣的反对，贸然出兵了。
Huángdì búgù zhòng cháochén de fǎnduì，màorán chūbīng le。

情况有变，你们可不能贸贸然发起进攻。

There are some changes in the present situation; you should act hastily.

贸然行动。

to enter a game cold
贸然参加比赛
Your bold assumption of the results have made us point fingers at each other.
你贸然对此事负责的行为已经使我们成了众矢之的。
He would not advise everyone to take a leap in the dark.
Tā búhuì zhǔzhāng rènhé rén màoránxíngdòng。
他不会主张任何人贸然行动。
Yet the European Trade Union Confederation could never go along with such a leap in the dark.
Dànshì ōuzhōu gōnghuì liánhéhuì jiāng yǒngyuǎn búhuì zàntóng rúcǐ de màoránxíngshì。
但是欧洲工会联合会将永远不会赞同如此的贸然行事。
集贸是城镇居民的主要贸易方式。
Jímào shì chéngzhèn jūmín de zhǔyào màoyì fāngshì。
Fairs are the main form of trade for township people.
我们要打破国际贸易坚冰，争取贸易平等。
Wǒmen yào dǎpò guójì màoyì jiānbīng，zhēngqǔ màoyì píngděng。
International trade barriers should be removed to ensure equality between any two parties involved.
他做了几年内贸，在有了一定的经验和资本以后又搞起外贸来了。
Tā zuò le jǐnián nèimào，zài yǒu le yídìng de jīngyàn hé zīběn yǐhòu yòu gǎoqǐ wàimào lái le。
After pursuing domestic trade for several years, he started foreign trade with a certain amount of experience and capital.
情况有变，你们可不能贸贸然发起进攻。
Qíngkuàng yǒu biàn，nǐmen kě bùnéng màomàorán fāqǐ jìngōng。
There are some changes in the present situation; you should act hastily.

Tā fùmǔ zài nóngmào shìchǎng bǎitānr mài shuǐguǒ。
His parents are fruit peddlers in a farm produce market.

他的大女儿是靠做边贸来养家的。

The diversified management of the international companies enjoys the benefits of compensation trade.
皇帝不顾众朝臣的反对，贸然出兵了。
Huángdì búgù zhòng cháochén de fǎnduì，màorán chūbīng le。
The emperor hastily dispatched troops against objections from his courtiers.
我们还不了解这家公司的底里，先不要贸然签约。
Wǒmen hái bùliǎojiě zhè jiā gōngsī de dǐlǐ，xiān búyào màorán qiānyuē。

Tā zài nóngmào shìchǎng yǐ hěnpiányí de jiàgé mǎi le yì jīn hòutúnjiān。
He bought a kilo of hunched part of the haunch pork at very cheap price in the vegetable market.
镇子上的集市贸易很是热闹。
Zhènzi shàng de jíshì màoyì hěnshì rènào。
Township fairs are often bustling.

The trade fair of the town is held every other day.

Prices were little changed in moderate trading nowadays.

在现代一般性贸易中，价格波动很小。
Production for trade can have a negative impact on the environment.
Màoyì shēngchǎn huì duì huánjìng chǎnshēng fùmiàn yǐngxiǎng。
贸易生产会对环境产生负面影响。
The total number of vessels engaged in the trade fluctuated.
Màoyì zhōng shǐyòng de chuánbó zǒngshùliàng biànhuà hěn dà。
贸易中使用的船舶总数量变化很大。
The yen\'s trade-weighted value has made gains against the RMB this week.
Běnzhōu，Rìyuán duì Rénmínbì de màoyì jiāquánzhí yòu shàngshēng le。
本周，日元对人民币的贸易加权值又上升了。
In November, they agreed to call a halt to the free trade area negotiations.
Zài shíyī yuèfèn，tāmen tóngyì hūyù zàntíng zìyóu màoyìqū tánpàn。
在11月份，他们同意呼吁暂停自由贸易区谈判。
He would not advise everyone to take a leap in the dark.
Tā búhuì zhǔzhāng rènhé rén màoránxíngdòng。
他不会主张任何人贸然行动。
Yet the European Trade Union Confederation could never go along with such a leap in the dark.
Dànshì ōuzhōu gōnghuì liánhéhuì jiāng yǒngyuǎn búhuì zàntóng rúcǐ de màoránxíngshì。
但是欧洲工会联合会将永远不会赞同如此的贸然行事。
By his own account, he was both strong and skillful in his trade.
Jùtāsuǒshuō， zài màoyì lǐngyù， tā fēicháng qiángdà hé shúliàn。
据他所说，在贸易领域，他非常强大和熟练。
Peter was criticized for having failed to take advantage of its favorable position for trade.
Yīn wèinéng chōngfèn lìyòng màoyì de yǒulì huánjìng，Bǐdé zāodàole zhǐzé。
因未能充分利用贸易的有利环境，彼得遭到了指责。
He also established himself in the Russian trade industry.
Tā zài éguó de màoyì hángyè zhōng yě zhànzhùle jiǎo。
他在俄国的贸易行业中也站住了脚。
Merchants would benefit from loosening up foreign trade.
Shāngjiā jiāng cóng fàngkuān duì duìwàimàoyì de xiànzhì zhōng huòyì。
商家将从放宽对对外贸易的限制中获益。
We usually trade at the local farmers market for our vegetables.
Wǒmen tōngcháng zài dāngdì nóngmàoshìchǎng shàng mǎi shūcài。
我们通常在当地农贸市场上买蔬菜。
The coastal merchants of west Africa had been trading with Europe for several centuries.
Xīfēi de yánhǎi shāngrén yǐ yǔ Ōuzhōu jìnxíngle hǎo jǐ gè shìjì de màoyì wǎnglái。
西非的沿海商人已与欧洲进行了好几个世纪的贸易往来。
They did much of their overseas trade in foreign bottoms.
Tāmen de dàbùfèn hǎiwài màoyì dōushì zài wàiguó shāngchuán shàng wánchéng de。
他们的大部分海外贸易都是在外国商船上完成的。
They are accused of conspiring to constrain trade.
Tāmen bèi zhǐzé gòngtóng móuqiú jìnxíng màoyì xiànzhì。
他们被指责共同谋求进行贸易限制。
The tower of the World Trade Center tumbled after the plane hit it.
Bèi fēijī zhuàngjī zhīhòu，shìmàozhōngxīn de gāo tǎ kuǎtā le。
被飞机撞击之后，世贸中心的高塔垮塌了。
The imperialist nation wanted to strangle the free trade between the two small countries.
Nàgè dìguózhǔyì guójiā xiǎng èshā zhè liǎng gè Xiǎoguó zhījiān de zìyóu màoyì。
那个帝国主义国家想扼杀这两个小国之间的自由贸易。
The plane crash in Milan mirrored the attack in the World Trade Center.
Mǐlán de zhuìjī shìjiàn shì Měiguó shìmào zhōngxīn shòu gōngjī de chóngyǎn。
米兰的坠机事件是美国世贸中心受攻击的重演。
We export less than we import and have a negative trade balance.
Wǒmen jìnkǒuliàng dàyú chūkǒuliàng，yīncǐ wǒmen yǒu màoyìchìzì。
我们进口量大于出口量，因此我们有贸易赤字。
Some overseas trade in grain arose.
Yìxiē hǎiwài màoyì zhēnzhèng chūxiàn le。
一些海外贸易真正出现了。
The countries agreed to conduct their bilateral trade in hard currency，replacing previous barter arrangements.
Gèguó dōu tóngyì yǐ yìnghuòbì kāizhǎn shuāngbiān màoyì，qǔdài yǐqián de shíwù jiāoyì。
各国都同意以硬货币开展双边贸易，取代以前的实物交易。
The completion of the railroad was the precipitating cause in the extinction of waterborne commerce.
Zhè duàn tiělù de jiànchéng jiākuàile shuǐshàngmàoyì de xiāowáng。
这段铁路的建成加快了水上贸易的消亡。
Bahrain has been an entrepot of trade between Arabia and India since the second millennium BC.
Bālín Dǎo zìcóng gōngyuánqián 200 nián qǐ jiùshì Ālābó Bàndǎo hé Yìndù zhījiān de màoyì zhōngxīn。
巴林岛自从公元前200年起就是阿拉伯半岛和印度之间的贸易中心。
He made trade protection a plank in the party platform.
Tāmen bǎ màoyì bǎohù xiěrùle dǎnggāng。
他们把贸易保护写入了党纲。
A nation\'s balance of trade is favorable when its exports exceed its imports.
Dāng chūkǒu\'é dàyú jìnkǒu\'é shí，yí gè guójiā de màoyì jiù huì chūxiàn shùnchā。
当出口额大于进口额时，一个国家的贸易就会出现顺差。
Sterling transferability affords a means of multilateral settlement for trade between nondollar countries.
Yīngbànghuìduì wèi fēi měiyuán guójiā jiān de màoyì tígōngle yìzhǒng duōbiānjiésuànfāngshì。
英磅汇兑为非美元国家间的贸易提供了一种多边结算方式。
The mercantile North was forging ahead.
Jìnxíng màoyì de běifāng zhèngzài zhúbù lǐngxiān。
进行贸易的北方正在逐步领先。
The inconvertibility of their currency made international trade impossible.
Qí qīngxiàng de bùkěduìhuànxìng shǐde guójìmàoyì wú fǎ jìnxíng。
其倾向的不可兑换性使得国际贸易无法进行。
They rode the trade winds going west.
Tāmen shùnzhe màoyìfēng xiàng xī hángxíng。
他们顺着贸易风向西航行。
经贸政策
jīngmào zhèngcè
policies for economic and trade activities
经贸关系
jīngmàoguānxì
economic and trade relations

Búyào ràng biānjièxiàn chéngwéi guójiā zhījiān jīngjì màoyì hézuò de zhàng\'ài。
Do not let borders stand in the way of economic cooperation between different countries.
促进经济贸易联系
cùjìn jīngjì màoyì liánxì
encourage economic and trade relations
他做了几年内贸，在有了一定的经验和资本以后又搞起外贸来了。
Tā zuò le jǐnián nèimào，zài yǒu le yídìng de jīngyàn hé zīběn yǐhòu yòu gǎoqǐ wàimào lái le。
After pursuing domestic trade for several years, he started foreign trade with a certain amount of experience and capital.
让外贸企业放开经营
ràng wàimào qǐyè fàngkāi jīngyíng
give foreign trade enterprises full authority over management
跨国公司的多元化经营有利于进行补偿贸易。

The diversified management of the international companies enjoys the benefits of compensation trade.
国内厂商已经作好了充分准备，面对加入世界贸易组织后的自由竞争局面。
Guónèi chǎngshāng yǐjing zuòhǎo le chōngfèn zhǔnbèi，miànduì jiārù shìjiè màoyì zǔzhī hòu de zìyóu jìngzhēng júmiàn。
Domestic producers are fully prepared to face free competition formed after our entrance to the WTO.

Township fairs are often bustling.
镇子的集市间日进行一次贸易活动。
Zhènzi de jíshì jiānrì jìnxíng yícì màoyì huódòng。
The trade fair of the town is held every other day.

Fairs are the main form of trade for township people.
这片居民区里有个很大的集贸市场。
Zhè piàn jūmínqū lǐ yǒu gè hěndà de jímào shìchǎng。
There is a large market in the residential area.
镇子上的集市贸易很是热闹。
Zhènzi shàng de jíshì màoyì hěnshì rènào。
Township fairs are often bustling.

The trade fair of the town is held every other day.
到集贸市场出卖农副产品
这里是集贸市场。
工贸集团
The profits from capitalism are redistributed to millions of people through collective investment trusts.

来自自由贸易的利润通过集中投资托拉斯重新分配给数百万投资者。
这是家规模很大的跨国贸易公司。

It is a large international commerce company.
国内贸易
ɡuó nèi màoyì
domestic trade
我们要打破国际贸易坚冰，争取贸易平等。

International trade barriers should be removed to ensure equality between any two parties involved.
国际贸易这个专业在大学里很受欢迎。

Liǎngguó jiù màoyì wèntí nàobièniǔ.

和别国进行贸易
hé bié guó jìnxíngmàoyì 
trade with foreign countries; do business with other countries

公司特命你前往美国进行贸易谈判。

我国和很多国家都建立起了长期的贸易伙伴关系。

The inconvertibility of their currency made international trade impossible.
Qí qīngxiàng de bùkěduìhuànxìng shǐde guójìmàoyì wú fǎ jìnxíng。
其倾向的不可兑换性使得国际贸易无法进行。
Office of Fair Trading
[BRIT] 公平贸易部
多边贸易谈判
duōbiānmàoyìtánpàn
multilateral trade talks
目前多边贸易的广泛开展，还有着诸多的限制。
Mùqián duōbiān màoyì de guǎngfàn kāizhǎn，háiyǒu zhe zhūduō de xiànzhì。
Currently, there are many restrictions that hamper the development of multilateral trade.
多边贸易
duōbiān màoyì
multilateral trade
多边贸易谈判
duōbiānmàoyìtánpàn
multilateral trade talks
Sterling transferability affords a means of multilateral settlement for trade between nondollar countries.
Yīngbànghuìduì wèi fēi měiyuán guójiā jiān de màoyì tígōngle yìzhǒng duōbiānjiésuànfāngshì。
英磅汇兑为非美元国家间的贸易提供了一种多边结算方式。
对外贸易逆差
duìwài màoyì nìchā
foreign trade deficit; unfavourable balance of trade
对外贸易顺差
duìwài màoyì shùnchā
foreign trade surplus; favourable balance of trade

Tā zài yìjiā duìwàimàoyì gōngsī gōngzuò.
He works for a company that\'s engaged in foreign trade.
对外贸易。
foreign trade
对外贸易
Merchants would benefit from loosening up foreign trade.
Shāngjiā jiāng cóng fàngkuān duì duìwàimàoyì de xiànzhì zhōng huòyì。
商家将从放宽对对外贸易的限制中获益。

cáizhènɡ(màoyì) chìzì 
financial (trade) deficit
这些从事转口贸易的商人，在二战中发了一笔横财。
Zhèxiē cóngshì zhuǎnkǒu màoyì de shāngrén，zài èrzhàn zhōng fāle yìbǐ héngcái。
Enjtrepot merchants made large fortunes during World War Two.

指尖
zhǐjiān 
fingertip
你的指甲太尖了，书都被你戳破了。
Nǐ de zhǐjiǎ tài jiān le，shū dōu bèi nǐ chuōpò le。
Your fingers are so pointed that they have scratched through the paper of this book.
尖锐指斥
尖锐地指出矛盾的焦点
He would spin the book around on the tip of his finger.
Tā huì ràng nà běn shū zài zìjǐ de zhǐjiān shàng xuánzhuǎn。
他会让那本书在自己的指尖上旋转。
He smiled at her and touched her cheek with his fingertip.
Tā xiàng tā wēixiào bìng yòng zhǐjiān qīngqīng de chùpèngle yíxià tā de liǎnjiá。
他向她微笑并用指尖轻轻地触碰了一下她的脸颊。
He added the butter and rubbed into the flour with your fingertips.

Āilǐkè diào xiàqù de shíhou，yòu shì jiānjiào yòu shì shuāngjiǎo zài kōngzhōng luàndēng。
埃里克掉下去的时候，又是尖叫又是双脚在空中乱蹬。
His screams bore away in the wind.
Tā de jiānjiàoshēng zài fēngzhōng chuándì。
他的尖叫声在风中传递。
He screamed，crashing back through the fence and bellowing with pain.
Tā jiānjiàozhe quánsù hòutuì fānguò wéiqiáng，tòngkǔ děi dàshēng hǒujiào。
他尖叫着全速后退翻过围墙，痛苦得大声吼叫。
We will blow upon his true identity if he squeals.
Rúguǒ tā jiānjiào， wǒmen jiāng gàofā tā de zhēnshí shēnfèn。
如果他尖叫，我们将告发他的真实身份。
Simon cried out in pain.
Xīméng tòngkǔ de jiānjiào。
西蒙痛苦地尖叫。
The whole house echoed with her shrill voice.
Zhěnggè fángzi lǐ dōu huídàngzhe tā de jiānjiàoshēng。
整个房子里都回荡着她的尖叫声。
The wheels squealed briefly and the car edged toward the shoulder.
Chēlún fāchūle yì shēng jiānjiào，qìchē biàn cháozhe cèyì de lù mànmàn nuóle guòqù。
车轮发出了一声尖叫，汽车便朝着侧翼的路慢慢挪了过去。
He screamed and hit out at her.
Tā jiānjiào bìng měngjìn\'er dǎ tā。
他尖叫并猛劲儿打她。
He heard the girl scream in pain.
Tā tīngjiàn zhège nǚhái tòngkǔ de jiānjiào。
他听见这个女孩痛苦地尖叫。
I jumped up with a heck of a yell.
Wǒ jiānjiàozhe zhànle qǐlái。
我尖叫着站了起来。
The loud scream pierced into my heart.
Nà shēng jiānjiào chuāntòule wǒ de xīn。
那声尖叫穿透了我的心。
We rowed about all night screaming at each other.
Wǒmen wèi yì xiǔ de jiānjiàoshēng ér zhēngchǎo zhe。
我们为一宿的尖叫声而争吵着。
The boy screamed when he ran back over to the accident.
Zhège nánhái huíyì shìgù shí fāchū jiānjiào。
这个男孩回忆事故时发出尖叫。
Unable to swim, the man screamed for help.
Zhège nánrén yīn búhuì yóuyǒng ér jiānjiào qiúzhù。
这个男人因不会游泳而尖叫求助。
She threw open the parlour door, but instantly sprung back with a scream
Tā dǎkāi kètīng de mén，dàn lìjí tán huílái，fāchū yìshēng jiānjiào。
她打开客厅的门，但立即弹回来，发出一声尖叫。
He shrieked then twisted around like a crazy animal.
Tā jiānjiàozhe，ránhòu xiàng yì zhī fēngkuáng de dòngwù yíyàng xuánzhuǎn qǐlái。
他尖叫着，然后像一只疯狂的动物一样旋转起来。
The child screamed when he confronted the man in the Halloween costume.
Dāng zhège háizi pèngdào shēn chuān wànshèngjié fúzhuāng de rén shí jìnbúzhù jiānjiào qǐlái。
当这个孩子碰到身穿万圣节服装的人时禁不住尖叫起来。
The scream pierced the night.
Jiānjiào shēng cìpò yèkōng。
尖叫声刺破夜空。
A shrill voice sounded behind us.
Wǒmen bèihòu xiǎngqǐ yìshēng jiānjiào。
我们背后响起一声尖叫。
She was fit to scream.
Tā jīhū yào jiānjiào qǐlái。
她几乎要尖叫起来。
Her desperate screams.
Tā fāchū juéwàng de jiānjiào。
她发出绝望的尖叫。

Kàndào zìjǐ bèi zhuā，tā jiānjiào qǐlái。
看到自己被抓，他尖叫起来。
The screaming redoubled.
Jiānjiàoshēng yílànggāoguòyílàng。
尖叫声一浪高过一浪。
She screamed blue murder.
Tā de jiānjiào shēngsīlìjié。
她的尖叫声嘶力竭。
She screamed hysterically when she heard the news.
Tā tīngdào nàgè xiāoxi hòu xiēsīdǐlǐ de jiānjiào qǐlái。
她听到那个消息后歇斯底里地尖叫起来。
The boys bobbed down the hill screaming with pleasure.

这些小男孩乘坐大雪橇、兴奋地尖叫着滑下山坡。
Her screaming attracted the neighbors.
Tā de jiānjiào shēng yǐnqǐle línjū de zhùyì。
她的尖叫声引起了邻居的注意。
Ross gave a bark of harsh, mocking laughter.
Luósī fāchū yí zhèn jiānkè de cháoxiào shēng，shēngyīn yǒudiǎn xiàng gǒu jiào。
罗斯发出一阵尖刻的嘲笑声，声音有点像狗叫。
尖声尖气
jiān shēng jiān qì
in a shrill voice
他说话尖声尖气的，太难听。
塔尖子。也说尖儿。
His sharp nose jutted out.
Tā jiānjiān de bízi xiàng wài tūchū。
他尖尖的鼻子向外突出。
The pain is as if sharp points pinch your back.
Zhè zhǒng téngtòng de gǎnjué jiùxiàng shì jiānruì de xiǎozhēnjiān zhā nǐ de hòubèi yíyàng。
这种疼痛的感觉就像是尖锐的小针尖扎你的后背一样。
